NK084(yu)004:1: // sgyu 'phrul zhi ba rin chen d+r+wa ba'i mchan 'grel
NK084(yu)004:2: mi bskyod rdo rje'i dgongs rgyan ces bya ba bzhugs
NK084(yu)004:3: so // na mo gu ru badz+ra sa t+wa ye /
NK084(yu)004:4: gnyis su mi phyed rdo rje'i thugs ni nam mkha'i dbyings ltar rab yangs shing //
NK084(yu)004:5: rgya mtsho lta bur zab pa'i gsung gis chos kyi sgra dbyangs rtag tu sgrogs //
NK084(yu)004:6: sgyu 'phrul bde chen rdo rje'i sku ni longs spyod yongs rdzogs 'khor lor shar //
NK084(yu)004:7: dpal ldan bla ma rigs kun khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa'i zhabs la 'dud //
NK084(yu)004:8: lung bstan rdo rje ku ku r+aa dza dang //
NK084(yu)004:9: sgeg rdor sangs rgyas gsang ba bi ma la //
NK084(yu)004:10: gnyags lo so zur gnubs dang sgro phug sogs //
NK084(yu)004:11: sgyu 'phrul brgyud pa'i bla ma rnams la 'dud //
NK084(yu)004:12: kun bzang rdo rje 'chang gi sngags rgyud che'i //
NK084(yu)004:13: yang rtse gnyis med sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba yi //
NK084(yu)004:14: bskyed rim rtsa ba zhi ba rin phreng gi //
NK084(yu)004:15: mchan 'grel rig 'dzin grub pa'i gsung bzhin dbye //
NK084(yu)004:16: de la tan+t+ra chen po sde bco brgyad kyi rtsa
NK084(yu)004:17: ba'am spyi rgyud sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba rdo rje sems
NK084(yu)004:18: dpa' gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha yi
NK084(yu)004:19: mngon par rtogs pa zhi khro gnyis las bde gshegs
NK084(yu)004:20: zhi ba'i lha sngags rgyas par bstan pa'i zhi ba
NK084(yu)004:21: rin chen d+r+wa ba zhes pa 'di nyid gang zhig
NK084(yu)004:22: rdo rje theg pa'i bstan pa'i shing rta 'phags yul
NK084(yu)004:23: pan grub rgya mtsho'i gtsug rgyan slob dpon chen po
NK084(yu)004:24: sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa 'di la gsum ste
NK084(yu)004:28: dang po klad la gsum ste /
NK084(yu)004:33: zhi ba rin chen d+r+wa ba zhes bya ste /
NK084(yu)004:34: thugs chos nyid kyi ngang las dmigs pa med pa'i
NK084(yu)004:35: snying rje chen pos rtag tu zhi ba de yi
NK084(yu)004:36: ngang las rdo rje sems dpa' mi bskyod rgyal po
NK084(yu)004:37: la sogs pa longs spyod rdzogs pa chen po dang
NK084(yu)004:38: sprul pa'i skur snang ba de ni srid dang zhi
NK084(yu)004:39: bar nor bu rin po che ltar 'byung bar dkon
NK084(yu)004:40: pa sogs yon tan drug dang ldan zhing 'khor 'das
NK084(yu)004:41: kyi dpal yon thams cad de las 'byung ba dang
NK084(yu)004:42: / de'ang phyogs dus res 'ga' ba ma yin par
NK084(yu)004:43: brtan g.yo kun la khyab cing 'brel bas d+r+wa ba'am
NK084(yu)004:44: yang na thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i
NK084(yu)004:45: don gyis na d+r+wa ba zhes gsungs la zhes bya
NK084(yu)004:46: ba ni mtshan de skad 'dogs pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:47: de ltar mtshan bstan pa'i dgos pa ni dbang po
NK084(yu)004:48: rab kyis mtshan bstan pa tsam gyis dbu zhabs kyi
NK084(yu)004:49: don thams cad khong du chud pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:50: 'bring la mtshan gyi don bshad pas don gyi phyogs tsam khong du chud pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:51: tha mas kyang sman la kha byang gdags pa ltar glegs bam btsal sla ba'i dgos pa yod do //
NK084(yu)004:52: gnyis pa mchod par brjod pa'i phyag la ni gsum ste /
NK084(yu)004:56: dang po dgos pa'i don la gsum ste /
NK084(yu)004:57: man ngag rtsom pa la bar chad kyi bgegs zhi bar bya ba'i dgos pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:58: ya rabs dam pa dang tshul bstun pa'i sgo nas dad pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i dgos pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:59: yi dam gyi lha mi g.yel ba'i dgos pa yod pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:60: gnyis pa bsdus pa'i don ni bzhi ste /
NK084(yu)004:64: 'tshal ba la don ched ci yod do //
NK084(yu)004:65: de la yul gang la zhe na /
NK084(yu)004:66: dpal kun tu bzang po rgyal ba drug pa la'o //
NK084(yu)004:67: gang zag gang gis na sngon byung du slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:68: rjes 'jug tu bshad pa po rnams kyis so //
NK084(yu)004:69: tshul lam thabs ni lus gus pa dang ngag snyan
NK084(yu)004:70: pa dang sems dad pa dang bcas nas btsal ba'o
NK084(yu)004:71: // btsal ba'i dgos ched ni don gyi phyag btsal
NK084(yu)004:72: bas rig pa nyid kun tu bzang por rtogs pa'o
NK084(yu)004:73: // // tshig gi phyag btsal bas mchog dang thun mong gi rgyur 'gyur ba'i don no //
NK084(yu)004:74: gsum pa tshig gi don ni /
NK084(yu)004:75: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag /ye shes rgya mtsho rab zab thugs //
NK084(yu)004:77: rdo rje yid la phyag 'tshal te //
NK084(yu)004:79: 'di la gnyis te rgyud dang dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po ngos bzung ba dang /
NK084(yu)004:80: de'i che ba la sku lnga lhun grub tu bstan pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:81: dang po rgyud dang dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po ngos bzung ba la gsum ste /
NK084(yu)004:85: de dag ni rim pa bzhin du tshig rkang snga ma gcig dang /
NK084(yu)004:86: de nas rkang pa gnyis dang /
NK084(yu)004:87: phyi ma ni tshig rkang bzhi pas ston la /
NK084(yu)004:88: gnyis pa de'i che ba sku lnga ni tshig rkang dang pos chos sku dang /
NK084(yu)004:89: ye shes rgya mtsho sogs kyis longs sku dang /
NK084(yu)004:90: thugs kyis mngon par byang chub pa'i sku dang /
NK084(yu)004:91: gter gyis mi 'gyur rdo rje'i sku dang /
NK084(yu)004:92: dkyil 'khor gyis sprul pa'i sku ston pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:94: de ma nor bzhin ma bcos /
NK084(yu)004:95: de'i ngang du gshegs pa ni gnyis te /
NK084(yu)004:96: grol lam du gshegs pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:98: grol lam ni rang byung ye shes sku nyams su bstar ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:99: thabs lam du gshegs pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes sku nyams su bstar ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:100: kun gyi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyir bsdus pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:101: bdag ni chos nyid ye nas ma bcos ma bslad
NK084(yu)004:102: pa'i don ji lta bar rang gis mngon sum du
NK084(yu)004:103: byas pa ni dpal kun tu bzang po phyogs bcu
NK084(yu)004:104: dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
NK084(yu)004:105: nyid rgyal ba drug pa ste /
NK084(yu)004:106: dngos su mnyam pa nyid kyi chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin du gnas pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:108: grol lam rang byung gi ye shes chen po dang /
NK084(yu)004:109: thabs lam lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes so //
NK084(yu)004:110: de gnyis ji ltar bar rtogs pas na ye shes so //
NK084(yu)004:111: de'i dpe ni rgya mtsho ste gting dpag par dka' bas zab pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:112: de dang kun bzang gi thugs 'dra bas na thugs so //
NK084(yu)004:113: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rang byung
NK084(yu)004:114: gi ye shes ni rab tu zaba pa'i phyir gdul
NK084(yu)004:115: byas dpag par dka' ba ni dpe rgya mtsho lta
NK084(yu)004:116: bu'o / de ni longs spyod rdzogs sku 'byung ngo //
NK084(yu)004:117: thugsa yang dag pa'i ye shes de las ma g.yos
NK084(yu)004:118: par zhi ba dang khro bo'i dkyil 'akhara thams cad
NK084(yu)004:119: ma lus ma btsal bar gdul bya yi snang ba
NK084(yu)004:121: dper na yida bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gter dang 'dra'o //
NK084(yu)004:122: de yang zad mi shes shing 'dod dgur 'byung ba ni sprul pa'i sku'o //
NK084(yu)004:123: chos nyid 'dus ma byas pa yin pas thams cad
NK084(yu)004:124: du snang ba ni ma btsal ba'i phyir na rdo
NK084(yu)004:125: rje yid do // de yang rdo rje ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ste dal gyi gtso bo'o //
NK084(yu)004:126: yid ni kun tu bzang po ste rgyud kyi ston pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:127: la ni gzhi ste de gnyis yul du byas pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:128: phyag ni don dang tshig tu btsal ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:129: ste ni lhag ma can gyi tshig ste /
NK084(yu)004:130: rgyud kyi don bsdus snying po tsam zhig bshad par dam bca' ba dang 'brel ba yin no //
NK084(yu)004:131: gsum pa bshad par dam bca' ba la gsum ste /
NK084(yu)004:135: dgos pa'i don ni dam bcas pas gdul bya yal bar mi 'dor ba dang /
NK084(yu)004:136: bstan chos rtsom pa mthar phyin pa'i dgos pa yod do //
NK084(yu)004:137: bsdus pa'i don ni gang gis bshad /
NK084(yu)004:139: tshul lam thabs ji ltar bshad /
NK084(yu)004:140: bshad pa'i dgos pa ci yod pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:141: de yang gang gis bshad na sangs rgyas gsang bas bshad do //
NK084(yu)004:142: gang bshad na zhi ba rin chen d+r+wa ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:143: tshul lam thabs ni phyag 'tshal nas bshad par dam bca' ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:144: dgos pa ni bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po ma
NK084(yu)004:145: rig par rang gi rnam rtog gis bcings pa'i sems
NK084(yu)004:146: can rnams rang byung gi ye shes chen po rgyud
NK084(yu)004:147: la bskyed pa'i dgos pa yod /
NK084(yu)004:149: e ma ho bde gshegs snying po las /
NK084(yu)004:150: rang gi rnam rtog las kyis bcings //
NK084(yu)004:151: rang byung ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir //
NK084(yu)004:152: rgyud kyi don bsdus snying po brtsam //
NK084(yu)004:154: e ma'o ni ngom zhing ngo mtshar ba ste ngo
NK084(yu)004:155: gang la mtshar na sems can gyi sems nyid bde
NK084(yu)004:156: bar gshegsa pa'i snying pora gnas pa de ma rtogs
NK084(yu)004:157: par gnas pa de la ngo mtshar ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:158: de bas na khams gsum na gnas pa'i sems can
NK084(yu)004:159: la snying po byang chub kyi sems rang la rang
NK084(yu)004:160: chas su yod kyang nges pa'i shes pa ma skyes
NK084(yu)004:161: pa'i phyir de las 'khrul pa ni ngo mtshar te
NK084(yu)004:162: / snying po byang chub kyi sems ma rtogs pa nyid 'khor bar brgyud pa'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:163: zhes 'dis ni gzhi rig pa'i gnas thabs bstan la /
NK084(yu)004:164: brgyud pa'i rgyur gyur pa de kho na rang gi
NK084(yu)004:165: rnam rtog ste lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig pa
NK084(yu)004:166: zhes kyang bya'o // rgyu de la rkyen ni las
NK084(yu)004:167: dang nyon mongs pa gnyis kyi dbang gis rang gi
NK084(yu)004:168: rgyud bacangas nas 'bras bu 'gro ba rigs drug gi
NK084(yu)004:169: rtog pas bcings te thar pa'i dus med do zhes
NK084(yu)004:171: 'gro drug nas thar dus med pa de lta bu
NK084(yu)004:172: la rang byung ye shes kyi snang ba sngar ma
NK084(yu)004:173: skyes pa de bskyed pa ste bskyed pa'i phyir slob
NK084(yu)004:174: dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas rgyud gsang ba snying po'i
NK084(yu)004:175: don bsdus nas rtsom pa'o zhes 'bras bu'i ye shes
NK084(yu)004:177: ji ltar rtsom na rgyud kyi don zhes sbyar te
NK084(yu)004:178: rgyud ni dpal gsang ba'i snying po la de nyid
NK084(yu)004:187: bdun gyi don man ngag 'dir bsdus pas na man ngag gi snying po lta bu'o //
NK084(yu)004:188: de bas na rgyud don gyi man ngag 'dir bsdus
NK084(yu)004:189: nas snying po brtsams so zhes rang bzo spangs pa'i
NK084(yu)004:190: phyir bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi khungs bstan pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:191: gnyis pa gzhung gi don la gsum ste /
NK084(yu)004:192: dang po sngon du bya ba'i las dang /
NK084(yu)004:193: bar du ting nge 'dzin sgom pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:195: dang po sngon du bya ba'i las la drug ste /
NK084(yu)004:197: snod ngan la byin pa'i skyon dang /
NK084(yu)004:198: mnyam pa'i dam tshig bsrung ba dang /
NK084(yu)004:199: dngos grub sems yin pas logs na med pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:200: mnyam bzhag bsgoms pa las 'bras bu 'byung ba dpes bstan pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:203: thos bsam bsgoms la rab sbyangs pa'i //
NK084(yu)004:204: shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis bzung //
NK084(yu)004:205: snod ldan ngang tshul bzang la bstan //
NK084(yu)004:206: lus dang longs spyod gtong la sbyin //
NK084(yu)004:207: zhes gsungs te gzhi rig pa'i gnas thabs bstan pa
NK084(yu)004:208: ni so so skye bo rig pa'i rtsal sbyong na
NK084(yu)004:209: shes rab rnam pa gsung ni sgra dang don yul
NK084(yu)004:210: du byas pa las skye ba yin te /
NK084(yu)004:211: de yang sgra yul du byas pa las thos pa'i shes rab skye ba dang /
NK084(yu)004:212: sgra don gnyis ka yul du byas pa las bsam pa'i shes rab skye ba dang /
NK084(yu)004:213: sgra spangs nas don 'ba' zhig yul du byas pa las sgoom pa'i shes rab skye'o //
NK084(yu)004:214: de'i dus su snod kyi skyon bzhi spangs te /
NK084(yu)004:219: de bas na dang po thos pa'i shes rab /
NK084(yu)004:220: bar du bsam pa'i shes rab /
NK084(yu)004:221: tha mar sgom pa'i shes rab ste thos bsam sgom gsum la blo rab tu sbyangs pa'i zhes pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:222: sngon du theg pa 'og ma la blo sbyang bar
NK084(yu)004:223: bstan pa ni de ltar shes rab gsu ma gyis
NK084(yu)004:224: thun mong gi theg pa la tshe snga ma'am sngon
NK084(yu)004:225: du blo sbyangs bas dus da lta shes rab kyi
NK084(yu)004:226: miga dang ldan pa'am blo mchog tu gyur pa de
NK084(yu)004:227: lta bu'i gang zag rnams kyis 'di zung zhig /de
NK084(yu)004:228: ma yin pa'i gzhan sbyangs pa sngon du ma song
NK084(yu)004:229: ba dang shes rab dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis
NK084(yu)004:231: de bas na snod ldan ngang tshul bzang la bstan zhes bya'o //
NK084(yu)004:232: de rnams ni sbyangs pa'i yon tan no //
NK084(yu)004:233: sbyangs pa can gyi gang zag de nyid snod dang ldan par bstan pa ni /
NK084(yu)004:234: de ltar snod dang ldan par gyur pa de ni
NK084(yu)004:235: ngang ring ba chu bo'i rgyun lta bu ste bzod
NK084(yu)004:236: pa khyad par can thob pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:237: tshul zhi ba dge slong gsar pa lta bu ste
NK084(yu)004:238: tho co dang bab col gyi spyod pa spangs pa
NK084(yu)004:239: dang / rang bzhin gyis bzang ba nyi ma lta
NK084(yu)004:240: bu ste sems can la snying rje chen po dang
NK084(yu)004:241: ldan pas phyogs su 'dzin pa thams cad spangs pa
NK084(yu)004:242: dang / dang / rigs brtan pas ri bo lta
NK084(yu)004:243: bu ste gsang ba'i theg pa'i sgor zhugs nas phyis
NK084(yu)004:244: theg pa dman pa la mi ldog pa de lta
NK084(yu)004:245: bu la chos bstan par bya'o //
NK084(yu)004:246: de rnams ni rang bzhin gyi yon tan yin no //
NK084(yu)004:247: spyir na bla ma mnyes pa'i yo byad gsum ste /
NK084(yu)004:248: rab shes rab kyis mnyes pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:250: tha ma longs spyod kyis mnyes pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:251: rab ni theg pa 'og ma pa la blo sbyangs pas shes rab kyi spyan dang ldan pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:252: 'bring ni bla ma la lus srog 'bul ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:253: tha ma ni bla ma la nor 'bul ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:254: mdor na mched lcam dang slob dpon gyi don du
NK084(yu)004:255: rang gi lus dang longas spyod gtong nus pa ste
NK084(yu)004:256: / de lta bu'i gang zag la man ngag 'di sbyin no //
NK084(yu)004:257: des kyang bla ma mnyes pa'i yon 'bul lo //
NK084(yu)004:259: slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing //
NK084(yu)004:260: dbang rnams thob par ma byas na //
NK084(yu)004:261: nyan pa la sogs brtson pa rnams //
NK084(yu)004:263: zhes gsungs te 'dir tshig rkang dang pos dbang sgo yon gyis 'byed pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:264: gnyis pas chos sgo dbang gis 'byed pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:265: gsum pas dbang rim par nod pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:266: bzhi pas de rnams ma byas na skyon che bar
NK084(yu)004:267: bstan pa rnams rim pa bzhin du phyir slob dpon
NK084(yu)004:268: la drug ste spyi'i slob dpon dang /
NK084(yu)004:270: dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon dang //
NK084(yu)004:271: nyams chag skong ba'i slob dpon dang //
NK084(yu)004:272: shes rgyud 'grol ba'i slob dpon dang //
NK084(yu)004:273: man ngag lung gi slob dpon las 'dir rdo rje
NK084(yu)004:274: slob dpon de la rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus
NK084(yu)004:275: ngag yid gsum rdzas dang yo byad shes rab rnam
NK084(yu)004:276: pa gsum gyis mnyes par ma byas shing /
NK084(yu)004:277: dbang rnams ni dbang bco brgyad de phyi'i dbang bcu ni phan dbang dang /
NK084(yu)004:278: nang dbang ni nus pa'i dbang lnga dang /
NK084(yu)004:279: gsang ba'i dbang ni zab mo'i dbang gsum ste dbang
NK084(yu)004:280: bco brgyad po rim par thaba par ma byas na
NK084(yu)004:281: dbang ma thob par gsang ba bla na med pa'i
NK084(yu)004:282: don la nyan pa dang 'chad pa dang 'phrin las
NK084(yu)004:284: gzhan gyi slob dpon byed pa la sogs par brtson
NK084(yu)004:285: pa rnams ni gsang sngags la ras chod dang gzu
NK084(yu)004:286: lums su 'gro bas dbang thob pa ces kyang rab
NK084(yu)004:288: gzhan du dang por bla ma mnyes par ma byas /
NK084(yu)004:290: tha mar ras chod dang gzu lum su byas pas
NK084(yu)004:291: ni tshe 'dir byas pa rnams ni 'bras bu med
NK084(yu)004:292: cing phyi ma la byas pa chud zos te bka'
NK084(yu)004:293: bzhin du ma spyad pas 'bras bu ngan song du
NK084(yu)004:294: skye zhing brlag par 'gyur bas na bde gshegs snying
NK084(yu)004:296: de bas na shin tu skyon che bar bstan pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:297: de ltar skyon che ba de bas na 'bras bu
NK084(yu)004:298: chos sku thob bar 'dod rkyen bsgom bsgrub la rags
NK084(yu)004:299: las // de chos sgo la rags las chos sgo
NK084(yu)004:300: dbang gis 'byed dbang sgo yon gyis bslu bas na
NK084(yu)004:301: las // / dang po slob dpon mnyes par bya
NK084(yu)004:302: de mnyes na dbang thob dbang thob nas nyan bshad
NK084(yu)004:303: mthar dbyung de mthar phyin pas 'bras bu mchog dang
NK084(yu)004:306: slob dpon mnyes par rab byas nas //
NK084(yu)004:307: dbang rnams thob par gyur pa ni //
NK084(yu)004:308: nyan pa la sogs brtsams pa rnams //
NK084(yu)004:312: mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba yis //
NK084(yu)004:313: mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas basngagasa //
NK084(yu)004:314: mnyam rdzogs chen po thob par 'gyur //
NK084(yu)004:315: 'das na sangs rgyas ma yin no //
NK084(yu)004:317: mnyam pa'i don la gsum ste don dam par ma
NK084(yu)004:318: skyes par mnyam pa dang kun rdzob sgyu mar mnyam
NK084(yu)004:319: pa dang don dam kun rdzob dbyer med du mnyam
NK084(yu)004:320: pa'o // dang po ni chos thams cad ye shes
NK084(yu)004:321: kyi rang bzhin te thog ma nas chos thams cad
NK084(yu)004:323: gnyis pa ni kun rdzob tu phung po lnga rigs lnga mnyam /
NK084(yu)004:325: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad sems dpa' sems mar mnyam /
NK084(yu)004:326: lus kyi reg bya bzhi sgo bar mnyam /
NK084(yu)004:327: nyon mongs pa drug thub par mnyam pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:328: gsum pa ni kun rdzob don dam ngo bo gcig
NK084(yu)004:329: par mnyam par sbyor ba ste lta ba bden pa
NK084(yu)004:330: dbyer med / rig pa spyod yul dang bral ba /
NK084(yu)004:331: skor bdun ngo bo nyid kyi rgyur lhun gyis grub nas gnas so //
NK084(yu)004:332: de yis mnyam pa'i ngo bo bstan pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:333: de ltar chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs
NK084(yu)004:334: pa'i rang bzhin las mi 'da' bar dus gsum du
NK084(yu)004:335: gnas na rang bzhin lta ba'i dam tshig ste 'bras
NK084(yu)004:336: bu de nyid mngon du byed par basngagasa so //
NK084(yu)004:338: dam tshig dam tshig ces bya ba //
NK084(yu)004:339: gud na yod pa ma yin te //
NK084(yu)004:340: rang gi lta ba dam tshig yin //
NK084(yu)004:342: de'i mnyam pa'i dgos pa bstan no //
NK084(yu)004:343: don dam skye med du mnyam kun rdzob sgyu mar
NK084(yu)004:344: mnyam de gnyis dbyer med du mnyam par rdzogs pa
NK084(yu)004:345: de la ni chen po zhes bya ste /
NK084(yu)004:346: de lta bu'i mnyam rdzogs chen po'i lta ba la
NK084(yu)004:347: gnas na rten gyi gang zag gis tshe 'di nyid
NK084(yu)004:348: la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa thob par
NK084(yu)004:349: 'gyur ro zhes mnyam pa'i yon tan bstan pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:350: de lta bu'i dam tshig las 'das na yang dag
NK084(yu)004:351: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin no zhes bya
NK084(yu)004:352: ste chos thams cad mnyam pa chen por ma shes
NK084(yu)004:353: te theg pa 'og ma ltar don dam kun rdzob
NK084(yu)004:354: tha dad du mar 'dzin pa ni de las 'das
NK084(yu)004:355: pa'o // de bas na tha dad kyi gnyis 'dzin
NK084(yu)004:356: gyis sangs rgyas thob par mi 'gyur ro zhes mnyam
NK084(yu)004:357: pa ma rtogs pa'i skyon bstan pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:358: des na mnyam pa chen po'i lta bas thag chod pa bya ba gal che'o //
NK084(yu)004:360: dus bzhi phyogs bcu gang nas kyang //
NK084(yu)004:361: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur //
NK084(yu)004:362: sems nyid rtogs na sangs rgyas pas //
NK084(yu)004:363: sangs rgyas gzhan du ma tshol cig /ces gsungs /
NK084(yu)004:364: de la gnas gang nas btsal na dus dang phyogs kun nas te /
NK084(yu)004:365: de yang dus bzhi ni rgyu rkyen 'tshogs nas 'bras bu spyad zin pa ni 'das pa'i dus /
NK084(yu)004:366: rgyu rkyen 'tshogs pa las 'bras bu ma spyad pa ni da lta ba /
NK084(yu)004:367: rgyu tsam yod pa ni 'byung bar ma nges pa'i dus /
NK084(yu)004:368: rgyu rkyen gang yang ma 'tshogs pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus so //
NK084(yu)004:369: phyogs bcu ni gnas pa rang bzhin gyi phyogs bcu dang /
NK084(yu)004:370: sgrub pa po dmigs pas bzung ba'i phyogs bcu'o //
NK084(yu)004:371: de ltar phyogs dang dus kyis bsdus pa gang nas
NK084(yu)004:372: kyang ngo bo gang btsal na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
NK084(yu)004:373: te de nyid gzhan nas btsal kyang yang dag par
NK084(yu)004:374: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu zhig mi rnyed
NK084(yu)004:375: do // des na gang las btsal zhe na rang gi sems las btsal lo //
NK084(yu)004:376: btsal ba'i thabs ji ltar btsal na rang gi sems
NK084(yu)004:377: nyid rig pa byang chub kyi sems ni ye nas
NK084(yu)004:378: 'bras bu chos kyi sku'i ngo bo yin te de'i
NK084(yu)004:379: don rtogs pa mngon du gyur pa la 'bras bu
NK084(yu)004:380: thob ces gdags kyis de las gzhan du sangs rgyas
NK084(yu)004:381: ma tshol cig /mnyam pa ma rtogs pa'i skyon ni
NK084(yu)004:382: rang rig pa de las ma gtogs pa med pa
NK084(yu)004:383: la rig pa de las sangs rgyas gzhan du tshol
NK084(yu)004:384: na ni rgya mtsho'i ngos nas song ste smig rgyu'i
NK084(yu)004:386: de mi rnyed pa'i phyir na de las ma gtogs pa med pas ma tshol cig ces gdams so //
NK084(yu)004:388: gang zhig glang chen myos 'dra'i sems //
NK084(yu)004:389: mnyam par bzhag pas btul nas su //
NK084(yu)004:390: sngags dang phyag rgya rab brtan na //
NK084(yu)004:391: dngos grub ya mtshan chen por 'gyur //
NK084(yu)004:393: dper na glang po che smyon pa 'dul ba'i dus na /
NK084(yu)004:394: skyes bu gos dmar po gyon dbyangs snyan pa blangs
NK084(yu)004:395: nas lag pa g.yon du spos dud thogs g.yas su
NK084(yu)004:396: lcags kyu thogs nas glang khrid de rtsar byung tsa
NK084(yu)004:397: na lcags kyus glang sna nas bzung nas 'bras chang
NK084(yu)004:398: blud pas glang myos pa la dmag mang po bzhon
NK084(yu)004:399: nas btul te / de thul tsam na gzhan gyi dmag dpung 'joms pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:400: dpe de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa gang zhig gi
NK084(yu)004:401: 'khrul pa'i sems ni glang po che smyon pa dang
NK084(yu)004:403: sngags dang phyag rgyas mnyam par bzhag /ces pa ltar
NK084(yu)004:404: bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag lcags kyu dang 'dra
NK084(yu)004:405: bas bzung nas chos nyid rnam par mi rtog pa'i
NK084(yu)004:406: ngang la blo mnyam par bzhag pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:407: gzung 'dzin gyi rnam par rtog pa de dag btul
NK084(yu)004:408: nasa su sems dang ye shes kyi phyag rgyas thams
NK084(yu)004:410: de yang rgyu ma nor ba rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bskyed pa'i rgyu byed /
NK084(yu)004:411: bskyed pa rkyen gyi sngags kyis gsal bar byed pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:412: bzlas pa las kyi sngags kyis brtan par byed pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:413: sngags de gsum gyis lha'i sku gsal ba de la
NK084(yu)004:414: ni phyag rgya chen po bzhi dang ldan pa zhes
NK084(yu)004:415: pa ste dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
NK084(yu)004:418: sku phyag chen po rab tu brtan na thun mong gi dngos grub dang /
NK084(yu)004:420: ya mtshan chen po la sogs pa'i yon tan thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
NK084(yu)004:422: dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs su //
NK084(yu)004:423: tsan dan nags dang me tog tshal //
NK084(yu)004:424: yid 'ong bkra shis nyams dga' ba'i //
NK084(yu)004:425: bdag dbang bar chad med pa'i gnas //
NK084(yu)004:427: spyir gnas la gsum ste phyi'i gnas dang /
NK084(yu)004:430: phyi'i gnas la gnyis te tshul shis pa'i gnas dang tshul dang mthun pa'i gnas so //
NK084(yu)004:431: tshul shis pa'i gnas ni gsum ste dang po bde
NK084(yu)004:432: bar gshegs pa'i zhabs kyis bcags shing byin gyis brlabs
NK084(yu)004:433: pa'i gnas rgya gar rdo rje gdan dang ri ma
NK084(yu)004:434: la ya dang 'phags pa shing kun la sogs pa
NK084(yu)004:436: dang po grub pa thob pas bkra shis pa'i gnas ni li yul lcang ra smug po'am /
NK084(yu)004:438: lho brag mkhar chu lta bu'o //
NK084(yu)004:439: de lta bu rnal 'byor pas grub pa thob pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:440: gsum pa ni rang yid du 'ong bas nyams dga' ba'i gnas so //
NK084(yu)004:441: tshul dang mthun pa'i gnas ni zhi ba'i dgon gnas dang /
NK084(yu)004:445: lhun grub kun 'byung gi gnas so //
NK084(yu)004:446: nang gi gnas ni rang gi rig pas ngo shes te nyams dga' ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:447: gsang ba'i gnas ni yum mtshan ldan no //
NK084(yu)004:448: de la 'dir bsgrub pa'i gnas kyi ring thung gi
NK084(yu)004:449: tshad ni dgon pa ste grong yul las dpag tshad
NK084(yu)004:450: dang rgyang grags kyis ring bar gyur pa ste /
NK084(yu)004:451: de'i dgos pa ni bsam gtan gyi dgra mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
NK084(yu)004:452: de bas na chen po zhes so //
NK084(yu)004:453: dgon pa chen po ni yum la zer ba yang yod do //
NK084(yu)004:454: gzhan ma rang gi gnas skabs su ngos bzung ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:455: de ni phyi'i gnas gtso che ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:456: gnas der sa gzhi brtags pa ni gnam 'khor lo
NK084(yu)004:457: rtsibs brgyad 'dra ba sa gzhi pad+ma 'dab brgyad 'dra
NK084(yu)004:458: ba / sa snum la bkrag chags pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:459: gnas der phyogs brtags pa ni shar 'jams pa /
NK084(yu)004:463: de bas na sa phyogs su zhes pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:464: gnas kyi dbyibs bstan pa ni sa phyogs der sngon
NK084(yu)004:465: bkra shis pa'i gnas tsan dan gyi nags tshal dang
NK084(yu)004:466: / mdun na me tog gi gling chags pa ste bkra shis pa'i yan lag go //
NK084(yu)004:467: de rnams ni sngar smos pa ltar rnal 'byor bas
NK084(yu)004:468: yid du 'ong zhing bkra shis pa 'phral nyams dga'
NK084(yu)004:469: ba'i gnas te / des gnas kyi rang bzhin bstan pa yin no //
NK084(yu)004:470: gnas de bdag gi dbang du byed pa'i phyir sa
NK084(yu)004:471: slang ba ni snang ba dang mi snang ba la
NK084(yu)004:472: rin stsal la bdag gi dbang du bya ba dang
NK084(yu)004:473: gnas der ha cang thag ring na rdzas kyi bar
NK084(yu)004:474: chad 'byung / g.yel na dgra'i bar chad 'byung /
NK084(yu)004:475: lha 'dre'i lam chod na bgegs kyi bar chad 'byung
NK084(yu)004:476: bas na bkra shis la yid du 'ong ba phyi
NK084(yu)004:477: nang gi bar chad gang yang mi 'byung ba'i gnas
NK084(yu)004:478: btsal bar bya'o zhes gnas kyi skyon bsal bar bstan
NK084(yu)004:479: pa'o // gnyis pa bar du ting nge 'dzin sgom pa la gsum ste /
NK084(yu)004:480: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:481: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drang ba la sogs pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:483: dang po ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor la bzhi ste /
NK084(yu)004:484: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:485: ting nge 'dzin gsum sgom pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:488: dang po sems bskyed pa la gnyis te /
NK084(yu)004:490: sems ye shes lngar bskyed pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:492: bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams //
NK084(yu)004:493: ye nas sangs rgyas yin mod kyang //
NK084(yu)004:494: rtog pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba las //
NK084(yu)004:495: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do //
NK084(yu)004:497: spyir na sems bskyed pa la gnyis te /
NK084(yu)004:498: kun rdzob byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:499: don dam byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:500: kun rdzob byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa ni /
NK084(yu)004:501: smon pa 'bras bur sems bskyed pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:503: don dam byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa ni /
NK084(yu)004:504: gnas pa byang chub kyi sems dang /
NK084(yu)004:505: brtan pa byang chub kyi sems dang /
NK084(yu)004:506: mthar phyin pa byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:507: 'dir ni kun rdzob gzhan las khyad par du byas pas na byang chub mchog tu bskyed /
NK084(yu)004:508: don dam pa 'og gsal mngon du byas pas na ye shes lngar sems bskyed pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:509: 'di lnga don dam kun rdzob dbyer med ston par
NK084(yu)004:510: 'dug pas 'doms so zhe na brtsam gzhi so so
NK084(yu)004:511: las brtsam bya tha dad par dang /
NK084(yu)004:512: brjod bya so so la don so sor ston pa'i tshig yin no //
NK084(yu)004:513: de la 'dir gang gis sems bskyed na sgrub pa
NK084(yu)004:514: pos bdag rang dang bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtha'
NK084(yu)004:515: yas pa'i sems can 'gro ba drug gis bsdus pa
NK084(yu)004:517: de rnams ye thog ma nyid nas sku lnga ye
NK084(yu)004:518: shes lngar sangs rgyas pa yin mod kyang zhe'am yang
NK084(yu)004:519: na rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas gcig
NK084(yu)004:520: yin kyang de ltar ma rtogs pa'i dbang gis bud+d+ha
NK084(yu)004:521: yin kyang ngo ma shes pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:522: de la tshul ji ltar sems bskyed na de ltar
NK084(yu)004:523: ma rtogs pas bdag dang bdag gir rtog pa'i dbang
NK084(yu)004:524: gis 'khor ba mtho dman du 'khor ba las da
NK084(yu)004:525: ltar nyid du sku lnga ye shes lngar sangs rgyas
NK084(yu)004:527: dgos pa gang gi phyir sems bskyed na bdag kyang
NK084(yu)004:528: khams gsum las thar bar bya ba dang bdag nyid
NK084(yu)004:529: thar nas kyang sems can thar bar bya'o zhes byang
NK084(yu)004:530: chub mchog tu ngo bo gang bskyed na sku lnga
NK084(yu)004:531: ye shes lngar sangs rgyas pa yin par rtogs par
NK084(yu)004:532: sems bskyed do // gnyis pa la lnga las chos
NK084(yu)004:533: kyi sku dang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes su
NK084(yu)004:534: sems bskyed par bstan pa ni /
NK084(yu)004:535: e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos //
NK084(yu)004:536: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //
NK084(yu)004:537: skye ba med las thams cad skyes //
NK084(yu)004:538: skyes pa nyid na skye ba med //
NK084(yu)004:540: e ma'o ni ngom pa ste de yang gang la
NK084(yu)004:541: ngom na chos thams cad sku lnga ye shes lnga'i
NK084(yu)004:542: rang bzhin du sangs rgyas pa yin pa la sems
NK084(yu)004:543: can rnams kyis de ltar ma rtogs pa la ngom
NK084(yu)004:545: rmad kyi chos ni tshig ngo mtshar can las don rmad du byung ba'i don ston pa la bya'o //
NK084(yu)004:546: chos de gang gis gsungs na rgyu bsod nams dang
NK084(yu)004:547: 'bras bu ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
NK084(yu)004:548: sku lnga ye shes lngar lhun gyis grub pa des
NK084(yu)004:549: gsungs la sangs rgyas nyid kyi thugs kyi brnag bya
NK084(yu)004:550: yang 'di yin pas na gsang ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:551: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin ni
NK084(yu)004:552: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo stong zhing bdag med
NK084(yu)004:553: pa de la rgyu gang las skye ba med pa'o
NK084(yu)004:554: // de ltar don dam par rgyu las skye ba
NK084(yu)004:555: med pas kun rdzob tu chos thams cad rgyu las
NK084(yu)004:557: de ltar kun rdzob tu skyes pa ltar snang ba'i
NK084(yu)004:558: dus nyid na don dam par ma skyes pa'i ngang
NK084(yu)004:559: las ma g.yos pa ni stong pa nyid kyi ye
NK084(yu)004:560: shes dang chos kyi skur sems bskyed pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:561: gnyis pa me long lta bu'i ye shes dang longs skur sems bskyed pa ni /
NK084(yu)004:562: e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos //
NK084(yu)004:563: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //
NK084(yu)004:567: e ma'o ni ngom zhing ngo mtshar ba ste ngo
NK084(yu)004:568: gang la mtshar na rang sems stong pa skye med
NK084(yu)004:569: du gtan la 'bebs pa'i de kho na la ngo
NK084(yu)004:570: mtshar / de gang gi chos lugs yin na gsang
NK084(yu)004:571: ba rmada du byung ba ma h+aa yo ga'i chos
NK084(yu)004:572: mtshar / / de gang gi gsung yin na rdzogs
NK084(yu)004:573: pa'i sangs rgyas dpal kun tu bzang po rgyal ba
NK084(yu)004:574: drug pa'i gsung blo dman dang theg pa 'og ma
NK084(yu)004:575: ba'i spyod yul du ma gyur pas na gsang ba'o
NK084(yu)004:576: mtshar / / // chos thams cad gsal la rtog
NK084(yu)004:577: pa med pa'am gsal la 'gag pa med pa yin
NK084(yu)004:578: pa de lasa ma g.yos bzhin du chos thams cad
NK084(yu)004:579: kyi skyon du gyur pa 'gag pa ltar snang ngo
NK084(yu)004:580: mtshar / / // // de ltar kun rdzob tu
NK084(yu)004:581: 'gagsa pa ltar snang ba'i dus nyid na don dam
NK084(yu)004:582: par 'gags pa ci yang med do //
NK084(yu)004:583: de ltar rtogs pa ni me long lta bu'i ye
NK084(yu)004:584: shes dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur sems bskyed pa
NK084(yu)004:585: yin no // gsum pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye
NK084(yu)004:586: shes dang mngon par byang chub pa'i skur sems bskyed
NK084(yu)004:587: yin no // pa ni / e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos //
NK084(yu)004:588: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //
NK084(yu)004:589: gnas pa med las thams cad gnas //
NK084(yu)004:590: gnas pa nyid na gnas pa med //
NK084(yu)004:592: e ma'o ni ngom zhing ngo mtshar ba ste gang
NK084(yu)004:593: la ngo mtshar na rang sems mnyam pa nyid chen
NK084(yu)004:594: por ston pas ngo mtshar ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:595: de gang gi chos lugs yin na gsang ba rmad du byung ba sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i chos /
NK084(yu)004:596: de gang gi gsung yin na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:597: chos nyid don dam par gzung ba dang 'dzin pa
NK084(yu)004:598: med par gnas pa yin pa la kun rdzob tu
NK084(yu)004:599: chos thams cad gzung 'dzin gyis gnas pa ltar snang
NK084(yu)004:600: yang snang ba'o // de ltar kun rdzob tu gnas
NK084(yu)004:601: pa ltar snang ba'i dus nyid na don dam par
NK084(yu)004:602: gnas pa med de de nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi
NK084(yu)004:603: ye shes dang ngo bo nyid kyi skur sems bskyed
NK084(yu)004:604: yang snang ba'o // pa yin no // bzhi pa
NK084(yu)004:605: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang sprul skur sems
NK084(yu)004:606: yang snang ba'o // pa yin no // bskyed pa ni / e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos //
NK084(yu)004:607: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //
NK084(yu)004:608: dmigs pa med las thams cad dmigs //
NK084(yu)004:609: dmigs pa nyid na dmigs pa med //
NK084(yu)004:611: e ma'o ngom zhing ngo mtshar ba ste de yang
NK084(yu)004:612: ngo gang la mtshar na rang sems ye shes su
NK084(yu)004:614: de gang gi chos yin na ma h+aa yo ga'i 'o //
NK084(yu)004:615: de gang gi gsung yin na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po'i gsung ngo //
NK084(yu)004:616: chos thams cad rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid ma 'dres
NK084(yu)004:617: par mkhyen la rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid don dam
NK084(yu)004:619: de las ma g.yos bzhin du chos thams cad kun
NK084(yu)004:620: rdzob tu dmigs par shar nas snang ba yin no
NK084(yu)004:621: // de ltar kun rdzob tu dmigs pa'i dus nyid
NK084(yu)004:622: na don dam par dmigs pa med pa las ma
NK084(yu)004:623: g.yos pa de ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes
NK084(yu)004:624: dang sprul pa'i skur sems bskyed pa yin no //
NK084(yu)004:625: lnga pa bya ba grub pa'i ye shes dang rdo rje'i skur sems bskyed par bstan pa ni /
NK084(yu)004:626: e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos //
NK084(yu)004:627: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //
NK084(yu)004:631: e ma'o ni ngom zhing ngo mtshar ba ste ngo
NK084(yu)004:632: gang la mtshar na rang sems ye shes su rtogs
NK084(yu)004:633: pa la'o // de ni gsang ba ma h+aa yo ga'i chos yin no //
NK084(yu)004:634: 'khor 'das sems nyid du rdzogs pas na rdzogs pa'i
NK084(yu)004:635: lta ba ngan pa'i dri ma dang bral bas sangs
NK084(yu)004:636: la ye shes mtha' dbus med par rgyas pas na
NK084(yu)004:637: rgyas phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag
NK084(yu)004:638: po yin pas na kun gyis rtogs par dka' bas
NK084(yu)004:639: na gasnga ngo // bya ba grub pa'i ye shes
NK084(yu)004:640: kyis bdag dang gzhan gyi don thams cad grub cing
NK084(yu)004:641: mthar phyin par mdzad kyang don dam par bdag dang
NK084(yu)004:642: gzhan gyi don la sprul pa phar 'gro ba dang
NK084(yu)004:644: kun rdzob tu sprul pa phar 'gro ba dang tshur 'ang bar snang ngo //
NK084(yu)004:645: de ltar rtogs tsam nyid na don dam par 'gra
NK084(yu)004:646: 'onga meda pa ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye
NK084(yu)004:647: shes dang rdo rje'i skur sems bskyed pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:648: gnyis pa ting nge 'dzin la bzhi ste /
NK084(yu)004:649: ting nge 'dzin gyi dgos pa dpes bstan pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:654: bsgrub pa'i gtsor ni ting 'dzin pas //
NK084(yu)004:656: gser 'gyur sman dang mun sel bzhin //
NK084(yu)004:657: rtog pa'i dbang bsgyur ting 'dzin yin //
NK084(yu)004:658: de phyir ting 'dzin rim par bsgom //
NK084(yu)004:659: zhes gsung ste thun mong gi bsgrub pa dang thun
NK084(yu)004:660: mong ma yin pa'i bsgrub pa las gtso bor gang
NK084(yu)004:661: byed kyang ti nga nge 'dzin med na 'bras bu
NK084(yu)004:662: mi 'byung bas de'i phyir gtso bor ting nge 'dzina
NK084(yu)004:663: kho na basngagasa pa yin pas so //
NK084(yu)004:664: de bas na mchog dang thun mong gi sgrub thabs
NK084(yu)004:665: thams cad ting 'dzin 'ad yis byed par 'gyur ba
NK084(yu)004:666: yin pas na ting nge 'dzin 'di dang ldan pas
NK084(yu)004:667: thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba yin no //
NK084(yu)004:668: dper na lcags la gsera 'gyur gyi rtsi btang na lcags gser du 'gyur ba dang /
NK084(yu)004:669: dug la sman ma ki ta btab na dug sman
NK084(yu)004:670: du 'gyur ba dang mun pa la sgron ma byung
NK084(yu)004:671: na mun pa sela ba'i dpe de bzhina du chos
NK084(yu)004:672: nyid rnam par mi rtog pa de bzhin nyid kyi
NK084(yu)004:673: ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pas rtog pa thams cad chos
NK084(yu)004:674: nyid du 'gyur / ye shes sgyu ma'i ting nge
NK084(yu)004:675: 'dzin thams cad du kun tu snang bar bsgoms pas
NK084(yu)004:676: phyogs gcig pa'i mun pa sel /
NK084(yu)004:677: sku dang ye shes dbyer med phyag rgya rgyu ting
NK084(yu)004:678: du bsgoms pas phung po khams dang skye mched gnas
NK084(yu)004:679: 'gyur ba'o // de ltar ting 'dzin gtso bo'i phyir
NK084(yu)004:680: na de ting la sogs pa gong ma rnams gsal
NK084(yu)004:681: ba'i steng la 'og ma rim par sgom mo //
NK084(yu)004:682: de ltar mdor na tshig rkang lngas bsgrub pa'i gtso
NK084(yu)004:683: bo gang yin dang dbang ji ltar bsgyur ba dang
NK084(yu)004:684: dpe gang gis mtshon pa dang dgos pa ci yod
NK084(yu)004:685: pa dang gtan tshigs kyis gdab pa rnams go rim
NK084(yu)004:687: gnyis pa de bzhin nyid kyi ting 'dzin ni /
NK084(yu)004:688: dngos rnams nyid na dngos med pas //
NK084(yu)004:689: rtog pa'i smra bsam yul las 'das //
NK084(yu)004:690: de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te //
NK084(yu)004:691: de phyir dngos po dngos med do //
NK084(yu)004:693: dang po de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la
NK084(yu)004:694: drug ste sbyang bya ni shi ba rnam rtog med
NK084(yu)004:695: pas so // sbyong byed ni de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin no //
NK084(yu)004:696: ngo bo ni stong pa chen po'o //
NK084(yu)004:697: rnam grangs ni ma nor ba'i de bzhin nyid /
NK084(yu)004:698: ma bcos pa'i de bzhin nyid /
NK084(yu)004:699: dngos po med pa'i de bzhin nyid /
NK084(yu)004:700: gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
NK084(yu)004:701: sgom thabs ni stong pa nyid mtha' brgyad dang bral ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:702: 'bras bu ni chos kyi sku thob pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:703: de yang phyi nang snod bcud kyi dngos po sna
NK084(yu)004:704: tshogs su snang ba 'di rnams gzhan ma yin te
NK084(yu)004:705: rig pa byang chub kyi sems nyid rang snang ba'o
NK084(yu)004:706: // byang chub kyi sems nyid snang ba'i dus nyid
NK084(yu)004:707: na rang gi ngo bo cir yang ma grub pas
NK084(yu)004:708: snang ba'i dngos por med pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:709: dper na mtshal dmar na khu ba yang dmar ba
NK084(yu)004:710: ltar dngos po'i rtog pa ma grub pa'i phyir na
NK084(yu)004:711: dngos 'dzin smra bsam med de don sems nyid la
NK084(yu)004:712: rtog pa dang tha snyad thams cad rang bzhin gyis
NK084(yu)004:713: bral ba ni 'dzin pa'i yul las 'adsa pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:714: ma nor ba'i de bzhin nyid dngos po med pas chos kyi dbyings /
NK084(yu)004:715: ma bcos pa yin pas ye shes de thams cad
NK084(yu)004:716: du khyab par gnas pa yin pas na mthar dang
NK084(yu)004:717: dbus med de chos kyi dbyings so //
NK084(yu)004:718: de yi phyir na dngos pora snang ba nyid dngos po med pa nyid do //
NK084(yu)004:719: gsum pa kun snang gi ting nge 'dzin ni /
NK084(yu)004:720: de bzhin nyid ni spros med kyang //
NK084(yu)004:721: rang bzhin kun tu snang ba'i phyir //
NK084(yu)004:722: sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir //
NK084(yu)004:723: nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bsgom //
NK084(yu)004:725: kun snang gi ting nge 'dzin la drug las /
NK084(yu)004:726: sbyang bya ni bar do'i snang ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:727: sbyong byed ni kun du snang ngo //
NK084(yu)004:728: ngo bo ni ye shes sgyu ma'o //
NK084(yu)004:729: rnam grangs ni kun tu snang zhes bya /
NK084(yu)004:730: ye shes sgyu ma zhes bya /
NK084(yu)004:731: mtshams sbyor chen po'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:732: bsgom pa'i thabs ni ma h+aa yo ga chos nyid ye shes sgyu ma bsgom la /
NK084(yu)004:733: a nu yo ga ba rang gi smin mtshams su
NK084(yu)004:734: 'od dmar smug tshon gang ba las 'od 'phros pas
NK084(yu)004:735: 'jig rten thams cad 'od kyis khengs par bsgom mo
NK084(yu)004:736: // 'dir ni chos nyid ye shes sgyu mar bsgom pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:737: 'bras bu ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku 'thob pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:738: de la de bzhin nyid ni spros pa med pas
NK084(yu)004:739: thams cad la khyab pa yin kyang rang bzhin kun
NK084(yu)004:740: tu snang ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyingsa so //
NK084(yu)004:741: de lta bu'i don ma rtogs pa'i sems can kun
NK084(yu)004:742: la snying brtse ba chen po phyogs ris med par
NK084(yu)004:743: 'byung ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' dang 'dra
NK084(yu)004:744: ba kun la khyab pa la snying rje chen po
NK084(yu)004:745: yang ni nam mkha'a de ltar bsgom mo //
NK084(yu)004:746: bzhi pa rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhi ste /
NK084(yu)004:748: yi ge a la sems sbyangs ba dang /
NK084(yu)004:749: ming tshogs gzhan la sems sbyangs pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:750: sems sbyangs pa'i yon tan no //
NK084(yu)004:752: gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni //
NK084(yu)004:753: chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin //
NK084(yu)004:754: sems nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin te //
NK084(yu)004:755: yi ge mchog ni bsgom par bya //
NK084(yu)004:757: rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin la drug ste sbyang bya ni mngal du 'jug pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:758: sbyong byed ni rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin no //
NK084(yu)004:759: ngo bo ni yi ge a'o //
NK084(yu)004:760: rnam grangs ni h+aum dang a las 'dir a'o //
NK084(yu)004:761: bsgom thabs ni a dkar po rgyu skar ma yas pa la khar shar ba lta bu'o //
NK084(yu)004:762: 'bras bu ni sprul pa'i sku 'thob pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:763: de la rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo gang yin na gnas pa'i gzhi med /
NK084(yu)004:764: brten pa'i rtsa ba med pa'i ngo bo de la
NK084(yu)004:765: mtshon pa tsam du sems zhes bya ste nyid ni
NK084(yu)004:766: chos nyid do // chos nyid ni brten pa dang gnas pa'i tha snyad dang bral ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:767: des las ci byed na de nyid dngos po yod
NK084(yu)004:768: med gnyis kyis bsdus pa'i chos rnams thams cad kun
NK084(yu)004:769: gyi rtsa ba yina te rig pa byang chub kyi
NK084(yu)004:770: sems rten gzhi dang bral ba nyid do //
NK084(yu)004:771: rang bzhin ci yin na rig pa sems nyid rten
NK084(yu)004:772: gzhi dang bral ba nyid gnas kyi ye shes rang
NK084(yu)004:773: snang ba ni yi ge'i rang bzhin a dkar po
NK084(yu)004:774: nyid do // a'i sgra ni chos nyid skye ba med pa'i don bsgom mo //
NK084(yu)004:775: thabs ji ltar sgom na a'i dbyings las yi ge
NK084(yu)004:776: thams cad 'byung ba'i phyir na a ni yi ge
NK084(yu)004:777: mchog ste de la dmigs pa rtse gcig tu brtan
NK084(yu)004:778: pa la ni bsgom pa zhes bya'o //
NK084(yu)004:780: a rab tu brtan 'gyur a dkar las //
NK084(yu)004:781: shin tu phra ba'i a rnams 'phro //
NK084(yu)004:782: phyogs bcu gang bar gsal gyur nas //
NK084(yu)004:784: rtsa ba'i yi ge a las spro bsdu bya bar
NK084(yu)004:785: bstan pa ni rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin a dkar po
NK084(yu)004:786: de rkyen dbang du mi 'gro bar brtan pa dang
NK084(yu)004:787: 'od spros te a ni chos nyid kyi rang bzhin
NK084(yu)004:788: rig pa byang chub sems so //
NK084(yu)004:789: rab tu bartan par gyur pa ni dmigs pa rtse gcig pas gsal bar gyur pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:790: gzhi'i a dkar po de las shin tu phra ba'i a mang po rnams phar spros shing 'phro ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:791: yan lag gi yi ge dbyangs dang gsal byed pa
NK084(yu)004:792: la spro bsdu bya bar bstan pa ni yi ge
NK084(yu)004:793: a phyogs bcur spros pas phyogs bcu as gang bar
NK084(yu)004:794: dmigs nas yi ge a gsal bar gyur nas 'od
NK084(yu)004:795: spro bsdu bya'o // 'od zer gyis dngos por snang
NK084(yu)004:796: ba thams cad sreg sbyangs nas chos thams cad don
NK084(yu)004:797: dam pa'i bden par byas tshur la 'dus pas a'i
NK084(yu)004:799: de ltar byas pas phar la spros kyang a chung
NK084(yu)004:800: ngu ma song tshur bsdus kyang cher ma song bas
NK084(yu)004:801: bsdus kyang 'phel 'grib med par brtan pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:803: de las ming tshogs gsal 'bar kun //
NK084(yu)004:804: spro zhing bsdu ba'ang de bzhin no //
NK084(yu)004:805: a de las ming gi yi ge'i tshogs ni /
NK084(yu)004:806: ka kha ga g+ha nga la sogs dang a +aa
NK084(yu)004:807: i +ai la sogs pa de dag yid la gsal
NK084(yu)004:808: ba dang kha dog 'od zer 'abra bar bsgom pa'o
NK084(yu)004:809: // de ni kun rdzob bden pa'i yi ge'o //
NK084(yu)004:810: de rnams las spro zhing bsdu ba'ang sngar a las
NK084(yu)004:811: yi ge dbyibs dang 'od zer can du 'phros pas
NK084(yu)004:812: snod bcud sbyangs pas a chung du ma song bsdus
NK084(yu)004:813: pas kyang cher ma song ba de bzhin bya ba
NK084(yu)004:814: yin no // de yang chos nyid yin pas 'phel 'grib dang bral lo //
NK084(yu)004:816: 'di ni rdo rje dngos grub kyi //
NK084(yu)004:817: brtan 'byung ye shes rgyu yin no //
NK084(yu)004:819: yi ge 'di ni don skye ba med pa'i yi
NK084(yu)004:820: ge rtags ni yi ge a 'bras bu sku gsung
NK084(yu)004:821: thugs rdo rje gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad 'byung
NK084(yu)004:822: ba'o // ting nge 'dzin brtan pa las byung ba
NK084(yu)004:823: ni sku dang ye shes thams cad kyi 'byung ba'i
NK084(yu)004:824: rgyu'am bskyed pa'i rkyen yang yi ge yin no //
NK084(yu)004:825: gsum pa dkyil 'khor dngos bsgom pa la gnyis te /
NK084(yu)004:828: rten gzhal yas khang la gnyis te /
NK084(yu)004:832: de las rgyal ba'i bzhugs gnas rten //
NK084(yu)004:833: dbang chen dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bsgom //
NK084(yu)004:840: 'dir 'byung ba rim brtsegs la yang drug ste sbyang bya ni snod kyi 'jig rten no //
NK084(yu)004:841: sbyong byed ni 'byung ba rim brtsegs so //
NK084(yu)004:843: rnam grangs ni 'dus byas kyi 'byung ba dang chos nyid kyi 'byung ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:844: bsgom thabs ni rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin gsal zhing brtan
NK084(yu)004:845: pa de las rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams bzhugs pa'i gnas
NK084(yu)004:846: sam rten du gyur pa sgom pa ni 'byung ba
NK084(yu)004:847: lnga rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas pas na dbang chen
NK084(yu)004:848: gyi dkyil 'khor ste de dag rim pa bzhin bsgom
NK084(yu)004:849: pa'i tshul a las e chad de yongs su gyur
NK084(yu)004:850: pa las e gru gsum chos kyi 'byung gnas phyi
NK084(yu)004:851: dkar la nang dmar ba yangs shing rgya che ba
NK084(yu)004:852: gcig bsgom / de yang 'byung ba nam mkha' yum
NK084(yu)004:853: kun tu bzang mo'i b+ha ga rnam par dag pas
NK084(yu)004:854: nang du na kun gzhi sbyong zhing nyon mongs pa
NK084(yu)004:855: gcig bsgom / gti mug dag / ye shes lnga las chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
NK084(yu)004:856: yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbyibs zla gam mdog
NK084(yu)004:857: ljang gu 'byung ba rlung dang yum dam tshig sgrol
NK084(yu)004:858: ma nang du na phung po'i dbugs nyon mongs phrag
NK084(yu)004:859: dog bya ba grub pa'i ye shes rnams so //
NK084(yu)004:860: bam las chu yi dkyil 'khor dbyibs zlum po mdog
NK084(yu)004:861: dkar po 'byung ba chu yum ma ma ki lus
NK084(yu)004:862: la sbyar na khrag nyon mongs nga rgyal mnyam pa
NK084(yu)004:863: nyid do // sum las gser gyi sa gzhi dbyibs
NK084(yu)004:864: glu bzhi mdog ser po 'byung ba sa yum sangs
NK084(yu)004:865: rgyas spyan phung po ni sha nyon mongs zhe sdang
NK084(yu)004:866: me long lta bu'i ye shes so /
NK084(yu)004:867: lam las rin po che'i ri rab dbyibs gru bzhi
NK084(yu)004:868: mkhar thabs mdog ye shes lnga ldan 'di yang yum
NK084(yu)004:869: sangs rgyas spyan 'byung ba sa phung po ni sha
NK084(yu)004:870: nyon mongs zhe sdang me long ye shes so //
NK084(yu)004:871: de'i steng du ram las me'i dkyil 'khor dbyibs gru
NK084(yu)004:872: gsum kha mdog sna tshogs 'byung ba ni me yum
NK084(yu)004:873: gos dkar mo phung po'i drod nyon mongs 'dod chags
NK084(yu)004:874: ye shes ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang
NK084(yu)004:875: sbyar ro // 'bras bu ni 'byung lnga ye nas sangs rgyas pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:876: gnyis pa gzhal yas khang la gsum ste bskyed pa'i sngags dang /
NK084(yu)004:880: b+h+rum bi shwa bi shud d+he /
NK084(yu)004:882: rin po che'i ri rab kyi steng du yi ge
NK084(yu)004:883: b+h+r+aum las rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa'i
NK084(yu)004:884: gzhal yas khang phyi nas bltas na nang gsal ba
NK084(yu)004:885: nang nas bltas na phyi gsal ba gang yang mi
NK084(yu)004:886: sgrib pa'i rang bzhin can no //
NK084(yu)004:888: ye shes phyogs kha bzhi dbus brtags te //
NK084(yu)004:889: dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub ni //
NK084(yu)004:890: rdzogs chen rtogs ka pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
NK084(yu)004:891: kun 'byung dkyil 'khor ga chen por spyod //
NK084(yu)004:893: gang rtogs par bya na mtshon byed ni 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi dbus dang lnga'o //
NK084(yu)004:894: mtshon bya ni ye shes lnga ste dbus chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes /
NK084(yu)004:897: nub so sor kun rtog /byang bya ba grub pa'i
NK084(yu)004:898: ye shes rnams la phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar brtags
NK084(yu)004:899: pa ste de yang phyogs mthun pa dang grangs dang
NK084(yu)004:900: mthun pa dang don mthun pa dang rtags mthun pas
NK084(yu)004:901: so // de ji ltar rtogs par bya na dkyil
NK084(yu)004:902: rdo rje sems dpa' la 'khor bzhi bcu tham pas
NK084(yu)004:903: bskor ba ni gdul bya'i blo bsam yas kyang blo
NK084(yu)004:904: che ba la rang bzhin lhun grub tu gnas pa
NK084(yu)004:905: ni rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro
NK084(yu)004:906: so // // de gang gis rtogs par bya na
NK084(yu)004:907: sgrub pa po rten gyi gang zag blo mchog tu
NK084(yu)004:908: so // // gyur pa ste / des chos thams
NK084(yu)004:909: cad ye nas lam dang gnyen pos ma bcos pa
NK084(yu)004:910: sku dang ye shes su sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin
NK084(yu)004:911: du rgyud kyi don rdzogs pa chen po'i don rtogs
NK084(yu)004:913: rtogs pa'i don ci zhe na bud+d+ha bzhi bcu rtsa
NK084(yu)004:914: gnyis dang po nas rang la lhun gyis grub pa'i
NK084(yu)004:915: phyir na rig pa las bud+d+ha kun 'byung ba rgya
NK084(yu)004:916: mtsho las gza' skar 'char ba bzhin du dus gcig
NK084(yu)004:917: la rdzogs par bsgom pa yin pas dkyil 'khor chen
NK084(yu)004:919: gsum pa rim gyis bskyed pa la gsum ste /
NK084(yu)004:924: 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas //
NK084(yu)004:925: lhag pa'i ye shes glo 'bur can //
NK084(yu)004:926: gru chad bzhis brgyan bar khyams dang //
NK084(yu)004:927: kun tu gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan //
NK084(yu)004:929: spyir gzhal yas khang la gsum ste /
NK084(yu)004:930: chos nyid rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK084(yu)004:933: rang bzhin la gnyis te rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK084(yu)004:934: rang bzhin 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
NK084(yu)004:935: gzugs brnyan la gnyis te gzugs brnyan dang /
NK084(yu)004:937: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor la gnyis te ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK084(yu)004:938: lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
NK084(yu)004:939: de'i steng du byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK084(yu)004:940: mchod pa tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
NK084(yu)004:941: de las 'dir rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor te gzhal
NK084(yu)004:942: yas khang ni dbus lte ba zlum po chos kyi
NK084(yu)004:944: rtsibs bzhi ni ye shes bzhi ste gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa /
NK084(yu)004:945: spros pa med pa'i mu khyud zlum po rdo rje'i rtsigs pa dang bcas pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:946: thams cad dbang du bsdud pa'i rtsibs mchan dmar po
NK084(yu)004:947: phrin las bzhi dang ldan pas na gru chad ljang
NK084(yu)004:948: gu'o // ye shes re re la yang lhag pa'i
NK084(yu)004:949: ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rtags su gla
NK084(yu)004:950: 'bur bzhi ste shar na dung gi /
NK084(yu)004:953: byang na g.yu yi glo 'bur du snang ngo //
NK084(yu)004:954: de yang ye shes gzhan las khyad par du gyur te spang nas lhag pa'i rtags cana no //
NK084(yu)004:955: phrin las bzhi'i gru chad bzhis dbus kyi pho brang la brgyan pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:956: dbyer med pa'i don la mkhas pas bden par tshul
NK084(yu)004:957: gcig tu 'dus te don dam kun rdzob dbyer med
NK084(yu)004:958: pas na bar khyamsa phyogs mthun dang /
NK084(yu)004:959: rang rig pa nyid la sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i
NK084(yu)004:960: yon tan thams cad lhun gyis grub pa'i rtags su
NK084(yu)004:961: phyi'i dbyibs kun tu gru bzhir gyur pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:962: de yang stong pa nyid dang /
NK084(yu)004:965: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir na sgo khyud
NK084(yu)004:966: bzhi dang ldan pa theg pa rim pa brgyad yod
NK084(yu)004:967: pa'i gnas su gyur pas rta babs brgyad yod pa
NK084(yu)004:968: / stong nyid mi shigs pa'i rtags su rdo rje'i ra bas bskor ba /
NK084(yu)004:969: gdug pa can 'joms pa'i rtags su me dpung 'bar bas 'khrigs pa can no //
NK084(yu)004:971: rol mo sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin //
NK084(yu)004:972: dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan //
NK084(yu)004:974: 'di la sprul pa'i rgyan dang bdag po'i rgyan gnyis las /
NK084(yu)004:976: gzhal yas khang de la pan tsa ra ga'i rtsigs
NK084(yu)004:977: pa dang rin chen pha gu'i bar na 'dod yon
NK084(yu)004:978: snam bu dmar po la rol mo la sogs pa'i
NK084(yu)004:979: mchod rdzas sna tshogs thogs pa'i 'dod pa'i yon tan
NK084(yu)004:980: lnga'i lha mo sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can sprin phung
NK084(yu)004:981: bzhin du 'khrigs pa ste snang la rang bzhin med
NK084(yu)004:982: pa gsal la mi sgrib pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:983: gnyis pa bdag po'i rgyan ni //
NK084(yu)004:984: gzhal yas khang gi bdag po ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs rgyal ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so //
NK084(yu)004:985: 'o na dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan du lha 'gro ba'i
NK084(yu)004:986: 'thad pa ci zhe na spyir rgyan la du ma
NK084(yu)004:987: yod kyang 'dir rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dbang
NK084(yu)004:988: du byas na gzhal yas khang dang lha la snga
NK084(yu)004:989: phyi med la / 'dir snga phyi byung ba ni
NK084(yu)004:990: gdul bya'i bsam pa la dgongs nas gdul bya blo
NK084(yu)004:991: chung bas dus skad cig la mi lcogs par rim
NK084(yu)004:993: de bas na sngon la gzhal yas khang bskyed nas
NK084(yu)004:994: de nas lha phyi la bskyed pa la dgongs nas
NK084(yu)004:995: rgyan zer ro // lha bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi
NK084(yu)004:996: cha byad can sprul pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis
NK084(yu)004:997: rgyan zer ro // brgyan zer ro // yang na
NK084(yu)004:998: gzhal yas khang gi rgyan du lha 'gyur te khang
NK084(yu)004:999: stong la bdag pos brgyan pa lta bu'o //
NK084(yu)004:1001: seng ge glang chen rta dang khyung //
NK084(yu)004:1002: nam mkha' lding gi khro chen la //
NK084(yu)004:1003: nyi zla pad+ma rin po che //
NK084(yu)004:1005: 'dir gdan la gsum las rtags kyi che bas khengs
NK084(yu)004:1006: pa bcom pa'i gdan ni sems can brgyad brgyad mjug
NK084(yu)004:1007: ma nang du bsnol nas gdan 'og na rna bas
NK084(yu)004:1008: chos nyan pa ste byang chub sems dpa' shes bya'i
NK084(yu)004:1009: sgrib pa sbyong bas lus gdan du phul ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:1010: de yang dbus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
NK084(yu)004:1011: pas mi 'jigs pa bzhi thob pa'i rtags su seng
NK084(yu)004:1013: shar du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas
NK084(yu)004:1014: mi 'gyur ba'i rtags su stobs bcu mnga' bas glang
NK084(yu)004:1016: lhor spyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas rdzu 'phrul
NK084(yu)004:1017: rkang pa bzhi mtshon pa'i rtags su rta mchog gi
NK084(yu)004:1019: nub tu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
NK084(yu)004:1020: mtshon pa'i rtags su dbang bcu mtshon pa mdzes pa'i
NK084(yu)004:1021: khyung rma bya'i gdan sna tshogs /
NK084(yu)004:1022: byang du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
NK084(yu)004:1023: rtags su 'phrin las sna tshogs pa mtshon pa'i shang
NK084(yu)004:1024: shang nam mkha' lding gi khri chen nam gdan lus
NK084(yu)004:1025: so so la gshog pa g.yur snang ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:1026: gnyis pa sa'i khyad par bsgrod pa'i gdan ni /
NK084(yu)004:1027: bcu gcig kun tu 'od dang bcu gnyis ma chags
NK084(yu)004:1028: pad+ma can dang bcu gsum yi ge 'khor lo tshogs
NK084(yu)004:1029: chen gyi sa non pas shes rab stong pa mtshon
NK084(yu)004:1031: thabs ma 'gags pa mtshon pa zla ba'i gdan dang /
NK084(yu)004:1032: skyon gyis ma gos pa mtshon pa gdan sna tshogs pa'i pad+ma'o //
NK084(yu)004:1033: gsum pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i gdan ni /
NK084(yu)004:1034: 'og gzhi chos kyi 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi'am rin pa
NK084(yu)004:1035: che 'bar ba'i khri rkang la dgos 'dod sna tshogs
NK084(yu)004:1036: 'byung ba dang 'og gzhi 'khor lo la chos kyis
NK084(yu)004:1038: de bas na rgyal ba rigs lnga la don dang rtags su ldan pa'i gdan lnga brtsegs so //
NK084(yu)004:1039: kun bzang yab yum dang sems dpa' sems ma la nyi zla pad+ma'o //
NK084(yu)004:1040: thub pa la pad rkyang ngo //
NK084(yu)004:1041: sgo ba la rdo rje brag gi steng na nyi ma rkyang pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1042: gnyis pa brten pa lha sgom pa la gnyis te /
NK084(yu)004:1043: bdag sngon gyi sangs rgyas yin pa'i phyir bdag gi sras su de bzhin gshegs pa bya ba dang /
NK084(yu)004:1044: rigs mi nub cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba'i
NK084(yu)004:1045: phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su bdag bya ba'o
NK084(yu)004:1046: // dang po bdag sras la lnga ste /
NK084(yu)004:1048: bdag sras kyi gtan tshigs dang /
NK084(yu)004:1049: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:1050: sngags kyis phyir gdon pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:1051: de dag rgyu rkyen 'tshogs pa las 'byung bar bstan pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1053: a ni skye med de bzhin nyid //
NK084(yu)004:1054: k+sha ni thugs kyi ye shes shar //
NK084(yu)004:1055: de las cho 'phrul gsum gyis bskyed //
NK084(yu)004:1056: kun bzang mnyam bzhag ye shes 'phro //
NK084(yu)004:1057: yum gyur mnyam rdzogs pad mo'i dkyil //
NK084(yu)004:1058: phyag rgya chen po'i sku gnyis rdzogs //
NK084(yu)004:1060: bdag sngon gyi sangs rgyas yin pa'i phyir na bdag
NK084(yu)004:1061: gi sras su de bzhin gshegs pa bya ba ni
NK084(yu)004:1062: lnga ste / sangs rgyas gang dang sbyar ba dang /
NK084(yu)004:1063: don gang dang mthun pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:1067: de la sangs rgyas ni rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas dang sbyar /
NK084(yu)004:1068: de yang bdag rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs
NK084(yu)004:1069: rgyas yin pas na rang bzhin gyi lhar bsgom pa'o
NK084(yu)004:1070: // don gang dang mthun na ye yin pa dang don dang mthun pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1071: ye yin pa ni dper na 'jig rten srid pa'i
NK084(yu)004:1072: mes po lha dbang phyug chen po yab yum yin
NK084(yu)004:1073: pa ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mes po dpal
NK084(yu)004:1075: sgo gang nas 'jug pa ni ma h+aa yo ga a ti yo ga dang sbyar nas 'jug pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1076: don gang rtogs pa ni rig pa ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i don de rtogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1077: ye shes gang rtogs pa ni rig pa rang gsal gyi ye shes thob pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1078: 'o na bdag dpal kun tu bzang po yab yum
NK084(yu)004:1079: gnyis po sngon gyi sangs rgyas yin na bud+d+ha bzhi
NK084(yu)004:1080: bcu po de lha 'phral byung gi sangs rgyas yin
NK084(yu)004:1081: nam zhe na / de byas na glo bur ba yin pas don mi 'grub pas mi 'thad do //
NK084(yu)004:1082: de ma yin na sngon gyi sangs rgyas zhes ci la gdags zhe na zhes dris pa na /
NK084(yu)004:1083: de'i lan du de ni 'di ltar shes par bya
NK084(yu)004:1084: ste rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas ye
NK084(yu)004:1085: ji bzhin pa'i kun tu bzang po ma shes na
NK084(yu)004:1086: rig pa sangs rgyas su thag mi chod pas na
NK084(yu)004:1088: rtogs pa mngon gyur gyi sangs rgyas rgyud dag pa'i
NK084(yu)004:1089: sangs rgyas med na rigs nub cing bde gshegs rgyun
NK084(yu)004:1090: chad pa'i phyir na rigs mi nub cing lhun gyis
NK084(yu)004:1091: grub par bya ba'i phyir bdag gi sras su de
NK084(yu)004:1093: don go dril na bu d+d+ha bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
NK084(yu)004:1094: la snga phyi med kyang gdul bya'i blo dang mthun
NK084(yu)004:1095: par bstan pa'o // de bas na bdag sangs rgyas
NK084(yu)004:1096: nas gzhan don byed pas na bud+d+ha nyid la bud+d+ha
NK084(yu)004:1098: de ltar nges par byas nas 'di ltar rgyu'i ting
NK084(yu)004:1099: nge 'dzin gyi a de dbus kyi gdan stengs su
NK084(yu)004:1100: babs pa ste a'i don ni chos nyid skye ba
NK084(yu)004:1101: mada pa yin la rtags kun tu bzang mo'i sa
NK084(yu)004:1102: bon no // ngo bo de bzhin nyid kun gzhi chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no //
NK084(yu)004:1103: a de las k+sha g.yas su 'phros pa'i don ni
NK084(yu)004:1104: thugs kyi ye shes sam thugs rig pa'i ye shes
NK084(yu)004:1105: shar ba'o // rtags kun tu bzang po'i sa bon no //
NK084(yu)004:1106: ngo bo yid rang byung gi ye shes bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs so //
NK084(yu)004:1107: de las cha 'phrul gsum gyis lhar bskyed pa'i tshul
NK084(yu)004:1108: ni a dang k+sha gnyis su gsal ba gsung yig
NK084(yu)004:1109: 'bru'i cho ga'o // de 'phro 'dus pas rdo rje dang dril bu gnyis su gyur pa ni /
NK084(yu)004:1110: thugs phyag mtshan gyi cho ga'o //
NK084(yu)004:1111: de 'phro 'dus pa las sku phra mor gyur pa ni sku yongs su rdzogs pa'i cho ga'o //
NK084(yu)004:1112: de 'phro 'dus pa las sngags brjod pas kun bzang
NK084(yu)004:1113: yab yum du bskyed pa'i tshul ni sku phra mo
NK084(yu)004:1114: de la h'u h'u h'u badz+ra tsit+ta h+aum zhes brjod
NK084(yu)004:1115: pas kun tu bzang po zhabs gnyis dkyil krung mnyam
NK084(yu)004:1116: bzhag tu bzhugs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa
NK084(yu)004:1117: sku mthing ka phyag gnyis mnyam bzhag gi phyag rgya
NK084(yu)004:1118: can dgongs pa mnyam bzhag tu bzhugs pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1119: sor mo so sor gsal ba ni ye shes 'phro zhing gsal ba'i don yin no //
NK084(yu)004:1120: a a a badz+ra b+ha dra sa ma ya s+t+wam
NK084(yu)004:1121: zhes brjod pas yum kun tu bzang mor gyur ba
NK084(yu)004:1122: ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mthing ka yab
NK084(yu)004:1123: la 'khril ba zhabs pa da ma'i skyil krung du
NK084(yu)004:1124: bzhugs pa yab dang sku mnyam par rdzogs pa zhabs
NK084(yu)004:1125: pada mo'i skyil krung du bzhugs pa ni nyes pa'i
NK084(yu)004:1126: skyon dang bral ba'i don no //
NK084(yu)004:1127: de ltar lha sku phyag rgyar bsgom pa 'di ni
NK084(yu)004:1128: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi spro gzhi dang khyab bdag
NK084(yu)004:1129: yin pas phyag rgya chana po'i sku zhes pa kun
NK084(yu)004:1130: bzang yab yum gnyis rdzogs par bsgom pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1132: bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK084(yu)004:1133: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag /phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che //
NK084(yu)004:1134: kun bzang ye nas yin pa'i phyir //
NK084(yu)004:1136: rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid dpal kun tu bzang por
NK084(yu)004:1137: bskyed pa de yang 'phral la byas pa lta bu
NK084(yu)004:1138: min te dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
NK084(yu)004:1139: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag po'am
NK084(yu)004:1140: rang bzhin dang phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i dkyil 'khora thams
NK084(yu)004:1141: cad kyi bdag nyid chena po dpal kun tu bzang
NK084(yu)004:1142: po nyid ye nas yin pa'i phyir bdag gi sras
NK084(yu)004:1143: su de bzhin gshegs pa bya'o //
NK084(yu)004:1145: thabs dang shes rab dgyes sprin las //
NK084(yu)004:1146: byang chub sems tshogs rgyu 'khor lo //
NK084(yu)004:1147: 'bras bu rgyal ba smin grub byed //
NK084(yu)004:1148: ngo mtshar ming tshogs bzhi bcu gnyis //
NK084(yu)004:1149: a ka kha ga g+ha nga /
NK084(yu)004:1161: a nyid sna tshogs par snang ba'i //
NK084(yu)004:1162: ka la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis //
NK084(yu)004:1163: sgra yi ming gis thams cad bsdus //
NK084(yu)004:1164: mngon rdzogs rgyal po de nyid nges //
NK084(yu)004:1166: yab thabas kyi ranga bzhin kun tu bzang po'i mkha'
NK084(yu)004:1167: ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa mchu sbubs su gyis
NK084(yu)004:1168: mtshan pa dang / yum shes rab kun tu bzang
NK084(yu)004:1169: mo'i mkha' ni pad+ma 'da' ma brgyad par bsgom pa'i
NK084(yu)004:1171: de ltar yab yum gnyis su med par dgyes par
NK084(yu)004:1172: rol pa'i byang chub sems sprin lta bu zag pa
NK084(yu)004:1173: med pa'i thig le bde ba chen po lasa yab
NK084(yu)004:1174: yum rol pa'i byang chub sems kyi tshogs su byung
NK084(yu)004:1175: ba ni lha bskyed pa'i rgyu 'khor lo ltar 'byung
NK084(yu)004:1176: ngo // de lta bu'i yi ge rnams la bskyed
NK084(yu)004:1177: pa rkyen gyi sngags brjod na yi ge'i 'bras bu
NK084(yu)004:1178: ni bud+d+ha rgyal ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su smin
NK084(yu)004:1180: rgyu yi ge de las 'bras bu sangs rgyas su grub pa ni ngo mtshar to //
NK084(yu)004:1182: bazha bcu rtsa gnyis ni grangs kyi rnam grangs so //
NK084(yu)004:1183: de yang yi ge 'di rnams la spyi don gsum ste yi ge 'byung ba'i gnas dang /
NK084(yu)004:1185: yi ge lha dang sbyor ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:1186: yi ge 'byung ba'i gnas ni a khong nas 'byung /
NK084(yu)004:1188: tsa sde lce rtse dang so las 'byung /
NK084(yu)004:1189: ta sde lce rtse dang rkan las 'byung /
NK084(yu)004:1194: la lce dang so las so //
NK084(yu)004:1195: sha dang sa ni lce dang so las so //
NK084(yu)004:1201: ngo bo ni sems kyi rang bzhin skye ba med pa las gdangs 'gags med du shar ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:1202: lha dang ngo sbyar ba ni gsum ste /
NK084(yu)004:1203: phyi rtog tshogs bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su ngo sprad pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:1204: nang rtsa gnas kyi thig le dang sbyar ba dang /
NK084(yu)004:1205: gsang ba yab yum gyi byang sems dang sbyar ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:1206: de yang gzhi thig ler gnas pa las byang sems
NK084(yu)004:1207: yi ger babs pa las lhar bskyed pa ni a
NK084(yu)004:1208: skye ba med pa'i don kun gzhi chos kyi dbyings
NK084(yu)004:1209: yum kun tu bzang mo'i rgyu'o //
NK084(yu)004:1235: ya d+hu pe bdug spos ma /
NK084(yu)004:1237: la a lo ke mar me ma /
NK084(yu)004:1238: wa g+han d+he dri chab ma /
NK084(yu)004:1243: k+sha yid kun tu bzang po /
NK084(yu)004:1250: o +ao bdud rtsi 'khyil ba lus kyi reg bya
NK084(yu)004:1251: bzhi reg par 'dus pa yi ge gnyis su byung
NK084(yu)004:1252: ba'o // yi ge a ni sems la gnas pa'i
NK084(yu)004:1253: kun gzhi don du na chos kyi dbyings kyi ye
NK084(yu)004:1254: shes yi ge thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin pas
NK084(yu)004:1255: na a nyid las yi ge sna tshogs pa 'byung
NK084(yu)004:1256: ba'o // ba'o // gang 'byung zhe na gsal byed
NK084(yu)004:1257: du snang ba'i ka la sogs pa'i yi ge bzhi
NK084(yu)004:1258: bcu rtsa gnyis su 'byung ba ni 'byung ba'i gnas
NK084(yu)004:1259: gzhi'i yi ge a las 'byung ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:1260: de yang sgra yi 'byung gnas yi ge yin la sgra las ming 'byung /
NK084(yu)004:1261: ming las tshig 'byung tshig gis don gsal zhing rtogs
NK084(yu)004:1262: pas tshig las don byung nas des chos thams cad
NK084(yu)004:1263: bsdus pa'o // rgyu'i yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
NK084(yu)004:1264: nyid 'bras bu mngon par rdzoogas par sangs rgyas pa'i
NK084(yu)004:1265: rgyal ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su rdzogs par 'byung
NK084(yu)004:1266: la rgyal ba de dag nyid kyang longs spyod rdzogs
NK084(yu)004:1267: pa'i sku 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ltar 'byung
NK084(yu)004:1268: ba de nyid ni sprul pa lta bu yin par
NK084(yu)004:1269: bsdus pa'o // nges so // bzhi pa ni /
NK084(yu)004:1270: de la rkyen gyi sngags kyis bskul //
NK084(yu)004:1271: kun tu bzang po yab yum gyi mkha' gsang nas
NK084(yu)004:1272: gdan stengs su yi ge 'phros pa la de la
NK084(yu)004:1273: h+aum badz+ra d+h+ri ga la sogs pa'i bskyed pa rkyen
NK084(yu)004:1274: gyi sngags kyis bskul bas lha so so'i sku yongs
NK084(yu)004:1278: d+r+wa ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs gsal //
NK084(yu)004:1281: dbang med rgyu rkyen 'tshogs pa'i mthu chen yin //
NK084(yu)004:1283: sgyu ni yig 'bru bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis la 'phrul
NK084(yu)004:1284: ba ni de las dkyil 'khor gyi lha bzhi bcu
NK084(yu)004:1286: phyi nang gsang ba de kho na nyid bzhi las
NK084(yu)004:1287: 'di rnams gsang ba sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'am rnal 'byor
NK084(yu)004:1288: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba ste chos nyid kyi gzugs brnyan
NK084(yu)004:1289: yum gyi skur byung ba dang ye shes kyi gzugs
NK084(yu)004:1290: brnyan yab kyi skur byung ba gnyis ye nas dbyings
NK084(yu)004:1291: dang ye shes gnyis su med par 'brel ba'i phyir
NK084(yu)004:1292: d+r+wa ba'i lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor
NK084(yu)004:1293: na rig pa mngon sum du rdzogs par gasla ba'o
NK084(yu)004:1294: // don dam par chos nyid 'dus ma byas pa'i
NK084(yu)004:1295: ngang las ma g.yos kyang kun rdzob tsam du lha'i
NK084(yu)004:1296: sku nyid 'dus byas ltar snang ba ni de kho
NK084(yu)004:1297: na kun rdzob dang don dam par snang yang don
NK084(yu)004:1298: gyi ngo bo la bden pa dbyer med pa'i phyir
NK084(yu)004:1299: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ram ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil
NK084(yu)004:1300: 'khor 'byin pa'i tshul las mi 'da' ba ni dam
NK084(yu)004:1301: // tshig go // de yang dper na rgyu sa
NK084(yu)004:1302: bon la rkyen chu lud 'dzom na 'bras bu rang
NK084(yu)004:1303: dbang med par 'byung ba ltar rgyu zag med kyi
NK084(yu)004:1304: byang chub sems yi ger snang ba dang rkyen bskyed
NK084(yu)004:1305: pa'i sngags kyi nus pa 'atshagas na 'bras bu lha'i
NK084(yu)004:1306: sku rang dbang med par 'byung ste gsang sngags gsang
NK084(yu)004:1307: ba'i nus mthu chen po yin no //
NK084(yu)004:1308: de yan chad kyis bdag sngon gyi sangs rgyas yin
NK084(yu)004:1309: pa'i phyir bdag gi sras su de bzhin gshegs pa
NK084(yu)004:1310: bya'o // gnyis pa la 'ju 'dul bya ba dang /
NK084(yu)004:1312: dang po la bzhi ste bskul bar dam bca' ba dang /
NK084(yu)004:1317: de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen rigs //
NK084(yu)004:1318: lhun gyis grub par bya ba'i phyir //
NK084(yu)004:1319: rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la //
NK084(yu)004:1320: 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor bas //
NK084(yu)004:1321: rang gi ngang tshul de bzung nas //
NK084(yu)004:1322: bskul tshig 'di yang rab tu brjod //
NK084(yu)004:1324: rigs mi nub cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba'i
NK084(yu)004:1325: phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su bdag bya ba
NK084(yu)004:1326: la lnga ste / sangs rgyas gang dang sbyar ba /
NK084(yu)004:1329: don gang thob cing rtogs pa /
NK084(yu)004:1331: sangs rgyas gang dang sbyar na rtogs pa mngon gyur gyi sangs rgyas dang sbyar /
NK084(yu)004:1332: de yang rtogs pa mngon du gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1333: don gang dang mthun na pha mas bu tsha bskyed pa dang 'dra'o //
NK084(yu)004:1334: sgo gang nas 'jug na ma h+aa yo ga'i a nu yo ga nas 'jug go //
NK084(yu)004:1335: don gang rtogs na rang byung gi ye shes chen po rtogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1336: rang rig pa la rang gis rtogs pa mngon du gyur /
NK084(yu)004:1337: rgyud dag pa'i kun tu bzang por byas rig pa dang rtogs pa dbyer med /
NK084(yu)004:1338: de ci las byung na rang rig pa sangs rgyas
NK084(yu)004:1339: yin pa la yin par shes nas de'i sras su
NK084(yu)004:1341: de yang dkyil 'khor dang po bskyed pa de nas
NK084(yu)004:1342: bcom ldan 'adsa dgyes pa chena po dpal kun tu
NK084(yu)004:1343: bzang po rigas kyi bdag po yab yum gnyis su
NK084(yu)004:1344: med pa lhun gyis grub para yod kyang rang bzhin
NK084(yu)004:1345: lhun grub de rtogs pa mngon du gyur pas bya
NK084(yu)004:1346: ba'i phyir na rang bzhin lhun grub dang rang snang
NK084(yu)004:1347: rig pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis dbyer med pa'i dkyil 'khor
NK084(yu)004:1348: du bya la de rtogs pas lhun grub tu bya
NK084(yu)004:1349: ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su bdag bya
NK084(yu)004:1350: ba'o // gzhi rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil
NK084(yu)004:1351: 'khor de rkyen 'jug pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid kyis
NK084(yu)004:1352: nyams su blangs la gzhi de rang gi blo la
NK084(yu)004:1353: mnyam para sbyor basa sgom mo //
NK084(yu)004:1354: dbus kyi gtso bo'i thugs ka nas rang gi rnam
NK084(yu)004:1355: par smin pa'i lus 'di 'dra ba'i ngang tshul de
NK084(yu)004:1356: bzung ba'i tshangs pa phru gu'i cha byad can gcig
NK084(yu)004:1357: byung nas so // de byung nas bar khyams nas
NK084(yu)004:1358: dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bskor ba byas nas nub
NK084(yu)004:1359: sgor 'dug ste brkyang phyag lan gsum 'tshal nas pus
NK084(yu)004:1360: mo btsugs te dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bskul tshig
NK084(yu)004:1361: 'di yang rab tu brjod cing gsol ba lan gsum
NK084(yu)004:1364: ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs //
NK084(yu)004:1365: yon tan phrin las rmad po che //
NK084(yu)004:1366: da lta nyid du mnyam sbyor bas //
NK084(yu)004:1367: phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig /ces so //
NK084(yu)004:1368: de la ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'i yi ge
NK084(yu)004:1369: gyis mgo drangs nas rang byung ye shes kyi ngo
NK084(yu)004:1370: bo dpal kun tu bzang po ni thams cad du
NK084(yu)004:1371: dbang bskur ba'i phyir na rgyal po'o //
NK084(yu)004:1372: sku'i rigs rnam par snang mdzad dang gsung gi rigs
NK084(yu)004:1373: snang ba mtha' yas thugs kyi rigs mi bskyod pa
NK084(yu)004:1374: yon tan rin 'byung 'phrin lasa don yod grub pa'o
NK084(yu)004:1375: // de yang rgyal ba lnga so sor byung ba
NK084(yu)004:1376: ni ma yin te rgyal ba gcig las yon tan
NK084(yu)004:1377: sku gsung thugs 'phrin las re re dang ldan pas
NK084(yu)004:1378: na rmad po che zhes bya'o //
NK084(yu)004:1379: de lta bu de bdag la da lta nyid du
NK084(yu)004:1380: khyed dang dbyer med par mnyam par sbyor basa na
NK084(yu)004:1381: dus phyi ma la mi ltos par dus da lta
NK084(yu)004:1383: khyed kyi phyag rgya chena por bdag sbyor cig ces
NK084(yu)004:1384: pa ste ji ltar na bdag rang bzhin lhun grub
NK084(yu)004:1385: kyi sangs rgyas dang khyed rtogs pa mngon gyur gyi
NK084(yu)004:1386: sangs rgyas gnyis dbyer med par gyur la bdag nyid
NK084(yu)004:1387: kyang rtogs pa mngon gyur gyi sangs rgyas su sbyor
NK084(yu)004:1389: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i //
NK084(yu)004:1390: ye shes zer gyis lus rtog sbyangs //
NK084(yu)004:1391: gser zhun lta bu'i sems dag las //
NK084(yu)004:1393: thugs kar thim nas sku yi dbyig /rdo rje'i lam
NK084(yu)004:1394: byung yum gyi mkha' //chos sku byang chub sems su
NK084(yu)004:1396: de ltar gsol ba btab pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha
NK084(yu)004:1397: yab yum thabas dang shes rab gnyis su meda pa'i
NK084(yu)004:1398: sbyor ba tshad med pas sbyor mtshams nas byang chub
NK084(yu)004:1399: kyi sems rno la myur ba grangs med pa byung
NK084(yu)004:1400: ba'i ye shes kyi zer gyis bdag gi lus kyi
NK084(yu)004:1401: rtog pa dang sdig pa thams cad bya sgro mes
NK084(yu)004:1402: sregs pa bzhin du sbyangs nas dpe gser zhun ma
NK084(yu)004:1403: lta bu'i tshul du bdag gi sems dag par gnas
NK084(yu)004:1404: pa lasa / de la lha rnams kyis gzigs te
NK084(yu)004:1405: sems rten gyi gnas su gsang ba gsum gyi byin
NK084(yu)004:1407: kyi rang bzhin lha'i sems de yi ge 'bru gsum
NK084(yu)004:1408: pa lasa / du gyur to // yi ge yang 'phro 'dus pas h+aum du thim /
NK084(yu)004:1409: des bar khyams nas bskor ba lan gsum byas nas
NK084(yu)004:1410: gtso bo'i thugs kar thim nas sku'i dbyig tu gyur
NK084(yu)004:1411: sgal tshigs kyi rta brgyud rdo rje'i lam du byung
NK084(yu)004:1412: nas yum gyi mkha'a la babs pa dang h+aum gi
NK084(yu)004:1413: 'od kyis yum yang 'od du zhu snang la rang
NK084(yu)004:1414: bzhin med pa'i sku gsal la rtog pa med pa'i
NK084(yu)004:1415: thugs chos sku byang chub semas su gnas so //
NK084(yu)004:1417: lha rnams so so'i snying po'i sgra //
NK084(yu)004:1418: bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis sgra byung bas //
NK084(yu)004:1419: byang chub sems su gcig par thim //
NK084(yu)004:1421: dkyil 'khor gyi lha gzhan rnams kyang rang rang so
NK084(yu)004:1422: so'i snying po'i sgra'am yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
NK084(yu)004:1423: kyi sgra tsam byung basa sngags kyi sgras bskul nas
NK084(yu)004:1424: gnas pa de dbus kyi gtso bo'i 'od phung byang
NK084(yu)004:1425: chub sems su gnas pa la gcig par thim mo
NK084(yu)004:1426: // gnyis pa dkyil 'khor bskyed pa la bzhi ste /
NK084(yu)004:1430: nus pa dang ldan par bya ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:1431: dang po gtso bo bskyed pa la bzhi ste yab yum bskyed pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:1432: dbang dang byin brlabs bya ba dang /
NK084(yu)004:1433: mkha' gsang byin gyis brlabs te brdas bskul ba dang /
NK084(yu)004:1434: byang sems spros te chags mchod bya ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:1436: de nas snying po dran tsam gyis //
NK084(yu)004:1437: a k+sha gsung gi phyag rgya gnyis //
NK084(yu)004:1438: cho ga gsum gyi sbyor ba yis //
NK084(yu)004:1439: phyag rgya chen po'i sku gnyis rdzogs //
NK084(yu)004:1441: lha thams cad 'od du zhu nas 'od kyi gong
NK084(yu)004:1442: bu gcig tu gnas pa de nas a dang k+sha
NK084(yu)004:1443: gnyis kyi snying po dran tsam gyis 'od kyi gong
NK084(yu)004:1444: bu de a k+sha gsung gi yi ge gnyis su
NK084(yu)004:1445: gyur te / de las sku bskyed pa'i rang bzhin
NK084(yu)004:1446: las mi 'da' bas na phyag rgya gnyis zhes bya'o
NK084(yu)004:1447: gyur te / // 'od kyi gong bu a k+sha
NK084(yu)004:1448: gnyis su gyur pa ni gsung yig 'bru'i cho ga'o
NK084(yu)004:1450: rdo rje dang dril bur gyur pa ni thugs phyag
NK084(yu)004:1452: de 'phro 'dus pa las sku phra mor gyur pa
NK084(yu)004:1453: ste de ltar cho ga gsum gyi sbyor ba yis
NK084(yu)004:1454: sku phra mo 'phro 'dus pa las sngags brjod pas
NK084(yu)004:1455: phyag rgya chen po'i sku dpal kun tu bzang po
NK084(yu)004:1456: yab yum gnyis yongs rdzogsa su gyur par sgom pa
NK084(yu)004:1457: ni sku mdog mthing ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa
NK084(yu)004:1458: zhabs rdo rje'i skyil krung phyag mnyam bzhag tu gnas
NK084(yu)004:1459: pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bsgom mo //
NK084(yu)004:1463: byin gyis brlabs pa ni lha rnams kyi spyi bo
NK084(yu)004:1464: dang mgrin pa dang snying gar nyi ma dang zla
NK084(yu)004:1465: ba dang pad+ma'i gdan bsam la de'i steng du spyi
NK084(yu)004:1466: bor mgrin par +aahthugasa kar h+aum ste 'abru gsum bsam
NK084(yu)004:1467: de las 'od 'phro 'dus pa las rnam snang snang
NK084(yu)004:1468: mtha' rdo rje sems dpar bskyed la sngags kyis nga
NK084(yu)004:1469: rgyal bya'o // dbang bskur ba ni kun tu bzang
NK084(yu)004:1470: po'i dbu'i gnas lngar rin po che'i khang bu lnga'i
NK084(yu)004:1471: nang du yi ge 'bru lnga bkod pa'i byin brlabs
NK084(yu)004:1472: 'od zer gyi rnam pas 'og min nas rigs lnga
NK084(yu)004:1473: rgyal bya'o // spyan drangs te / mdun gyi nam
NK084(yu)004:1474: mkha' la bzhugs pa de'i thabs dang shes rab gnyis
NK084(yu)004:1475: su med pa de byang chub sems dbu'i yi ge
NK084(yu)004:1476: lnga la thim pa dang don ye shes lngar dbang
NK084(yu)004:1477: bskur te ma h+aa sh+au nya ta la sogs pa'i
NK084(yu)004:1479: de nas nam mkha'i rigs lnga dbu'i khang bu lnga'i
NK084(yu)004:1480: nang du spyan drangs la dbu rgyan du bzhugs su
NK084(yu)004:1482: h'u las rdo rje rtse lnga //
NK084(yu)004:1484: rjes su chags pas de bzhin bskul //
NK084(yu)004:1486: yab kyi gsang ba h'u las rdo rje rtse lnga
NK084(yu)004:1487: pa chu sbugs su yi ge gyis mtshan par bskyed
NK084(yu)004:1488: do // yang na rtsa bar rked par h+aum rtse mor phata bsam par bya'o //
NK084(yu)004:1489: yum gyi mkha' pa las pad+ma 'dab brgyad du gyur
NK084(yu)004:1490: pa'i dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du
NK084(yu)004:1492: yum gyis yab la bskul ba de bzhin gshegs pa
NK084(yu)004:1493: thams cad kyis rjes su chags pa'i bdag nyid nga'am
NK084(yu)004:1494: yul nga nyid yin zhes bskul bas yab kyis yum
NK084(yu)004:1495: la lan byin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
NK084(yu)004:1496: cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin
NK084(yu)004:1497: nga'am bdag nyid yin zhes lan du bskul ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:1499: sarba ta tha ga ta ma h+aa a nu ra ga badz+ra swa b+ha wa at+ma ko&a ham /
NK084(yu)004:1500: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa pu tsa badz+ra swa wa at+ma ko&a ham /
NK084(yu)004:1501: ste de la ni sngags kyi mgo 'dren pa sarba
NK084(yu)004:1502: thams cad ta th+aa ga ta de bzhin gshegs pa
NK084(yu)004:1503: ma h+aa chen po a nu ra ga rjes su
NK084(yu)004:1504: chags pa badz+ra rdo rje swa b+ha ba ngo bo
NK084(yu)004:1505: nyid at+ma ko& ham bdag nyid nga'o //
NK084(yu)004:1506: sarba thams cad ta tha ga ta de bzhin gshegs
NK084(yu)004:1507: pa ma h+aa chen po p+au tsa mchod pa badz+ra
NK084(yu)004:1508: rdo rje swa b+ha ba ngo bo nyid at+ma ko&
NK084(yu)004:1510: gnyis pa 'khor bskyed pa la gnyis te yum gyi mkhar byang chub sems las lhar bskyed pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:1513: yum gyi pad mo'i dkyil 'khor du //
NK084(yu)004:1514: de ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro //
NK084(yu)004:1515: gzhal yas thig gdab snying po bkod //
NK084(yu)004:1516: de las spro dang bsdu ba yis //
NK084(yu)004:1517: thugs kyi phyag rgya bzhi bcu gnyis //
NK084(yu)004:1519: zhes pas bstan te yum gyi zhes kun tu bzang
NK084(yu)004:1520: mo'i mkha' pada ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i dkyil 'khora
NK084(yu)004:1521: du b+ha ga bde stong gi nyams dang ldan pa
NK084(yu)004:1522: de yab kun tu bzang po'i lhag pa byang chub
NK084(yu)004:1523: kyi sems bade ba thugsa kyi rang bzhin nam thugs
NK084(yu)004:1524: yang dag pa'i bde ba de yab kyis yum la
NK084(yu)004:1525: dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i rgyur spro ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:1526: de yang yum gyi mkhar byang chub sems dang po spros pas gzhal yas khang gi dal du gyur /
NK084(yu)004:1527: gnyis pa spros pas thig gdab /
NK084(yu)004:1528: gsum pa spros pas dal yongs su rdzogs /
NK084(yu)004:1529: bzhi pa spros pas gdan gsal /
