NK084(yu)004:1530: lnga pas snying po gsung yig 'bru bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su gsal zhing bkoda pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1531: de las 'od zer spro ba dang bsdu ba yisa
NK084(yu)004:1532: thugs kyi phyag rgya'am phyag mtshan bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
NK084(yu)004:1533: su gyur pa'o // de las yang phar 'phros tshur
NK084(yu)004:1534: 'dus pa las phra mo'i sku'am sku phra mo bzhi
NK084(yu)004:1535: bcu rtsa gnyis su gyur pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1537: so so'i sngags kyis bskyed cing gdon //
NK084(yu)004:1538: sogs nas mu ne ye s+w+aa h+aa zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan pa ste /
NK084(yu)004:1539: de nas yum gyi mkha'i nang na gnas pa'i sku
NK084(yu)004:1540: phra mo de rnams las 'phro 'dus pa dang so
NK084(yu)004:1541: so'i sngags brjod pa'i rkyen nyid kyi lha yongs rdzogs
NK084(yu)004:1542: su bskyed cing phyir la gdon par bya'o //
NK084(yu)004:1543: de yang gtso bo yab yum gyi sngags h'u badz+ra
NK084(yu)004:1544: d+h+riga ces brjod pas dbus su bcom ldan 'das rdo
NK084(yu)004:1545: rje sems dpa' zhal gsum phyag drug pa g.yas dkar
NK084(yu)004:1546: g.yon dmar dbus mthing ka'i zhal /
NK084(yu)004:1547: rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen g.yas dang dril bu
NK084(yu)004:1548: pad+ma ral gri g.yon na bsnams pa rgyan thams cad
NK084(yu)004:1549: kyis brgyan pa zhabs rdzogs pa'i skyil krung du bzhugs
NK084(yu)004:1550: pa'o // de bzhin du dza na dzaka ces brjod
NK084(yu)004:1551: pas shar du rnam par snang mdzad zhal gsum phyag
NK084(yu)004:1552: drug g.yas dmar g.yon sngo dbus dkar zhal /
NK084(yu)004:1553: 'khor lo rin chen rdo rje g.yas /
NK084(yu)004:1554: dril bu pad+ma ral gri g.yon /
NK084(yu)004:1555: zhabs rdzogs pa'i skyil krung du bzhugs pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1556: swa rat+na d+h+riga ces pas lhor rin chen 'byung ldan
NK084(yu)004:1557: zhal gsum phyag drug pa g.yas sngo g.yon dmar dbus
NK084(yu)004:1558: ser zhal / rin chen 'khor lo rdo rje g.yas dril bu pad+ma ral gri g.yon na bsnams pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1559: am a ro lika zhes pas nub tu snang ba
NK084(yu)004:1560: mtha' yas zhal gsum phyag drug pa g.yas sngo g.yon
NK084(yu)004:1562: pad+ma 'khor lo rdo rje g.yas dang dril bu rin chen ral gri g.yon na bsnams pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1563: ha prad nya d+h+rig ces pas byang du don yod
NK084(yu)004:1564: grub pa zhal gsum phyag drug pa g.yas dkar g.yon
NK084(yu)004:1566: ral gri 'khor lo rdo rje g.yas dang dril bu pad+ma rin chen g.yon na bsnams pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1567: m+aum d+ha du shwa ri zhes pas dbus su dbyings
NK084(yu)004:1568: phyug ma mthing ka g.yas yab la 'khyud pa g.yon
NK084(yu)004:1570: lam te sha ra ti zhes pas shar du sangs
NK084(yu)004:1571: rgyas spyan dkar mo g.yas yab la 'khyud pa g.yon
NK084(yu)004:1573: ma mo ha ra ti zhes pas lhor ma ma
NK084(yu)004:1574: ki ser mo g.yas pa yab la 'khyud pa g.yon
NK084(yu)004:1576: pyam ra ga ra ti zhes pas nub tu gos
NK084(yu)004:1577: dkar mo dmar mo g.yas yab la 'khyud pa g.yon
NK084(yu)004:1579: tam badz+ra ra ti zhes pas byang du dam tshig
NK084(yu)004:1580: sgrol ma ljang gu g.yas pa yab la 'khyud pa
NK084(yu)004:1581: g.yon pa dril bu bsnams pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1582: nang gi sems dpa' bzhi ni k+shi hi ra tsa
NK084(yu)004:1583: ya zhes pas shar lho'i rtsibs mchan la sa'i snying
NK084(yu)004:1584: po dkar po g.yas rin chen myu gu g.yon dril
NK084(yu)004:1585: bu bsnams pa'o // tram a kar+b+ha ya lho nub
NK084(yu)004:1586: kyi rtsibs mchan la nam mkha'i snying po ser po
NK084(yu)004:1587: g.yas ral gri g.yon dril bu bsnams pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1588: h+r+ai pad+ma bana d+ha ma nub byang gi rtsibs mchan
NK084(yu)004:1589: la spyan ras gzigs dmar po g.yas pad+ma dkar po
NK084(yu)004:1591: dzim ku ru pa ni hri byang shar gyi rtsibs
NK084(yu)004:1592: mchan la phyag na rdo rje ljang gu g.yas rdo
NK084(yu)004:1593: rje g.yon dril bu bsnams pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1594: h+aum la se sa ma ya s+t+wam la se sgeg
NK084(yu)004:1595: mo dkar mo g.yas me long thogs pa g.yon 'gying
NK084(yu)004:1596: bag gi tshul can sems dpa' sa yi snying po'i
NK084(yu)004:1598: tra ma le sa ma ya ho ma le ma
NK084(yu)004:1599: ser mo 'phreng ba spyi bor 'dren pa nam mkha'i
NK084(yu)004:1600: snying po dang 'khril sbyor du gnas so //
NK084(yu)004:1601: h+r+ai g+hira ti ra go ya ham dbyangs ma dmar
NK084(yu)004:1602: mo pi wam sbreng ba spyan ras gzigs kyi yum
NK084(yu)004:1603: mo // a nira ti ra go ya mi gar
NK084(yu)004:1604: ma ljang gu phyag rgya gar bsgyur ma phyag na
NK084(yu)004:1606: phyi'i sems dpa' yab yum ni me d+ha ra ni
NK084(yu)004:1607: s+w+aa h+aa byams pa dkar po g.yas klu shing g.yon
NK084(yu)004:1608: dril bu can shar lho'i gru chad la'o //
NK084(yu)004:1609: th+l+him sa ram pa ya s+w+aa h+aa lho nub tu
NK084(yu)004:1610: sgrib sel ser po chos kyi 'khor lo dang dril
NK084(yu)004:1611: bu bsnams pa'o // h+aum swa ra tsa ya s+w+aa
NK084(yu)004:1612: h+aa nub byang gi gru chad la kun bzang dmar
NK084(yu)004:1613: po g.yas rin chen snye ma g.yon dril bu'o //
NK084(yu)004:1614: m+aum sh+r+ai a ram ga ya s+w+aa h+aa byang shar
NK084(yu)004:1615: gyi gru chad la 'jam dpal ljang gu g.yas u
NK084(yu)004:1617: dza d+hu pe pra be sha d+hu pe ma dkar
NK084(yu)004:1618: mo spos phor thogs pa byams pa'i yum yin no
NK084(yu)004:1619: // h+aum pu sh+pu a be sha push+pe ma ser
NK084(yu)004:1620: mo me tog thogs pa sgrib sel gyi yum mo
NK084(yu)004:1621: // // bam da pa su ki ni a lo
NK084(yu)004:1622: ke dmar mo mar me thogs pa kun bzang gi
NK084(yu)004:1623: // // yum mo // ho g+han+d+he tsit+ta ho g+ha
NK084(yu)004:1624: n+d+he ma ljang gu dri chab thogs pa 'jam dpal
NK084(yu)004:1625: // // yum mo // gyi yum mo // sgo
NK084(yu)004:1626: ba yab yum ni h+aum ya man+ta krid phata shar
NK084(yu)004:1627: sgor gshin rje gshed zhal gsum phyag drug pa g.yas
NK084(yu)004:1628: ljang g.yon sngo dbus dkar zhal /
NK084(yu)004:1629: phyag dang po gnyis mi mgo gnon pa g.yas gtun shing rdo rje g.yon dbyug to dgra s+t+wa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1630: h+aum biga nan+ta krid phata lhor stobs po che zhal
NK084(yu)004:1631: gsum phyag drug pa g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus sngo
NK084(yu)004:1632: zhal g.yas g.yon dang po gnyis rdo rje gnon pa
NK084(yu)004:1633: g.yas rin chen rdo rje g.yon lcags kyu ral gri'o
NK084(yu)004:1634: // h+aum pad+ma ta krid phata nub tu rta mgrin
NK084(yu)004:1635: zhal gsum phyag drug pa g.yas sngo g.yon dkar dbus
NK084(yu)004:1636: dmar zhal g.yas g.yon dang po gnyis thod pa sbrul
NK084(yu)004:1637: gyis brgyan pa g.yas pad+ma rdo rje g.yon ral gri
NK084(yu)004:1638: // sdigs mdzub bo // h+aum prada dz+ny+aan+ta krid phata
NK084(yu)004:1639: byang du bdud rtsi 'khyil ba zhal gsum phyag drug
NK084(yu)004:1640: pa g.yas dmar g.yon dkar dbus ljang zhal g.yas g.yon
NK084(yu)004:1641: dang po gnyis rdo rje rgya gram g.yas gnyis na
NK084(yu)004:1642: ral gri rdo rje g.yon dril bu dgra sta'o //
NK084(yu)004:1643: ma h+aa badz+ra d+ha ra ma h+aa kro ti shwa ri dz+wa la ni h+aum phata /
NK084(yu)004:1644: shar du gshin rje gshed po'i yum lcags kyu ma'i sngags so //
NK084(yu)004:1645: ma h+aa rat+na d+ha ra ma h+aa kro ti shwa
NK084(yu)004:1646: ri dz+wa la ni h+aum phata lhor stobs po che'i
NK084(yu)004:1647: yum ser mo zhags pa ma'i sngags so //
NK084(yu)004:1648: ma h+aa pad+ma d+ha ra ma h+aa kro ti shwa
NK084(yu)004:1649: ri dz+wa la ni h+aum phata nub tu rta mgrin
NK084(yu)004:1650: gyi yum dmar mo lcags sgrog ma'i sngags so //
NK084(yu)004:1651: ma h+aa karma d+ha ra ma h+aa kra ti shwa
NK084(yu)004:1652: ri dz+wa la ni h+aum phata byang du bdud rtsi
NK084(yu)004:1653: 'khyil ba'i yum ljang gu dril bu ma'i sngags so
NK084(yu)004:1654: // kun bzang yab yum ni h+aum h+aum h+au badz+ra tsit+ta h+aum /
NK084(yu)004:1655: dkyil 'khor shar gyi bar khyams su kun tu bzang
NK084(yu)004:1656: po mthing ka skyil krung mnyam bzhag can du gnas
NK084(yu)004:1657: so // a a a badz+ra b+ha dra sa ma ya /
NK084(yu)004:1658: dkyil 'khor nub kyi bar khyams su kun tu bzang
NK084(yu)004:1659: mo mthing sngon mnyam bzhag gi phyag rgya can no
NK084(yu)004:1661: mu ne krim s+w+aa h+aa byang shar mtshams su lha'i thub pa ser po pi wam thogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1662: mu ne h+aum trum s+w+aa h+aa shar lhor lha ma
NK084(yu)004:1663: yin gyi thub pa ser po go cha thogs pa'o
NK084(yu)004:1664: // mu ne srum s+w+aa h+aa lhor mi'i thub pa ser po gseg shing dang par bu thogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1665: mu ne k+sham s+w+aa h+aa lho nub tu byol song gi thub pa ser po po ti thogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1666: mu ne bram s+w+aa h+aa nub byang du yi dwags
NK084(yu)004:1667: kyi thub pa ser po rat+na'i sgrom bu thogs pa'o
NK084(yu)004:1668: // mu ne ye s+w+aa h+aa byang du dmyal ba'i thub pa ser po me chu thogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1669: gsum pa lha'i tshul la drug ste bzhugs tshul dang /
NK084(yu)004:1676: gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul //
NK084(yu)004:1678: gdan la ni rgyal ba rigs lnga la gdan lnga brtsegs nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
NK084(yu)004:1679: sems dpa' sems ma la nyi zla pad+ma sum brtsegs so //
NK084(yu)004:1680: thub pa la pad+ma rkyang pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1681: kun bzang yab yum la nyi zla pad+ma'o //
NK084(yu)004:1682: sgo ba yab yum la rdo rje'i brag gi steng na nyi ma rkyang pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1683: rdzogs dang zhes pas rigs lnga rdzogs pa'i skyil krung
NK084(yu)004:1684: zhes bya ste rdo rje'i skyil krung du bzhugs pa'o
NK084(yu)004:1685: // sems dpa'i tshul ces pa sems dpa' rnams mdzad
NK084(yu)004:1686: pa ma rdzogs pas phyed dkyil lam babs zhon nam
NK084(yu)004:1687: sems dpa'i bzhugs tshul thub pa 'greng bu'o //
NK084(yu)004:1688: sgo ba brgyad kyi dor thabs so //
NK084(yu)004:1689: yum rnams pad+ma'i skyil krung ngo //
NK084(yu)004:1690: kun tu bzang po mnyam pa'i skyil krung kun tu bzang mo pad+ma'i skyil krung ngo //
NK084(yu)004:1692: 'khor lor rgyal po rgyal mo dang //
NK084(yu)004:1693: g.yas nas mthong thos snom pa dang //
NK084(yu)004:1694: myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs su bcas //
NK084(yu)004:1695: gru chad la ni mthong byed dang //
NK084(yu)004:1696: thos byed snom byed myong byed rnams //
NK084(yu)004:1697: btsun mo'itshogasa dang ldan par gnas //
NK084(yu)004:1698: bar khyams la ni thub drug dang //
NK084(yu)004:1699: mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dang //
NK084(yu)004:1700: bya ba dag ni gnas par bstan //
NK084(yu)004:1701: sgo khyud bzhi la 'joms pa ni //
NK084(yu)004:1702: btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas //
NK084(yu)004:1704: de la 'khor lor ni bzhugs gnas so //
NK084(yu)004:1705: rgyal po ni rigs lnga ste rnam shes las rgyal ba rdo rje sems dpa' /
NK084(yu)004:1706: gzugs kyi phung po las rgyal ba rnam snang /
NK084(yu)004:1707: tshor ba las rgyal ba rin 'byung /
NK084(yu)004:1708: 'du shes las rgyal ba snang mtha' /
NK084(yu)004:1709: 'du byed las rgyal ba don yod grub pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1710: rgyal mo ni yum lnga ste nam mkha' las dbyings phyug ma /
NK084(yu)004:1714: rlung las rgyal ba dam tshig sgrol ma de rnams
NK084(yu)004:1715: dbus na 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi lte ba dang lnga
NK084(yu)004:1716: la bzhugs pa'o // rdo rje sems dpa' g.yas nas
NK084(yu)004:1717: zhes g.yas kyi rtsibs mchan la mthong ba mig gi
NK084(yu)004:1718: rnam par shes pa sa'i snying po dang de nas
NK084(yu)004:1719: g.yas bskor gyi tshul du thasa pa rna ba'i rnam
NK084(yu)004:1720: par shes pa phyag na rdo rje dang /
NK084(yu)004:1721: snom ba sna'i rnam par shes pa spyan ras gzigs dang /
NK084(yu)004:1722: myong ba lce'i rnam par shes pa nam mkha'i snying
NK084(yu)004:1723: po ma rnas 'khor lo'i rtsibs mchan bzhi la bzhugs
NK084(yu)004:1724: pa'o // de rnams nang na gnas pas na nang gi sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
NK084(yu)004:1725: de dang des spyad par bya ba'i yul du gyur
NK084(yu)004:1726: pas na btsun mo'i sgras bstan te mig gis gzugs
NK084(yu)004:1727: la spyod pas na btsun mo'i 'o //
NK084(yu)004:1728: tshogas su bacasa zhes pa ni de rnams dang lhan
NK084(yu)004:1729: cig bzhugs pa'i don te de yang sa'i snying po'i
NK084(yu)004:1731: de bzhin du ma le ma dang gir ti dang
NK084(yu)004:1732: nir ti rnams dang gnyis su med par 'khril ba'i
NK084(yu)004:1734: gru chad la ni phyi'i sems dpa' bzhugs pa ste
NK084(yu)004:1735: mig gi dbang po ni mthong byed la de gnas
NK084(yu)004:1736: gyur pa ni byams pa dang de bzhin du thos
NK084(yu)004:1737: byed rna ba'i dbang po sgrib sel snom byed sna'i
NK084(yu)004:1738: dbang po kun bzang myong byed lce'i dbang po 'jam
NK084(yu)004:1739: dpal rnamas ni gru chad bzhi la bzhugs so //
NK084(yu)004:1740: de bas de bas bzhi po de rnams zhes so //
NK084(yu)004:1741: de dbang po'i phyi na yod pas phyi'i sems dpa' zhes kyang bya'o //
NK084(yu)004:1742: don du na lha la phyi nang med de sems
NK084(yu)004:1743: can gyi rtog tshogs la dgongs pas na sems dpa'
NK084(yu)004:1744: la yang phyi nang gnyis so //
NK084(yu)004:1745: spyad par bya ba'i yul du gyur pas na btsun
NK084(yu)004:1746: mo ste 'das pa dang da ltar dang ma 'ongs
NK084(yu)004:1747: pa dang 'byung bar ma nges dbyar dgun ston dpyid
NK084(yu)004:1748: bzhi la dbang bas na d+hu pe ma dang pu
NK084(yu)004:1749: sh+be ma dang a lo ke dang g+ha n+d+he ma'i
NK084(yu)004:1750: tshogs rnams dang 'khril sbyor dang ldan par gansa so
NK084(yu)004:1751: // bar khyamsa kyi byang shar la ni lha'i thub pa /
NK084(yu)004:1752: shar lho lha ma yin gyi thub pa /
NK084(yu)004:1754: lho nub tu byol song gi thub pa /
NK084(yu)004:1755: nub byang du yi dwags kyi thub pa /
NK084(yu)004:1756: byang du dmyal ba'i thub pa ste drug dang /
NK084(yu)004:1757: bar khyams kyi shar nub gnyis su kun bzang yab
NK084(yu)004:1758: yum gnyis bzhugs pa ni mdun dang rgyab tu zhes
NK084(yu)004:1759: pas bstan te ji ltar na rdo rje sems dpa'i
NK084(yu)004:1760: mdun ngos su byed pa po kun tu bzang po
NK084(yu)004:1761: gnas te yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnas gyur
NK084(yu)004:1762: pa yin pas na sems can gyi dus na byed
NK084(yu)004:1763: pa po thams cad yid sangs rgyas kyi dus na
NK084(yu)004:1764: rgyud dang dkyil 'khor gyi byed pa po thams cad
NK084(yu)004:1765: kun tu bzang po yin no //
NK084(yu)004:1766: rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyab ngos na bya ba mo kun tu bzang mo gnas pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1767: de yang sems can gyi dus na bya ba'i gzhir
NK084(yu)004:1768: gyur pa kun gazhi'o sangs rgyas kyi dus na yang
NK084(yu)004:1770: des yid byed pa po kun tu bzang po dang
NK084(yu)004:1771: chos bya ba mo gnyis yid kyi spyad bya kun
NK084(yu)004:1772: gzhi yin pas na kun bzang yab yum dag tu
NK084(yu)004:1774: sgo khyud bzhi la zhes pa ni g.yas g.yon sgo
NK084(yu)004:1775: khyud la sgo ba bzhi gnas pa ste 'jomas pa
NK084(yu)004:1776: ni reg pa'i rtog pa 'joms pa gshin rje gshed
NK084(yu)004:1777: reg bya stobs po che reg byed rta mgrin reg
NK084(yu)004:1778: shes kyi rtog pa 'joms pa bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'o
NK084(yu)004:1779: // btsun mo ni spyad bya'i yul du gyur pa
NK084(yu)004:1780: ste lus kyi dbang po bzhi rtag pa dang chad
NK084(yu)004:1781: pa dang bdag dang mtshan ma bzhi la dbang bas
NK084(yu)004:1782: na bzhi po de gnas su dag pas ni lcags
NK084(yu)004:1783: kyu ma dang zhags pa ma dang lcags sgrog ma
NK084(yu)004:1784: dang dril bu ma bzhi'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas
NK084(yu)004:1785: // so // de bas na dbang po lnga'i las
NK084(yu)004:1786: byed lta bu ni lus kyi dbang po yin la
NK084(yu)004:1787: lha'i las byed pa yin pas na chos mthun pa'o
NK084(yu)004:1788: // so // // zhi ba'i lha bud+d+ha bzhi bcu
NK084(yu)004:1789: rtsa gnyis zhes bzhed pa yin pa la khro bo
NK084(yu)004:1790: yab yum brgyad yod pas khro bo rnams zhi ba'i
NK084(yu)004:1792: phyir rnal 'byor pas sgrub par bya ba'i zhi ba'i
NK084(yu)004:1793: lha bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi sku gsung thugs kyi
NK084(yu)004:1794: rgyud zhi bas na zhi ba zer la /
NK084(yu)004:1795: sku khro tshul dang bcas 'bar ba'i gar dgus khyab
NK084(yu)004:1796: khro rtags drug cu rtsa brgyad dang ldan pas khro
NK084(yu)004:1797: bo zer ro // 'o na sku gsung thugs kyi
NK084(yu)004:1798: rgyud zhi na sgo ba la khro bo'i ming med
NK084(yu)004:1799: bo zer ro // dam zhe na / 'di ltar
NK084(yu)004:1800: bzhed de zhi ba la ltos na khro bo yin
NK084(yu)004:1801: yang khro bo'i gar dgu dang khro rtags med de
NK084(yu)004:1802: sku khro tshul dang bcas par snang ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:1803: des na 'gal ba med de de bas na cung
NK084(yu)004:1804: zad khro bo lha brgyad ces bya ste stag dang
NK084(yu)004:1805: sbrul gyi rgyan tsam ma bkag go //
NK084(yu)004:1806: dngos su sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud zhi bar gnas so //
NK084(yu)004:1807: de bas na khro bo mi zer te 'joms pa zhes bshad do //
NK084(yu)004:1809: rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che //
NK084(yu)004:1811: ud dpal klu shing la sogs mtshan //
NK084(yu)004:1812: rin chen myu gu ral gri 'bar //
NK084(yu)004:1814: chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen snye //
NK084(yu)004:1815: gzugs mdzes rin chen 'phreng ba dang //
NK084(yu)004:1816: pi wang gar mkhan mchog nyid de //
NK084(yu)004:1817: me tog phreng dang spos mchog ma //
NK084(yu)004:1818: mar me byug pa la sogs pa'i //
NK084(yu)004:1819: las la 'khril zhing chos la bstan //
NK084(yu)004:1821: gong gi phyag rgya chen po bzhin //
NK084(yu)004:1822: gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril //
NK084(yu)004:1823: sgo bzhi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni //
NK084(yu)004:1824: n+rir mgo gdengs dang rdo rje gnon //
NK084(yu)004:1825: thod sbrul chen po gnon pa dang //
NK084(yu)004:1826: rdo rje rgya gram las kyis gnon //
NK084(yu)004:1827: lcags kyu zhags pa spo ta ho //
NK084(yu)004:1828: sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag kyang //
NK084(yu)004:1830: thub drug phyag rgya sna tshogs te //
NK084(yu)004:1831: mdor bsdus phyag rgya drug tu bstan //
NK084(yu)004:1832: gseg par dang ni pi wang dang //
NK084(yu)004:1833: go cha po ti rin chen sgrom //
NK084(yu)004:1834: me dang chu ni rab tu bstan //
NK084(yu)004:1835: yum ni dmigs med chos kyi dbyings //
NK084(yu)004:1836: kun bzang mnyam bzhag ye shes 'phro //
NK084(yu)004:1837: yum gyur mnyam rdzogs pad mo'i dkyil //
NK084(yu)004:1838: gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs te //
NK084(yu)004:1839: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid //
NK084(yu)004:1840: yang na rdo rje thal mo nyid //
NK084(yu)004:1841: ces pas bstan te phyir gnas 'phrog brtsis na zhal
NK084(yu)004:1842: gsum phyag drug tu byed pa ni gong bzhin no
NK084(yu)004:1843: // 'dir g.yas g.yon gyi dang po rnams bshad pa
NK084(yu)004:1844: ste mi bskyod pa'i g.yas dang po na rdo rje
NK084(yu)004:1845: 'dzin pa ni ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'i rtags
NK084(yu)004:1846: // so // rnam par snang mdzad kyi g.yas dang
NK084(yu)004:1847: po na 'khor lo bsnams pa ni nyon mongs pa
NK084(yu)004:1848: thams cad gcod pa'i rtags so //
NK084(yu)004:1849: rin 'byung gi g.yas dang po na rin po che
NK084(yu)004:1850: 'dzin pa ni dgos 'dod re ba thams cad skong
NK084(yu)004:1851: ba'o // snang ba mtha' yas kyi g.yas dang po
NK084(yu)004:1852: na pad+ma bsnams pa ni nyes pa'i skyon gyis ma
NK084(yu)004:1854: don yod grub pa'i g.yas dang po na ral gri
NK084(yu)004:1855: bsnams pa ni rtog pa thams cad rtsad nas gcod
NK084(yu)004:1856: cing mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i rtags so
NK084(yu)004:1857: // g.yon gyi phyag na dril bu bsnams pa ni
NK084(yu)004:1858: shes rab spros pa med pas chos kyi dbyings las
NK084(yu)004:1860: bar ma dang tha ma rnams ni de dag las
NK084(yu)004:1861: gong 'og tu bsgyur te gnas 'phrog brtsis nas byed
NK084(yu)004:1862: pa'o // dril bu 'bar ba yum rnams kyi g.yon na 'dzin no //
NK084(yu)004:1863: g.yas pa rnams rang rang gi yab la 'khyud pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1864: sems dpa' brgyad kyi phyag mtshan ni byang shar mtshams
NK084(yu)004:1865: kyi gru chad la 'jam dpal gyis ud dpal bsnams
NK084(yu)004:1866: pa dang / shar lho mtshams kyi gru chad la
NK084(yu)004:1867: byams pas klu shing dang la sogs mtshan zhes pas
NK084(yu)004:1868: g.yon dril bu bsnams pa ston la /
NK084(yu)004:1869: shar lho mtshams kyi rtsibs mchan la sa'i snying po rin chen myu gu dang /
NK084(yu)004:1870: lho nub mtshams kyi rtsibs mchan la nam mkha'i snying po ral gri 'bar ba dang /
NK084(yu)004:1871: nub byang gi rtsibs mchan la spyan ras gzigs pad+ma dkar po dang /
NK084(yu)004:1872: byang shar gyi rtsibs mchan la phyag na rdo rje rdo rje 'abra ba dang /
NK084(yu)004:1873: lho nub gru chad la sgrib sel gyis chos kyi 'khor lo dang /
NK084(yu)004:1874: nub byang gi gru chad la kun tu bzang pos rin chen snye ma bsnams pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1875: 'dir sems dpa' rnams kyi phyag mtshan gyi skabs su
NK084(yu)004:1876: gzhung 'khrugs pa sdebs te bshad na rnam par shes
NK084(yu)004:1877: pa'i sems dpa' spyi'i phyag mtshan ni sa'i snying po
NK084(yu)004:1878: rin po che'i myu gu 'dzin pa ni dgos 'dod
NK084(yu)004:1880: nam mkha'i snying po ral gri 'dzin pa ni nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1881: spyan ras gzigs pad+ma dkar po 'dzin pa ni nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'i rtags so //
NK084(yu)004:1882: phyag na rdo rje rdo rje bsnams pa ni ye
NK084(yu)004:1883: shes lnga yis nyon mongs pa 'joms pa'i stobs dang
NK084(yu)004:1885: de rnams ni nang gi sems dpa' bzhi'o //
NK084(yu)004:1886: dbang po'i sems dpa' ni byams pa'i phyag na klu
NK084(yu)004:1887: shing gi me tog bsnams pa ni nyon mongs pa'i
NK084(yu)004:1888: gdung ba thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i rtags so
NK084(yu)004:1889: // sgrib pa rnam par sel ba chos kyi 'khor
NK084(yu)004:1890: lo bsnams pa ni rtog pa'i d+r+wa ba thams cad
NK084(yu)004:1892: kun tu bzang po rin po che'i snye ma bsnams
NK084(yu)004:1893: pa ni sems can thams cad la dgos 'dod re
NK084(yu)004:1894: ba yid bzhin du skong ba'i rtags so //
NK084(yu)004:1895: 'jam dpal ud dpal bsnams pa ni chos spyi dang
NK084(yu)004:1896: rang gi mtshan nyid thams cad la 'gag pa med
NK084(yu)004:1897: par mkhyen cing nyes pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i rtags
NK084(yu)004:1898: so // la sogs mtshan ni g.yon rnams na dril bu bsnams pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1899: 'bar ces pa ni phyag mtshan de dag thams cad
NK084(yu)004:1900: snang la rang bzhin med pa gsal la rtog pa
NK084(yu)004:1901: med pa 'gul 'gul ldeg ldeg ltar gsal ba ye
NK084(yu)004:1903: sems ma brgyad kyi phyag mtshan ni lha mo la
NK084(yu)004:1904: se ma gzugsa mdzes me long bsnams nas 'gying bag
NK084(yu)004:1905: tu bzhugs pa ni sa'i snying po dang gnyis su
NK084(yu)004:1906: med pa'i bde bas dgyes pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1907: ma le ma rin chen 'phreng ba thogs pa ni
NK084(yu)004:1908: nam mkha'i snying po dang bde ba rgyun mi 'chad
NK084(yu)004:1909: pa'i rtags dang / gi rti ma pi wanga thogs
NK084(yu)004:1910: pa ni spyan ras gzigs dang gnyis su med pa'i
NK084(yu)004:1911: bde ba'i sgra sgrogs pa'i rtags so //
NK084(yu)004:1912: nirti ma gar mkhan mchog nyid de gar bsgyur ba
NK084(yu)004:1913: ni phyag na rdo rje dang gnyis su med pa'i
NK084(yu)004:1914: ye shes la dbang bsgyur ba'i rtags so //
NK084(yu)004:1915: de dag nang gi sems ma yin pas na nang gi mchod rdzas phyag na bsnams pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1916: push+pe ma me tog gi 'phreng ba thogs pa ni
NK084(yu)004:1917: sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang gnyis su med
NK084(yu)004:1918: pa'i bde bas mtshon par byed pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1919: spos mchog ma'am d+hu pe ma spos thogs pa ni
NK084(yu)004:1920: byams pa dang gnyis su med pa'i bde ba'i 'od
NK084(yu)004:1921: zer 'phros pa'o // a lo lo ke mar me
NK084(yu)004:1922: thogs pa ni kun tu bzang po dang gnyis su
NK084(yu)004:1923: med pa'i bde ba gsal ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:1924: g+han d+he ma dri chab kyi byug pa thogs pa
NK084(yu)004:1925: ni 'jam dpal dang gnyis su med pa'i bde bas
NK084(yu)004:1927: des na phyi'i sems ma yin pas na phyi'i mchod rdzas bsnams pa'i tshul lo //
NK084(yu)004:1928: de la sogs pa'i yum rnams yab las kyi sku
NK084(yu)004:1929: la 'khril zhing yab rnams yum chos kyi rang bzhin
NK084(yu)004:1930: la zhal bstan nas gcig la gcig 'dud pa'i tshul
NK084(yu)004:1931: lo // lha mo de dag ni yab re re
NK084(yu)004:1932: dang yum re re thabs dang shes rab gnyis su
NK084(yu)004:1933: med par sbyor ba re re la yang rang bzhin
NK084(yu)004:1935: de ltar sems dpa' dang sems ma de dag kyang
NK084(yu)004:1936: yum rnams yab kyi sku la gnyis su med par
NK084(yu)004:1937: 'khril ba dang yab kyi dbu rnams zhal 'byo zhing
NK084(yu)004:1938: yum gyi dbu rnams ma zhas 'dud pa'i tshul gyis
NK084(yu)004:1939: yab yum gnyis gcig la gcig bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor
NK084(yu)004:1940: la 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba dang 'dud pa
NK084(yu)004:1941: dang mdzes pa'i tshul gyis dbyings dang ye shes tha
NK084(yu)004:1942: mi dad par snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1943: mdor na gong gi phyag rgya chen po rigs lnga
NK084(yu)004:1944: yab yum rnams las la 'khril zhing chos la bstan
NK084(yu)004:1945: pa'i skabs bzhin sems dpa' yab yum rnams kyang yab
NK084(yu)004:1946: yum gnyis med chos kyi dbyingsa kyi ngang du 'khril
NK084(yu)004:1947: lo // sgo ba bzhi'i phyag rgya ni shar du
NK084(yu)004:1948: gshin rje gshed n+ri mago'am mi mgo'i dbyug pa gdengs
NK084(yu)004:1949: pa ni nyon mongs pa dang bgegs dang log rtog
NK084(yu)004:1951: lhor stobs po che rdo rjesa sa gnon pa ni
NK084(yu)004:1952: nyon mongs pa dang bgegs thams cad lta mi nus
NK084(yu)004:1953: pa'o // nub tu rta mgrin gyis thoda pa sbrul
NK084(yu)004:1954: chen po yis brgyan pa gnon thabs su 'dzin pa
NK084(yu)004:1955: ni bgegs kyi zhe sdang gnas su dag nas chos
NK084(yu)004:1956: kyi dbyings su mkhyen pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:1957: byang du bdud rtsi 'khyil ba rdo rje rgya gram
NK084(yu)004:1958: thogs pa ni 'phrin las rnam bzhi nyid kyis thams
NK084(yu)004:1959: cad kyi don mdzad pa ste de yang gnon thabs
NK084(yu)004:1960: su 'dzin pa'o // de bas na phyag g.yas g.yon
NK084(yu)004:1961: dang po gnyis ni de ltar gnas la gzhan la
NK084(yu)004:1962: zhal gsum phyag drug tu byed na gong du bshad
NK084(yu)004:1963: su 'dzin pa'o // pa bzhin no // lha mo
NK084(yu)004:1964: lcags kyu ma ni thugs rjes sems can mya ngan
NK084(yu)004:1966: zhags pa ma ni sems can thugs rjes drangs nas
NK084(yu)004:1967: 'khor bar mi gtong ba'i brda'i s+pho ta ste lcags
NK084(yu)004:1968: sgrog ma ni sems can de dag bde bar gshegs
NK084(yu)004:1969: pa'i thugs ye shes dbyer med pa'i sa la 'god
NK084(yu)004:1970: pa'o // ho zhes pa dril bu ma ni sems
NK084(yu)004:1971: can de dag phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod
NK084(yu)004:1972: nas bde ba chen pos mnyes pa dang tshim par
NK084(yu)004:1974: sgo bzhir gnas pa khro bo yab yum de dag
NK084(yu)004:1975: kyang thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med par bzhugs
NK084(yu)004:1976: pa ni yab kyis yum la 'dud pa'i tshul dang
NK084(yu)004:1977: yum rnams yab kyi sku la gnyis su med par
NK084(yu)004:1978: 'khril ba ni gong ma rigs lnga dang sems dpa'
NK084(yu)004:1979: rnams kyi skabs su bstan pa bzhin yab yum gnyis
NK084(yu)004:1980: su med pa sgo bzhir gnas pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:1981: thub pa ni sku gsung thugs thub pa ste de
NK084(yu)004:1982: yang sku thub pa rtags dang bya byed spangs pa
NK084(yu)004:1983: dang gsung thub pa ni ngag mi dge ba bzhi
NK084(yu)004:1984: spangs pa dang thugs thub pa ni yid kyi mi
NK084(yu)004:1986: drug ni grangs yin la de dag ni gdul bya
NK084(yu)004:1987: gang la gang ltar mos pa bzhin du don mdzad
NK084(yu)004:1988: pas phyag rgya sna tshogs ma nges pa ste de
NK084(yu)004:1989: yang dal du sgom pa'i dus su sgom bde zhing
NK084(yu)004:1990: ting nge 'dzin gyi dmigs pa gsal ba'i phyir mdor
NK084(yu)004:1991: bsdus nas phyag rgya drug tu bstan pa mi'i thub
NK084(yu)004:1992: pa gsegas shing dang para bu thogs pa ni mi
NK084(yu)004:1993: rnams 'dod chags las blo ldog nas tshul khrims kyi
NK084(yu)004:1994: pha rol tu phyin pa la 'god par mdzad pa'i
NK084(yu)004:1995: rtags dang ni / lha'i thub pas pi wang thogs
NK084(yu)004:1996: pa ni lha rol mo la dga' ba de dag
NK084(yu)004:1997: la 'dul byed kyang gdul bya dang mthun par 'dul
NK084(yu)004:1998: ba ste de yang de dag gi blo le lo
NK084(yu)004:1999: dang g.yeng ba las ldog nas bsam gtan gyi pha
NK084(yu)004:2000: rol tu phyin pa la 'god par mdzad pa dang
NK084(yu)004:2001: rtags dang ni / // lha ma yin gyi thub
NK084(yu)004:2002: pa go cha thogs pa ni de dag la mthun
NK084(yu)004:2003: pa ra bstan nas 'khrug pa'i blo bzlog ste brtson
NK084(yu)004:2004: 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'god par
NK084(yu)004:2005: rtags dang ni / // mdzad do // byol song
NK084(yu)004:2006: gi thub pa po ti thogs pa ni gti mug
NK084(yu)004:2007: gi mun pa de dag par mdzad nas shes rab
NK084(yu)004:2008: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'god par mdzad
NK084(yu)004:2009: rtags dang ni / // mdzad do // do //
NK084(yu)004:2010: yi dwags kyi thub pa rin po che'i sgrom bu
NK084(yu)004:2011: thogs pa ni ser sna'i mdud pa las ldog nas
NK084(yu)004:2012: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'god par mdzad
NK084(yu)004:2013: rtags dang ni / // mdzad do // do //
NK084(yu)004:2014: do // dmyal ba'i thub pa me dang chu ni
NK084(yu)004:2015: 'dzin tshul rab tu bstan pa ni zhe sdang gi
NK084(yu)004:2016: ngo bo las blo ldog nas bzod pa'i pha rol
NK084(yu)004:2017: tu phyin pa la 'god par mdzad do //
NK084(yu)004:2018: thub drug gi yum la don gyi yum dang rtags kyi yum gnyis las /
NK084(yu)004:2019: sprul pa'i sku de dag ni grogs mi bde ba
NK084(yu)004:2020: spongs shing 'dod pa spangs pa'i phyir rtags kyi yum
NK084(yu)004:2021: ni dngos su dmigs su med pas ma bstan la
NK084(yu)004:2022: don gyi yum ni chos kyi dbyingsa dang dus thams
NK084(yu)004:2023: cad du 'bral ba med par bzhugs pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:2024: kun bzang yab yum gyi phyag rgya la kun tu
NK084(yu)004:2025: bzang po ni phyag mnyam bzhag gi steng na phyag
NK084(yu)004:2026: sor las ye shes lnga'i 'od zer 'phro zhing zhabs
NK084(yu)004:2027: brtul zhugs kyi skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:2028: de'i yum du gyur pa ni kun tu bzang mo
NK084(yu)004:2029: ste phyag mnyam rdzogas sam mnyam par bzhag pa las
NK084(yu)004:2030: mdzub mo gnyis rtse sprad nas bzhugs shing zhabs pad
NK084(yu)004:2031: mo' skyil krung ste zhabs mthil gnyis sprad nas bzhugs
NK084(yu)004:2032: pa'o // gzhan yang phyag rgya ma nges sna tshogs
NK084(yu)004:2033: gnas pa sta rigs lnga spyi'i phyag rgya'am yang na
NK084(yu)004:2034: de bzhin gshegsa pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag
NK084(yu)004:2035: rgya nyid dam yang na rdo rje thal mo yi
NK084(yu)004:2038: mthing ka dkar po ser le brgan //
NK084(yu)004:2039: ljang gu la sogs sna tshogs pa'i //
NK084(yu)004:2041: spyir sku mdog la gnyis te /
NK084(yu)004:2042: rang bzhin gyi sku mdog dang /
NK084(yu)004:2044: de la rang bzhin gyi sku mdog ni snum pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:2048: de yang nyes pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pa dung lta bu dang /
NK084(yu)004:2049: snum la 'dril ba me tog ku mud ta lta bu dang /
NK084(yu)004:2050: gsal ba nyi ma lta bu /
NK084(yu)004:2051: dang zhing gsal ba zla ba lta bu /
NK084(yu)004:2052: 'tsher ba gangs la nyi ma shar ba lta bu'o //
NK084(yu)004:2053: de rnams ni spyir khyab la rigs kyi sku mdog ni rigs lnga dang rigs chung ngo //
NK084(yu)004:2054: rigs lnga ni mthing ka ni don chos kyi dbyings
NK084(yu)004:2055: la nyon mongs pas ma bslad pas mi 'gyur ba'o
NK084(yu)004:2056: // de yang kun tu bzang po yab yum dang
NK084(yu)004:2057: mi bskyod pa yab yum sku mdog mthing kar bzhugs
NK084(yu)004:2058: // pa'o // de ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi sku mdog go //
NK084(yu)004:2059: dakara po ni nyes pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pa
NK084(yu)004:2060: ste rnam snang yab yum dang sa'i snying po yab
NK084(yu)004:2061: yum dang lha'i thub pa'i sku mdog go //
NK084(yu)004:2062: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs so //
NK084(yu)004:2063: ser po ni che ba'i yon tan rgyas pa'i rtags
NK084(yu)004:2064: te rin chen 'byung ldan yab yum dang nam mkha'i
NK084(yu)004:2065: snying po yab yum dang mi'i thub pa'i sku mdog
NK084(yu)004:2066: ste de ni rin chen rigs so //
NK084(yu)004:2067: le bargana nam dmar po ni thugs rjes 'gro ba'i
NK084(yu)004:2068: don la chags pa'i rtags te snang ba mtha' yas
NK084(yu)004:2069: yab yum dang spyan ras gzigs yab yum dang yi
NK084(yu)004:2070: dwags kyi thub pa'i sku mdog ste de ni pad
NK084(yu)004:2071: ma'i rigs so // ljang gu ni 'phrin las bzhis
NK084(yu)004:2072: 'gro ba thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'i rtags te
NK084(yu)004:2073: don yod grub pa yab yum dang phyag na rdo
NK084(yu)004:2074: rje yab yum dang dmyal ba'i thub pa'i sku mdog
NK084(yu)004:2075: ste de ni las kyi rigs so //
NK084(yu)004:2076: rigs chung ni la sogs zhes pas kha dog nyi
NK084(yu)004:2077: shu rtsa lnga'am yang mthing ka rdo rje sems dpa'
NK084(yu)004:2078: yab yum nam mkha'i snying po yab yum sgrib sel
NK084(yu)004:2079: yab yum kun bzang yab yum mo //
NK084(yu)004:2080: dkar po ni rnam snang yab yum dang sa snying dang byams pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:2081: ser po ni rin 'byung dang thub pa drug go //
NK084(yu)004:2082: dmar po ni snang ba mtha' yas dang spyan ras gzigs kun bzang ngo //
NK084(yu)004:2083: ljang gu ni don yod grub pa dang phyag na rdo rje dang 'jam dpal yab yum gyi'o //
NK084(yu)004:2084: sgo ba bzhi phyogs mthun no //
NK084(yu)004:2085: sna tshogs pa'i zhes pa ni rang rang ma 'dres par gsal ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:2086: lnga pa zhi tshul dgu ni /
NK084(yu)004:2087: mnyes lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can //
NK084(yu)004:2088: gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi brjid ldan //
NK084(yu)004:2090: de la zhi ba'i tshul dgu las sku'i tshul rnam
NK084(yu)004:2091: pa lnga ni mnyena pa ni zhe sdang dag pas
NK084(yu)004:2092: rin po che gser lta bu ste gyong po dang
NK084(yu)004:2093: khengs pa lta bu ni ma yin no //
NK084(yu)004:2094: lcug pa ni khong khro dag pas 'bras sa lu'i
NK084(yu)004:2095: ljang bu lta bu ste de yang rengs pa lta
NK084(yu)004:2097: 'khril ba ni 'dod chags dag pas dper na sbrul
NK084(yu)004:2098: lta bu ste yab yum thabs dang shes rab gnyis
NK084(yu)004:2100: so sor bzhugs pa lta bu ni ma yin no //
NK084(yu)004:2101: ldem pa ni nga rgyal dag pas ljon shing lta
NK084(yu)004:2102: bu ste kyog po dang yon po lta bu ni
NK084(yu)004:2103: spangs pa'o // gzhon tshul can ni gti mug dag
NK084(yu)004:2104: pas byis pa lo brgyad lon pa lta bu ste
NK084(yu)004:2105: gzhon sha chags pa'o rgan po khogs pa lta bu
NK084(yu)004:2107: sku mdog gi tshul ni gasla ba ni phrag dog
NK084(yu)004:2108: dag pas tshes bco lnga'i zla ba lta bu ste
NK084(yu)004:2109: mog mog po'am nag nag po ni ma yin no
NK084(yu)004:2110: // 'tsher ba ni ser sna dag pas nyi ma'i
NK084(yu)004:2111: snying po lta bu ste phyogs gcig pa'am mi gcig
NK084(yu)004:2112: pa lta bu ni ma yin no //
NK084(yu)004:2113: lhun sdug pa ni bdag 'dzin dag pas ri bo
NK084(yu)004:2114: lta bu ste stur stur po ni ma yin no
NK084(yu)004:2115: // gzi brjid dang ldan pa ni zhen pa dag
NK084(yu)004:2116: pas nor bu lta bu ste ma 'dres la gsal
NK084(yu)004:2117: ba'i nor bu 'ching bu lta bu ni ma yin
NK084(yu)004:2118: // no // lha tshogs rnams kyi sku ni de ltar lta bas chog mi shes par bzhugs pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:2122: mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi //
NK084(yu)004:2123: dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis rdzogs //
NK084(yu)004:2125: de yang sku'i ba spu'i bu ga gcig nas yang
NK084(yu)004:2126: 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu
NK084(yu)004:2127: drug cu 'byung zhing 'phro ba dang zhal gyi mdzod
NK084(yu)004:2128: spu nas 'od zer kha dog mi 'dra ba nyi
NK084(yu)004:2129: shu rtsa lnga'i tshogs chen po 'phro ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:2130: de ni zhi ba'i sprul pa ste de nyid gnas
NK084(yu)004:2131: gyur pas khro bo'i dus kyi me dpung ni sgo
NK084(yu)004:2132: bzhi na gnas pa'i khro bo bzhi las kyang nyon
NK084(yu)004:2133: mongs pa bsreg pa'i me dpung bskal pa 'jig pa'i
NK084(yu)004:2134: dus kyi me lta bu ye shes kyi me dpung
NK084(yu)004:2135: rab tu 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khril pa ste /
NK084(yu)004:2136: de yang ye shes kyi me yin pas na me
NK084(yu)004:2137: lce 'phreng ba ltar brgyus nas me dpung du 'khril
NK084(yu)004:2138: zhing 'bar ba'o // phyi rol na yang ye shes kyi me dpung 'bar ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:2139: de yang nam mkhas gar khyab sar chos kyi dbyings
NK084(yu)004:2140: kyis khyab la chos kyi dbyings kyis gar khyab sar
NK084(yu)004:2141: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rtogs pa'i rtags su
NK084(yu)004:2142: lha'i gzhal yas khang gis mtha' dang dbus med par
NK084(yu)004:2143: khyab pa yi tshul du snang ste de bas na
NK084(yu)004:2144: rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid blos bsam gyis
NK084(yu)004:2145: mi khyab pas mtha' yas zhing 'bad rtsol med par
NK084(yu)004:2147: bzhi pa nus pa dang ldan par bya ba ni /
NK084(yu)004:2148: ma h+aa sh+au nya ta dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+ha wa ad ma ko&a ham /
NK084(yu)004:2149: zhes pas bdag gi spyi bor rin po che'i khang
NK084(yu)004:2150: bu'i nang du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la las rnam
NK084(yu)004:2151: par snang mdzad sku tshon gang ba gcig la sku
NK084(yu)004:2152: mdog dkar po byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can
NK084(yu)004:2153: bsam mo // ma h+aa a dar+sha dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+ha wa at+ma ko&a ham /
NK084(yu)004:2154: bdag gi dpral ba'i ngos su rin po che'i khang
NK084(yu)004:2155: bu'i nang du nyi zla pad+ma'i steng du h+aum las
NK084(yu)004:2156: rdo rje sems dpa' mthing ga sa gnon gyi phyag
NK084(yu)004:2158: ma h+aa sa man+ta dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+ha wa at+ma ko&a ham /
NK084(yu)004:2159: bdag gi ltag pa g.yas su rin po che'i khang
NK084(yu)004:2160: bu'i nang du nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la swa las
NK084(yu)004:2161: rin chen 'byung ldan ser po sbyin gtong gi phyag
NK084(yu)004:2163: ma h+aa pra t+ya be k+sha na dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+ha ba ad ma ko&a ham /
NK084(yu)004:2164: bdag gi ltag khung du rin po che'i khang bu'i
NK084(yu)004:2165: nang du nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan steng du a las
NK084(yu)004:2166: snang ba mtha' yas dmar po mnyam bzhag gi phyag
NK084(yu)004:2168: ma h+aa kri t+ya a nu ta na dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+ha wa at+ma ko & ham /
NK084(yu)004:2169: bdag gi ltag pa g.yon du rin po che'i khang
NK084(yu)004:2170: bu'i nang du nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan steng du ha
NK084(yu)004:2171: las don yod grub pa ljang gu skyabs sbyin gyi
NK084(yu)004:2173: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ka ya badz+ra swa b+ha wa at+ma ko&a ham /
NK084(yu)004:2174: bdag gi klad pa'i dung khang du 'khor lo rtsibs
NK084(yu)004:2175: brgyad kyi steng du las rnam par snang mdzad du
NK084(yu)004:2176: bsam mo // sarba ta th+aa ga ta wak+ka badz+ra swa b+ha wa at+ma ko&a ham /
NK084(yu)004:2177: bdag gi lce stengs su pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyi steng du a las snang ba mtha' yas bsam mo //
NK084(yu)004:2178: sarba ta th+aa ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+ha wa at+ma ko&a ham /
NK084(yu)004:2179: bdag gi thugs kyi dpal be'u zur brgyad steng du h+aum las rdo rje sems dpa' bsam mo //
NK084(yu)004:2180: sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga //
NK084(yu)004:2181: dbang dang byin rlabs kun bsdus thim //
NK084(yu)004:2182: dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal bar gyur //
NK084(yu)004:2183: zhes pas de nas yab yum sbyor ba byas pa'i
NK084(yu)004:2184: sbyor mtshams nas ye shes kyi 'od zer 'phros pas
NK084(yu)004:2185: 'og min nas rigs lnga mdun gyi nam mkhar spyan
NK084(yu)004:2186: drangs nas yab yum sbyor ba byas pa'i byang sems
NK084(yu)004:2187: las rig pa'i lha mo bum pa thogs pa mang
NK084(yu)004:2188: pos bdag la chu blug ste dbang bskur bas dbang
NK084(yu)004:2189: rtags su rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan bzhugs par bsam /
NK084(yu)004:2190: bde bar gshegs pa rigs lngas ye shes lnga'i dbang bskur ba dang /
NK084(yu)004:2191: sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs kun bsdus nas thim pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:2192: dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs thams cad 'od kyi rang bzhin du kun tu gsal bar gyur pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:2193: de la lha re re la dbu rgyan lnga bsam
NK084(yu)004:2194: ste rang rang gi rigs kyis gtso bo byas pa
NK084(yu)004:2196: thub pa drug la mi byed de ci phyir zhe na /
NK084(yu)004:2198: thub drug sprul pa'i skur gnas pas //
NK084(yu)004:2199: byin rlabs dbu rgyan ma gsungs so //
NK084(yu)004:2200: zhes pas 'dod pa'i yon tan spangs pa'i tshul yin
NK084(yu)004:2201: pas chags lam gyi dbang mi bzhed pa dang sprul
NK084(yu)004:2202: sku'i tshul du bzhugs pas dbu rgyan mi bzhed pa
NK084(yu)004:2203: la dgongs so // bzhi pa bsgom pa'i che ba ni /
NK084(yu)004:2204: sa la sogs las phyag rgyar byas //
NK084(yu)004:2205: rnam grol rim pa thob 'gyur na //
NK084(yu)004:2206: dag pa'i ye shes kyis sbyangs bas //
NK084(yu)004:2207: smos ci dgos te de nyid yin //
NK084(yu)004:2209: sa la sku gdung btab pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:2210: lder tsho byas pa dang ras sam dar la ris
NK084(yu)004:2211: su bris pa dang thags su btags pa'am rdo'am shing
NK084(yu)004:2212: la 'bur du brkos pa dang gser dngus zangs lcags
NK084(yu)004:2213: la lugs su blugs nas lhas phyag rgyar byas pas
NK084(yu)004:2214: kyang de'i don las 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las rnam
NK084(yu)004:2215: par grol nas 'bras bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i
NK084(yu)004:2216: go 'phang gi rim pa thob par 'gyur na /
NK084(yu)004:2217: 'dir dang por de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin
NK084(yu)004:2218: gzung 'dzin dag pa'i ye shes kyis chos thams cad
NK084(yu)004:2219: rang bzhin med pa don dam pa chos kyi dbyings
NK084(yu)004:2221: kun tu snang gis dngos po thams cad rang bzhin med pa ye shes sgyu mar sbyangs pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:2222: rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yig 'brur sbyangs pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:2223: phyag rgya gcig pas rang gi lus ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs su sbyangs pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:2224: spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis spyod yul thams cad
NK084(yu)004:2225: lha dang lha mo'i rang bzhin du sbyangs pas na
NK084(yu)004:2226: 'bras bu thob pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te
NK084(yu)004:2227: ting nge 'dzin te mngon du gyur pa de kho
NK084(yu)004:2228: na nyid 'bras bu ye shes yina pas 'bras bu
NK084(yu)004:2229: gzhan nas btsal du med pa'i phyir ro //
NK084(yu)004:2230: gnyis pa ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs pa la sogs pa la gnyis te /
NK084(yu)004:2233: dang po spyan drangs pa la drug ste /
NK084(yu)004:2235: tshig gis spyan drangs pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:2236: sngags kyis spyan drangs pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:2237: rig pa'i me tog dor ba dang /
NK084(yu)004:2240: dang po dam bca' ba ni /
NK084(yu)004:2241: phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal bskyed la //
NK084(yu)004:2242: dbang bskur byin rlabs rdzogs byas te //
NK084(yu)004:2243: sto nga gsum nyungs 'brur gzhugs tshul gyis //
NK084(yu)004:2244: dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drangs mchod //
NK084(yu)004:2246: de ltar phyag rgya lha'i dkyil 'khor dam tshig pa
NK084(yu)004:2247: gsal bar bskyed la de la ye shes lngas dbang
NK084(yu)004:2248: bskur ba dang sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs
NK084(yu)004:2249: pa rdzogs par byas la spyan drangs pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:2250: ting nge 'dzin gyis bskyed pa'i gzhal yas khang der
NK084(yu)004:2251: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor mi shong zhe na
NK084(yu)004:2252: / lha'i rdzu 'phrul gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen
NK084(yu)004:2253: po mi mjed 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nyung
NK084(yu)004:2254: 'brur te nyung 'bru gcig gi nang du gzhugs kyang
NK084(yu)004:2255: nyung 'bru yang cher ma 'phel la stong gsum gyi
NK084(yu)004:2256: stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang chung du
NK084(yu)004:2257: mi 'gro bar chud pa de'i tshul du ting nge
NK084(yu)004:2258: 'dzin gyis bskyed pa'i gzhal yas khang der ye shes
NK084(yu)004:2259: kyi dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis spyan drangs nas
NK084(yu)004:2260: bzhugs kyang gzhal yas khang cher ma 'phel la ye
NK084(yu)004:2261: shes kyi dkyil 'khor de chung du 'grib pa ma
NK084(yu)004:2262: / yin no // de'i phyir na gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ngo mtshar che ba yin no //
NK084(yu)004:2263: 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang nas rang
NK084(yu)004:2264: bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la
NK084(yu)004:2265: mchoda pa'i bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab pas mchod
NK084(yu)004:2267: phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che //
NK084(yu)004:2268: mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas //
NK084(yu)004:2269: dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drangs so //
NK084(yu)004:2270: rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la //
NK084(yu)004:2271: 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor bas //
NK084(yu)004:2272: phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi //
NK084(yu)004:2273: bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor kun tu rdzogs //
NK084(yu)004:2274: nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog /
NK084(yu)004:2276: gang spyan drangs na phyogs bcu dus bzhis bsdus pa'i
NK084(yu)004:2277: dkyil 'khor ni bdag nyid che ba'am chen po'i rang
NK084(yu)004:2278: bzhin lhun grub tu gnas pa ste gzhan las 'phags
NK084(yu)004:2279: pa'o // de yang phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i dkyil 'khor
NK084(yu)004:2280: ma lus pa thams cad ni bdag nyid chen por
NK084(yu)004:2281: sangs rgyas pa'i bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po'i rnam par
NK084(yu)004:2282: pa'o // spyan drang ngo // yul gang nas spyan
NK084(yu)004:2283: drangs na phan tshun dang yul dang yul can lta
NK084(yu)004:2284: bu mi damgas pa'i rang bzhin spros bral chos kyi
NK084(yu)004:2285: dbyings kyi ye shes nyid ni thugsa kyi dkyil 'akhara
NK084(yu)004:2286: ye shes lngar snang ba ste de ni dus gsum
NK084(yu)004:2287: gyi rgyal ba thams cad bzhugs pa'i gnas yin te
NK084(yu)004:2288: pa'o // spyan drang ngo // / gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes nyid //
NK084(yu)004:2289: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
NK084(yu)004:2291: gnas de nas ngo bo gang spyan drangs na dkyil
NK084(yu)004:2292: rdo rje sems dpa' la 'khor bud+d+ha bzhi bcu tham
NK084(yu)004:2293: pas bskor ba'i bud+d+ha bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po thams
NK084(yu)004:2295: gang du spyan drangs na rang rig pa'i snang ba las byung ba dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'dir /
NK084(yu)004:2296: dgos ched ci'i phyir spyan drangs na dam tshig pa
NK084(yu)004:2297: dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gnyis dbyer med pa'i
NK084(yu)004:2298: dkyil 'khor la rig pa la rig pa 'jug dam
NK084(yu)004:2299: tshig pa dang ye shes pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i
NK084(yu)004:2300: phyir te de yang rang snang la ye shes kyi
NK084(yu)004:2301: lha 'jug pa'i matshana nyid dam 'jug lugs ni bdag
NK084(yu)004:2302: dang lha mnyam par sbyor bas so //
NK084(yu)004:2303: 'bras bu ci 'grub na phyogs bcu dus bzhi kun
NK084(yu)004:2304: nas gshegas pa yi 'gro ba'i don yongs su rdzogs
NK084(yu)004:2305: par mdzad pa'i rgyal ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po
NK084(yu)004:2306: de dag thams cad bdag gis tshe snga ma'i dus
NK084(yu)004:2307: phan chad du bsnyen bsnyen bsgrubs bsgrubs pa'i dkyil 'khor
NK084(yu)004:2308: yin pas lha dang bsnyen pa kun tu rdzogsa par
NK084(yu)004:2309: phul bas na da ltar gyi dus na bdag dkyil
NK084(yu)004:2310: 'khor gyi lha dang nye bar gyur pa'i phyir dang
NK084(yu)004:2311: rgyal ba de dag 'gro ba'i don mdzad par thugs
NK084(yu)004:2312: dam du zhal gyis bzhes pa las mi 'da' ba'i
NK084(yu)004:2313: dam tshig mchog gi dbang gis bdag gi don mdzad
NK084(yu)004:2314: pa'i phyir gnas 'dir byon pa yin no //
NK084(yu)004:2316: e ha ya hi b+ha ga wan /
NK084(yu)004:2317: ma h+aa ka ru ni ka dri sha ya ho /
NK084(yu)004:2321: e ha ya hi ni kye tshur spyon b+ha ga
NK084(yu)004:2322: wan bcom ldan 'das ma h+aa ka ru ni ka
NK084(yu)004:2323: thugs rje chen pos dri sha ya ho gzigs shig
NK084(yu)004:2324: /sa ma ya s+t+wam dam tshig la dgongs /
NK084(yu)004:2325: dzahh+aum bam ho lha mo bzhi'o //
NK084(yu)004:2327: me tog dor la dngos grub gsol //
NK084(yu)004:2328: gnyis med thim bzhugs nyes par bya //
NK084(yu)004:2330: am badz+ra sa ma ya am /
NK084(yu)004:2331: h+aum badz+ra sa ma ya h+aum /
NK084(yu)004:2332: swa badz+ra sa ma ya swa /
NK084(yu)004:2333: ha badz+ra sa ma ya ha /
NK084(yu)004:2335: rig pa'i me tog dor la rang la sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bskul bar bya ba ste /
NK084(yu)004:2336: de ltar mdun gyi nam mkhar byon pa la rig
NK084(yu)004:2337: pa'i me tog dor bas lha dang bdag dbyer med
NK084(yu)004:2338: par rtogs nas sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub gsol
NK084(yu)004:2339: phyir gnyis su med par thim nas bdag dngos grub
NK084(yu)004:2340: ma thob bar du brtan par bzhugs su gsol nas
NK084(yu)004:2341: ma skyes rdo rje thabs kyi ye shes ni zhes
NK084(yu)004:2342: pas phyag 'tshal la mnyes par bya'o //
NK084(yu)004:2343: de yang dkyil la 'khor gnyis kyi sku gsung thugs
NK084(yu)004:2344: yon ta na 'phrin las dbyer med par gsal ba
NK084(yu)004:2345: la rig pa'i me tog dor zhes bya ste sngags
NK084(yu)004:2346: ni badz+ra rdo rje sa ma ya dam tshig sku
NK084(yu)004:2347: ste don du sku rdo rje dang dbyer med par
NK084(yu)004:2348: gyur cig pa'o // de bzhin du am badz+ra rdo
NK084(yu)004:2349: rje sa ma ya dam tshig am gsung ste gsung
NK084(yu)004:2350: rdo rje dang dbyer med par gyur cig /h+aum badz+ra
NK084(yu)004:2351: rdo rje sa ma ya dam tshig h+aum thugs te
NK084(yu)004:2352: thugs rdo rje dang dbyer med par gyur cig /swa
NK084(yu)004:2353: badz+ra yon tan rdo rje sa ma ya dam tshig
NK084(yu)004:2354: swa yon tan te yon tan rdo rje dang dbyer
NK084(yu)004:2355: med par 'gyur cig /ha badz+ra rdo rje sa ma
NK084(yu)004:2356: ya dam tshig ha phrin las te 'phrin las rdo
NK084(yu)004:2357: rje dang dbyer med par gyur cig ces so //
NK084(yu)004:2363: ye shes lnga badz+ra rdo rje sa ma ya dam
NK084(yu)004:2364: tshig h+aum bsdu ba ste nam mkha' ye shes kyi
NK084(yu)004:2365: dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub gsol zhes dngos grub bskul
NK084(yu)004:2366: ba'i sngags so // ye shes lnga badz+ra rdo rje
NK084(yu)004:2367: sa ma ya dam tshig s+t+wam sbyor ba ste dngos
NK084(yu)004:2368: grub gsol ba'i dus la babs pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:2369: ye shes lnga badz+ra rdo rje sa ma ya dam
NK084(yu)004:2370: tshig ho dgyes par rol pa ste dngos grub gsol
NK084(yu)004:2371: ba la dgyes par dgongs shig ces so //
NK084(yu)004:2374: zhes phyag rgya bzhis dgug gzhug bya zhing dgyes pa bskyed pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:2375: gnyis pa mchod pa la brgyad de /
NK084(yu)004:2376: phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa dang //
NK084(yu)004:2377: lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dang /
NK084(yu)004:2384: dang po phyag rgya la gsum ste cig char ba phyi'i phyag rgya dang /
NK084(yu)004:2385: snyoms 'jug gsang ba'i phyag rgya dang /
NK084(yu)004:2386: rim gyis pa nang gi phyag rgya'o //
NK084(yu)004:2387: dang po cig char ba la gsum ste /
NK084(yu)004:2390: phyag rgya spyi'i nges tshig zhar byung ngo //
NK084(yu)004:2392: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i mngon rdzogs pa'i //
NK084(yu)004:2393: dbang po'i yul du gang gyur pa //
NK084(yu)004:2394: mnyam pa'i ngang du rtogs gsal na //
NK084(yu)004:2395: thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgya //
NK084(yu)004:2397: de la sgyu ma ni shes rab yum gyi cha
NK084(yu)004:2398: 'phrul pa ni thabs yab kyi cha d+r+wa ba ni
NK084(yu)004:2399: de gnyis 'brel ba'i don yin pas rgyal ba bzhi
NK084(yu)004:2400: bcu rtsa gnyis po thams cad thabs shes rab dbyer
NK084(yu)004:2401: med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i don
NK084(yu)004:2402: te rang rig pas mngon sum du gsal zhing rtogs
NK084(yu)004:2403: pa na dbang po'i yul du gang gyur pa yi
NK084(yu)004:2404: chos thams cad sangs ma rgyas pa gcig kyang med
NK084(yu)004:2405: de / de yang phung po dang dbang po dang
NK084(yu)004:2406: rnam par shes pa thams cad thabs kyi rang bzhin
NK084(yu)004:2408: 'byung ba dang yul dang dus thams cad ni shes
NK084(yu)004:2409: rab kyi rang bzhin yum gyi dkyil 'khor te des
NK084(yu)004:2410: na de dag thams cad thabs shes rab gnyis su
NK084(yu)004:2411: med pa byang chub sems mnyam pa'i ngang du lta
NK084(yu)004:2412: bas rtogs shing ting nge 'dzin gyis gsal na 'khor
NK084(yu)004:2413: 'das kyi chos thams cad de ltar rtogs pa'i ngang
NK084(yu)004:2414: de las mi 'da' ba la byang chub mchog gi
NK084(yu)004:2416: de yang tshig rkang dang pos phyag rgya'i don gnas
NK084(yu)004:2417: thabs dang tshig rkang bar ma gnyis kyi lam rtogs
NK084(yu)004:2418: thabs dang tha mas 'bras bu'i ngo bo bstan pa'o
NK084(yu)004:2420: bskyod chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su //
NK084(yu)004:2421: thabs dang shes rab thams cad kun //
NK084(yu)004:2423: bsgul bskyod thams cad phyag rgya yin //
NK084(yu)004:2424: zhes pa ste ngo bo gang sgom na bskyod chen ni lus kyi yan lag lnga'o //
NK084(yu)004:2425: de ltar 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud dang bcas
NK084(yu)004:2426: pa'i gzhal yas khang du bsgom pa ni bzhugs pa'i
NK084(yu)004:2427: gnas so // gzhal yas khang de rnams su thabs
NK084(yu)004:2428: yab dang shes rab yum thams cad de'i 'khor dang
NK084(yu)004:2429: bcas pa kun bsgom pa ni dbu la de bzhin
NK084(yu)004:2430: gshegs pa'i rigs yab yum bcu /
NK084(yu)004:2431: lag pa g.yas pa la rdo rje'i rigs yab yum bcu /
NK084(yu)004:2432: lag pa g.yon pa la rin po che'i rigs yab yum bcu /
NK084(yu)004:2433: rkang pa g.yas pa la las kyi rigs yab yum bcu /
NK084(yu)004:2434: rkang pa g.yon pa la pad+ma'i rigs yab yum bcu bsgom mo //
NK084(yu)004:2435: de yang rngam glog 'khor lo bkod pa'i mdo las /
NK084(yu)004:2436: lag g.yas rdo rje mi bskyod pa //
NK084(yu)004:2437: lag g.yon rin chen sems dpa' ste //
NK084(yu)004:2438: rkang g.yas las kyi sems dpa' la //
NK084(yu)004:2439: rkang g.yon pad+ma'i sems dpa' yin //
NK084(yu)004:2440: dbu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs //
NK084(yu)004:2442: rnam pa ji ltar sgom na sku de yang gsal
NK084(yu)004:2443: zhing 'od zera 'phro bar bsgoms shing gsal na de
NK084(yu)004:2444: ltar bsgoms pa'i yon tan ni rang gi lus kyis
NK084(yu)004:2445: bsgul bskyod byas pa thams cad lha'i phyag rgya yin
NK084(yu)004:2446: no // ci ste na rig pa ni lus kyi
NK084(yu)004:2447: yan lag thams cad yi dam lha'i skur gsal ba'i
NK084(yu)004:2448: ngang las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro //
NK084(yu)004:2450: gsang ba de nyid nges pa las /
NK084(yu)004:2453: gong du bshad pa de lta bu'i spyod yul thams
NK084(yu)004:2454: cad lha'i dkyil 'khor du gsal ba ni skye bo
NK084(yu)004:2455: dang theg pa 'og ma thams cad kyi spyod yul
NK084(yu)004:2456: du ma gyur pas gsang ba dang /
NK084(yu)004:2457: de kho na nyid nges pa'i don rgyu 'bras las
NK084(yu)004:2458: 'das pa'i rang bzhin yin la de ni phyag rgya
NK084(yu)004:2459: thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur pas na phyag rgya'i
NK084(yu)004:2460: snying po'am snying pa'i phyag rgya ste /
NK084(yu)004:2461: chos thams cad don gyi snying po'i ngang de las mi 'da' ba'i phyir na 'da' dka' 'o //
NK084(yu)004:2462: de yang tshig rkang dang pos khungs gang yin dang gnyis pas nges tshig ji ltar yin bstan pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:2463: gnyis pa snyoms 'jug gsang ba'i phyag rgya ni /
NK084(yu)004:2464: dang mum gnyis rtse sbyar te //
NK084(yu)004:2465: 'bru brgyad bsnol nas rtse sprad pa //
NK084(yu)004:2466: rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor bas //
NK084(yu)004:2467: bde ba chen po 'byin pa'i rgya //
NK084(yu)004:2469: bdag kun tu bzang por bsgom mkha' rdo rje rtse
NK084(yu)004:2470: lngar bsgom rdo rje'i rtse mor dang rwa ltag tu
NK084(yu)004:2471: h+aum dang swa dang a dang ha bsam /
NK084(yu)004:2472: yum kun tu bzang mor bsgom mkha' pad+ma 'dab bzhir
NK084(yu)004:2473: bsgom dbus su mum bsam 'dab ma bzhi la lam
NK084(yu)004:2474: mam pam tam bsam de nas rdo rje dang pad+ma
NK084(yu)004:2475: gnyis rtse sbyar bas dang mum sbyar pad+ma dang rwa
NK084(yu)004:2476: 'byor te 'abru brgyad bsnol nas rtse sprad pa ni
NK084(yu)004:2477: dus gsum gyi rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par sbyor
NK084(yu)004:2478: ba byas pas bde ba chen po byang chub kyi
NK084(yu)004:2480: de ni lhag pa byang chub sems kyis dbang bsgyur ba'i phyag rgya yin la /
NK084(yu)004:2481: 'dir lag pa g.yas g.yon sor mo bsnol la rtse sprad nas bsgom par bya'o //
NK084(yu)004:2482: gsum pa rim gyis pa la gnyis te /
NK084(yu)004:2484: lha so so'i phyag rgya bca' thabs so //
NK084(yu)004:2486: mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge //
NK084(yu)004:2487: rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge //
NK084(yu)004:2488: lnga gnyis zung du spros pa las //
NK084(yu)004:2489: sbyar bas phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu //
NK084(yu)004:2491: lag pa g.yas pa mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin gyi
NK084(yu)004:2492: sor mo'i bre kha lnga la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
NK084(yu)004:2493: sen zlum tsam pa lnga sgom /
NK084(yu)004:2494: de'i steng du gung mo la yi ge mdzub mo
NK084(yu)004:2495: la h+aum srin lag la a the'u chung la swa
NK084(yu)004:2496: mthe bong la ha bsam mo //
NK084(yu)004:2497: lag pa g.yon pa rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rang
NK084(yu)004:2498: bzhin du bsgoms pa'i sor mo'i bre kha lnga la
NK084(yu)004:2499: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sen zlum tsam pa lnga'i steng
NK084(yu)004:2500: du gung mo la yi ge lam mdzub mo la
NK084(yu)004:2501: mum srin lag la pam mathe'u chung la mam mthe
NK084(yu)004:2503: de ltar sor mo g.yas kyi dpa' bo 'bru lnga
NK084(yu)004:2504: dang g.yon gyi dpa' mo 'bru lnga gnyis zung du
NK084(yu)004:2505: sbyar ba las 'od spros pa des 'phags pa mchod
NK084(yu)004:2506: sems can gyi don byas tshur 'dus pa las yi
NK084(yu)004:2507: ge bcu la thim pas 'od du 'bar ro //
NK084(yu)004:2508: de thugs kar thal mo sbyar basa yab yum sbyor
NK084(yu)004:2509: ba byed par bsam ste de ltar yab yum thabs
NK084(yu)004:2510: shes rab sbyor ba byed pa de ni phyag rgya
NK084(yu)004:2511: 'byung ba'i rgyu rdo rje thal mo yin no //
NK084(yu)004:2513: 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan //
NK084(yu)004:2514: h+aum breng rtse mo rdo rje 'bar //
NK084(yu)004:2515: zla brtul 'bru sbas dril bsil zhing //
NK084(yu)004:2516: 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan //
NK084(yu)004:2517: 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan //
NK084(yu)004:2518: mum bsgreng rtse mo dril bsil 'bar //
NK084(yu)004:2520: btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta //
NK084(yu)004:2521: 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan //
NK084(yu)004:2523: zla btul 'bru sbas dril bsil zhing //
NK084(yu)004:2524: 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan //
NK084(yu)004:2525: 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan //
NK084(yu)004:2526: lam sgreng rtse mo dril bsil zhing //
NK084(yu)004:2528: btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta //
NK084(yu)004:2529: 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan //
NK084(yu)004:2530: swa rtse 'bar ba rin po che //
NK084(yu)004:2531: zla btul 'bru sbas dril bsil zhing //
NK084(yu)004:2532: 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan //
NK084(yu)004:2533: 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan //
NK084(yu)004:2534: mam sgreng rtse mo dril gsil 'bar //
NK084(yu)004:2536: btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta //
NK084(yu)004:2537: 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan //
NK084(yu)004:2539: zla btul 'bru sbas dril bsil zhing //
NK084(yu)004:2540: 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan //
NK084(yu)004:2541: 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar kan //
NK084(yu)004:2542: pam sgreng rtse mo dril bsil 'bar //
NK084(yu)004:2544: btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta //
NK084(yu)004:2545: 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan //
NK084(yu)004:2546: ha sgreng rtse mo ral gri 'bar //
NK084(yu)004:2547: zla btul 'bru sbas dril bsil zhing //
NK084(yu)004:2548: 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan //
NK084(yu)004:2549: 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan //
NK084(yu)004:2550: tam sgreng rtse mo dril bsil 'bar //
NK084(yu)004:2552: btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta //
NK084(yu)004:2554: spyir phyag rgya la bzhi ste phyag rgya bca' ba'i gnas sta zur g.yas g.yon no //
NK084(yu)004:2555: phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu rdo rje thal mo'o //
NK084(yu)004:2556: phyag rgya 'byung ba'i thabs thugs ka dang /
NK084(yu)004:2557: phyag rgya dgrol ba'i don stong nyid do //
NK084(yu)004:2558: de la phyag rgya bsgyur ba'i thabs la gsum ste
NK084(yu)004:2559: phyi lus kyi yan lag byin gyis rlobs pa'i phyag
NK084(yu)004:2560: rgya dang / nang lag pa g.yas g.yon la thabs shes rab kyi yi ge bkod pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:2561: gsang ba rdo rje dang pad+ma rtse sprad pa'i phyag rgya'o //
NK084(yu)004:2562: de la nang gi phyag rgya la bzhi ste bcing ba dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
NK084(yu)004:2563: bsam pa chos kyi phyag rgya dang /
NK084(yu)004:2564: byed pa las kyi phyag rgya dang /
NK084(yu)004:2565: bsgom pa phyag rgya chen po'o //
NK084(yu)004:2566: de bzhis lha so so'i phyag rgya thams cad khyab par bcing ngo //
NK084(yu)004:2567: phyag rgya dgrol ba ni stong nyid du dkrol ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:2568: rgyas pa las gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam gnyis po /
NK084(yu)004:2569: dag par dor ba phyag rgya yin //
NK084(yu)004:2571: de ltar las 'dir ni phyag rgya de dag thams cad gcig tu tshang bar bcing nas byed pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:2572: de bas na thun mong ma yin pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya bar yang 'agro'o //
NK084(yu)004:2573: de yang lag pa g.yas pa mi bskyod pa'i rang
NK084(yu)004:2574: bzhin gyi sor mo'i steng gi swa ha a'i yig
NK084(yu)004:2575: 'abru bzhi khu tshur nang du sbasa nas thugs kar
NK084(yu)004:2576: bzung ste mdzub mo sgreng nas phyir la bkan pa'i
NK084(yu)004:2577: tshul gyis bzung ba ni bca' ba dam tshig gi
NK084(yu)004:2578: phyag rgya'o // h+aum bsam pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng ba'i
NK084(yu)004:2579: rtse mo la yi ge h+aum las rdo rje rtse
NK084(yu)004:2580: lnga pa 'od 'bar ba gsal ba ni bsam pa
NK084(yu)004:2582: lag pa g.yon pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor khu tshur
NK084(yu)004:2583: nang du bcangs nas btul zhing 'abru lnga nang du
NK084(yu)004:2584: sbas te dril bu bsil zhing rang gi yum la
NK084(yu)004:2585: 'khril ba ni byed pa las kyi phyag rgya'o //
NK084(yu)004:2586: yab las kyi rang bzhin yum la 'khril ba'i tshul
NK084(yu)004:2587: gyis zhal yum chos kyi rang bzhin la bstan cing
NK084(yu)004:2588: 'dud pa ni bsgom pa phyag rgya chen po'o //
NK084(yu)004:2589: lag pa g.yon pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng
NK084(yu)004:2590: gi lam mam pyam tam ste 'abru bzhi khu tshur
NK084(yu)004:2591: bcangs te sbas nas thugsa kar phyir gan du bkan
NK084(yu)004:2592: nas bcangs pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
NK084(yu)004:2593: mum gsal ba'i mdzub mo bsgreng ba'i rtse mo la
NK084(yu)004:2594: yi ge mum las dril bu 'bar ba gcig gsal
NK084(yu)004:2595: nas dril bu bsil ba dril bsil 'bar zhes pa
NK084(yu)004:2596: bsam pa chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
NK084(yu)004:2597: lag pa g.yas pa nyi ma la gnas pa'i yig
NK084(yu)004:2598: 'bru lnga pos las su zhes pa yab kyi rang
NK084(yu)004:2599: bzhin la 'khril ba ni byed pa las kyi phyag
NK084(yu)004:2600: rgya'o // yum gyi dbu yab la btud de zhal 'dzum pa'i madngas kyis blta ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:2601: de ltar yum gyi sku lhag gis gsal ba ni sgom pa phyag rgya chen po'o //
NK084(yu)004:2602: yab yum de gnyis kyis lha tshogs thams cad la 'gre bar shes par bya'o //
NK084(yu)004:2603: ma gtogs pa'i 'abru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bakana pa ni bcangs pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya /
NK084(yu)004:2604: gsung yig 'bru bsgreng rtse mo thugs phyag mtshan 'khor
NK084(yu)004:2605: lo 'od 'abra ba gsal ba ni bsam pa chos
NK084(yu)004:2606: kyi phyag rgya / zla ba btul zhing yum gyi
NK084(yu)004:2607: 'abru lnga sbas nas dril bu bsil zhing yum la
NK084(yu)004:2608: 'khril ba ni byed pa las rgya /
NK084(yu)004:2609: 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chosa la zhal bstan pa ni skur sgom pa phyag rgya chen po'o //
NK084(yu)004:2610: mum mam pyam tam ste 'bru bzhi sbas nasa thugs
NK084(yu)004:2611: kar bkan pa bcangs pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya
NK084(yu)004:2612: / la bsgreng rtse mo dril bsil 'abra ba gsal ba bsam pa chos rgya /
NK084(yu)004:2613: nyi ma yi dpa' bo 'bru lnga las su 'khrila ba ni byed pa las kyi phyag rgya /
NK084(yu)004:2614: btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba sku phyag rgya chen po'o //
NK084(yu)004:2615: h+aum a ha ste 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugsa kar
NK084(yu)004:2616: bkan pa bcangs pa dam tshig /swa bsgreng rtse mo
NK084(yu)004:2617: 'od 'bar ba yi rin po che sgom pa bsam
NK084(yu)004:2618: pa chos rgya / zla btul 'bru lnga sbas nas
NK084(yu)004:2619: dril bu bsil zhing yum la 'khril ba byed pa
NK084(yu)004:2620: pa chos rgya / las rgya / 'khril ba'i tshul
NK084(yu)004:2621: gyis zhal chos la bstana pa sku phyag rgya chen
NK084(yu)004:2622: pa chos rgya / las rgya / po'o // mum
NK084(yu)004:2623: lam pyam tam ste 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar
NK084(yu)004:2624: bkan pa bcangs pa dam tshig /mam bsgreng rtse mo
NK084(yu)004:2625: la dril bsil 'bar ba bsam pa chos rgya /
NK084(yu)004:2626: nyi ma yi dpa' bo 'bru lnga las su 'khrila ba byed pa las rgya /
NK084(yu)004:2627: btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba sku phyag rgya chen po'o //
NK084(yu)004:2628: h+aum swa ha ste 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan pa bcangs pa dam tshig /
NK084(yu)004:2629: am bsgreng rtse mo pad ma 'abra ba bsam pa chos rgya /
NK084(yu)004:2630: zla ba btul bas dpa' mo 'bru lnga sbas nas
NK084(yu)004:2631: dril bu bsil zhing 'khril ba byed pa las rgya
NK084(yu)004:2632: / 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan pa sku phyag rgya chen po'o //
NK084(yu)004:2633: dpa' mo 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bakana pa
NK084(yu)004:2634: bcing ba dam tshig /pyam bsgreng rtse mo dril bsil
NK084(yu)004:2636: nyi ma dpa' bo 'bru lnga las su 'khrila ba byed pa las rgya /
NK084(yu)004:2637: btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba sku phyag rgya chen po'o //
NK084(yu)004:2638: a h+aum swa ste 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar
NK084(yu)004:2639: bkan pa bcangs pa dam tshig /ha bsgreng rtse mo
NK084(yu)004:2640: ral gri 'bar ba bsam pa chos rgya /
NK084(yu)004:2641: zla btul dpa' mo 'bru bzhi sbas nas dril bu
NK084(yu)004:2642: bsil zhing chos la 'khril ba byed pa las rgya
NK084(yu)004:2643: / 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan pa sku phyag rgya chen po'o //
NK084(yu)004:2644: mum lam pyam mam ste 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs
NK084(yu)004:2645: kar bkan pa bcangs pa dam tshig /tam bsgreng rtse
NK084(yu)004:2646: mo dril bsil 'abra ba bsam pa chos rgya /
NK084(yu)004:2647: nyi ma dpa' bo 'bru lnga las su 'khrila ba byed pa las rgya /
NK084(yu)004:2648: btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba sku phyag rgya chen po'o //
NK084(yu)004:2649: gnyis pa lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa la gnyis te /
NK084(yu)004:2650: lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dngos dang /
NK084(yu)004:2653: mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni //
NK084(yu)004:2654: sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis //
NK084(yu)004:2655: phyogs bcu thams cad sangs rgyas shing //
NK084(yu)004:2656: mnyen 'jam reg na bde ba yi //
NK084(yu)004:2657: sna tshogs rin po che yi gzhi //
NK084(yu)004:2658: mdzes par bris shing spras pa dang //
NK084(yu)004:2660: dbyibs legs rdzing bu ro mchog bsil //
NK084(yu)004:2661: rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang //
NK084(yu)004:2662: rgyan dang dpag bsam ljon pa'i tshal //
NK084(yu)004:2663: glu dbyangs tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra //
NK084(yu)004:2664: bla re rgyal mtshan na bza' gdugs //
NK084(yu)004:2665: do shal dpung rgyan se mo do //
NK084(yu)004:2666: mdzes pa'i rgyan rnams sna tshogs dang //
NK084(yu)004:2667: bza' dang btung ba'i mchog rnams dang //
NK084(yu)004:2668: rang la mdzes par brgyan pa yi //
NK084(yu)004:2669: lha dang lha mo rdul snyed kyi //
NK084(yu)004:2670: bro gar la sogs bsam yas kyis //
NK084(yu)004:2671: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas //
NK084(yu)004:2674: spyir na mchod pa la gnyis te dngos su 'byor pa dang sems kyis dmigs pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:2675: de las 'dir ni sems kyis dmigs pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:2676: nang mchoda pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa zer ro //
NK084(yu)004:2677: rang rig pa byang chub kyi semas ni ji ltar
NK084(yu)004:2678: dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ba nyid kya
NK084(yu)004:2679: phyir yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang
NK084(yu)004:2680: 'dra bas mchod pa mang nyung gi tshad sprin tshogs
NK084(yu)004:2681: kyi phung po tsam sprul nas 'bul lo //
NK084(yu)004:2682: de yang ting nge 'dzin gyis ji ltar sprul zhe
NK084(yu)004:2683: na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad
NK084(yu)004:2684: sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams rnam par dag pa rgyan
NK084(yu)004:2685: bkod pa mnan na nem snyam byed pa bteg na
NK084(yu)004:2686: 'phar ba snyam byed par sprul lo //
NK084(yu)004:2687: zhing khams de'i mtshan nyid ci lta bu zhe na
NK084(yu)004:2688: mnyen la 'jam pa dang reg na zag med kyi
NK084(yu)004:2689: bde ba khyad par can bskyed par byed pa yi
NK084(yu)004:2691: de'i gzhi gang zhe na rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i
NK084(yu)004:2692: rin po che'i rang bzhin las grub pa'i sa gzhi
NK084(yu)004:2693: brtan cing 'dod pa 'byung ba dang dwangs shing mdzes
NK084(yu)004:2694: par snang ba'o // zhing khams de'i rgyan ni ci
NK084(yu)004:2695: zhe na bar bar du shin tu mdzes par snang
NK084(yu)004:2696: ba'i mig mang ris su bres shing /
NK084(yu)004:2697: de'i mig tu gser gyi sor gdub la g.yu yi
NK084(yu)004:2698: phra bcug pa ltar rin po che'i za ra tshags
NK084(yu)004:2699: dang sna 'phyang dang chun 'phyang gi lda ldi ris
NK084(yu)004:2700: su spras pa dang de lta bu yang dkyil 'khor
NK084(yu)004:2702: 'jig rten gyi ri thams cad tram las 'dod pa'i
NK084(yu)004:2703: yon tan kun 'byung ba'i rin po che'i phung pa
NK084(yu)004:2704: kha dog mdzes pa 'od 'phro zhing 'od zer 'abra
NK084(yu)004:2706: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbyibs legs shing yid du
NK084(yu)004:2707: 'ong ba'i rdzing bu dang 'bab chu dang lteng ka
NK084(yu)004:2708: dang chu klung chen po thams cad bdud rtsi ro
NK084(yu)004:2709: mchog brgyad dang ldan pa dbyibs legs pa bsil la
NK084(yu)004:2710: 'jam pa'i bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun du dmigs la 'bul
NK084(yu)004:2711: lo // 'jig rten gyi khams na sbra dang gur
NK084(yu)004:2712: dang khang pa la sogs pa thams cad rnams rin
NK084(yu)004:2713: chen sna tshogs las grub pa'i gzhal yas khang pa
NK084(yu)004:2714: rgyan gyi rigs sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang phyi
NK084(yu)004:2715: nang med pa dper na shel gyi phor pa lta
NK084(yu)004:2716: bur gsal ba zang thal bar dmigs la dbul lo
NK084(yu)004:2717: lo // // 'jig rten gyi khams na rtsi shing
NK084(yu)004:2718: ji snyed yod pa rnams dgos 'dod thams cad 'byung
NK084(yu)004:2719: ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing ljon
NK084(yu)004:2720: pa'i tshal du dmigs la 'bul lo //
NK084(yu)004:2721: 'jig rten gyi khams na glu len pa dang dbyangs
NK084(yu)004:2722: dang tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra ji snyed yod pa
NK084(yu)004:2723: thams cad bde bar gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad
NK084(yu)004:2724: pa'i bstod pa byed par bsam la dbul lo //
NK084(yu)004:2725: 'jig rten khams kyi gos kyi rnam pa ji snyed
NK084(yu)004:2726: yod pa thams cad ni bde bar gshegs pa la
NK084(yu)004:2727: bla re dang rgyal mtshan dang na bza' dang gdugs
NK084(yu)004:2728: dang ba dan la sogs par bsam la dbul bar
NK084(yu)004:2729: bya'o // 'jig rten gyi khams na nor bu dang
NK084(yu)004:2730: phyag gdub dang zhabs gdub dang rgyan ji snyed yod
NK084(yu)004:2731: pa thams cad bde bar gshegs pa la dbu rgyan
NK084(yu)004:2732: dang phyag gdub dang zhabs gdub dang mgul chu dang
NK084(yu)004:2733: do shal dang dpung rgyan dang se mo do dang
NK084(yu)004:2734: mdzes pa'i rgyan rnam pa sna tshogas par bsam la
NK084(yu)004:2735: bya'o // dbul lo // 'jig rten gyi khams na
NK084(yu)004:2736: gos yod pa rnams ni bde bar gshegs pa la
NK084(yu)004:2737: sku'i stod g.yogs dang gsung gi smad dkris dang thugs
NK084(yu)004:2738: kyi zil ldir yon tan gyi chos gos dang mdzad
NK084(yu)004:2739: pa las kyi phu dung dang mgul chu ze'u 'phrog
NK084(yu)004:2740: dang sked chings nor bu'i rtsar 'phyang la sogs par
NK084(yu)004:2742: gyi khams na bza' ba dang bca' ba dang btung
NK084(yu)004:2743: ba dang ldag pa dang mur ba'i longs spyod ji
NK084(yu)004:2744: snyed yod pa thams cad ni ro mchog brgyad dang
NK084(yu)004:2745: ldan pa'i bdud rtsir bsam la bde bar gshegs pa
NK084(yu)004:2747: 'jig rten gyi khams na skyes pa dang bud med
NK084(yu)004:2748: dang bu dang bu mo ji snyed yod pa thams
NK084(yu)004:2749: cad rang rang la rgyan sna tshogs kyis mdzes par
NK084(yu)004:2750: brgyan pa yi lha dang lha mo grangs bsam gyis
NK084(yu)004:2751: mi khyab pa nam mkha'i rdul phra mo snyed kyi
NK084(yu)004:2752: grangs dang mnyam pa de dag thams cad kyang rkang
NK084(yu)004:2753: pas stabs mdzes pa'i bro brdung ba dang /
NK084(yu)004:2754: lag pas phyag rgya mdzes pa'i gar byed pa la
NK084(yu)004:2755: sogs pa bsam yas grangs med pa'i tshogs kyis mchod
NK084(yu)004:2756: par bsam mo // de ltar gong du bstan pa
NK084(yu)004:2757: de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa des
NK084(yu)004:2758: phyogs bcu nama mkha'i khams thams cad ganga bar dmigs
NK084(yu)004:2759: nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs kun la re re
NK084(yu)004:2760: zhing yang rgyas par 'bul bar bya'o //
NK084(yu)004:2762: skal ldan gsal ba'i khyad par gyis //
NK084(yu)004:2763: rim gyis yang na cig char du //
NK084(yu)004:2764: chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam sbyor zhing //
NK084(yu)004:2765: mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom //
NK084(yu)004:2767: dbul ba'i thabs ni ma h+aa yo ga'i sgor zhugs
NK084(yu)004:2768: pa'i rnal 'byor pa de ni sangs rgya ba'i skal
NK084(yu)004:2769: ba dang ldan pa ste de la ting nge 'dzin
NK084(yu)004:2770: mi gsal ba dang gsal ba'i khyad par gyis mchod
NK084(yu)004:2771: pa yang rims kyis sam yang na cig char du
NK084(yu)004:2772: 'bul te / de yang rnal 'byor pa blo che na cig char du dus gcig la 'bul lo //
NK084(yu)004:2773: blo chung na rims kyis dbul ba dang blo shin
NK084(yu)004:2774: tu chung na rims pa'i mos pas dbul bar bya'o
NK084(yu)004:2775: // nam mkhas gar khyab par chos kyi dbyings kyis
NK084(yu)004:2776: khyab pa dang chos kyi dbyings kyis gar khyab par
NK084(yu)004:2777: bde bar gshegs pas khyab pas na mchod pa dang
NK084(yu)004:2778: bde bar gshegs pa mnyam par sbyor zhing dbul lo
NK084(yu)004:2779: // // de ni rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i mchod
NK084(yu)004:2780: pa min te ting nge 'dzin gyis 'bul bas na
NK084(yu)004:2781: mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen por bsgoms pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:2783: thog mar bdag nyid rtogs goms bsgral //
NK084(yu)004:2784: de nas gnyis med blo yis ni //
NK084(yu)004:2785: blo ngan 'jig rten snying re rje //
NK084(yu)004:2786: gnyis su med par bsgral bar bya //
NK084(yu)004:2788: spyir sgrol ba'i mchod pa la lnga ste /
NK084(yu)004:2789: rang bzhin gyis sgrol ba dang /
NK084(yu)004:2793: mngon du phyung ba'i dang lnga las 'dir rang bzhin gyi sgrol ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:2794: dang po ni phung po khams dang skye mched thams
NK084(yu)004:2795: cad don dam par ma skyes pa kun rdzob tu
NK084(yu)004:2796: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du sangs rgyas pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:2797: de bas na mchog gi mchod pa ni mchod pa thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:2798: rang rig pa nyid rtogs nas ma rig pa'i mun pa rnams mchod par 'bul ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:2799: don gyi ngo bo la sgrol bar ma gyur pa'am mchod par ma gyur pa gang yang med pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:2800: thog ma ni bdag dang gzhan gnyis las thog mar bdag bsgral lo //
NK084(yu)004:2801: bdag nyid ni rang lus so //
NK084(yu)004:2802: rtogs pa ni dbang po yul gyi sgrol ba ste
NK084(yu)004:2803: yum du snang ba thams cad yum gyi dkyil 'khor
NK084(yu)004:2804: shes pa 'jug pa thams cad yab kyi da lar
NK084(yu)004:2805: bsam mo // sgom pa ni rang lus skye ba med par sgom /
NK084(yu)004:2806: ma rig pa dang log lta dang bdag 'dzin la
NK084(yu)004:2807: sogs pa phyin ci log gi snang ba gang yin
NK084(yu)004:2808: pa thams cad mchod par 'bul lo zhes des rtogs
NK084(yu)004:2809: pas bdag bsgral ba bstan nas thugs rjes gzhan bsgral
NK084(yu)004:2810: ba ni de ltar rtogs pas bdag bsgral ba de
NK084(yu)004:2811: nas bdag rnal 'byor pa dbyings dang ye shes gnyis
NK084(yu)004:2812: su meda pa dang thabs dang shes rab gnyis su
NK084(yu)004:2813: med pa'i don rtogs pa'i blo dang ldan pa'i gang
NK084(yu)004:2814: zag de yis ni gnyis su med pa'i don la
NK084(yu)004:2815: gnyis su 'dzin pa'i blo ngan gyi sems can 'jig
NK084(yu)004:2816: rten na gnas pa de dag thams cad snying re
NK084(yu)004:2817: rje zhes snying rjes 'du shes kyis bdag nyid sgrol
NK084(yu)004:2818: ba'i lha ta ki ra tsar gsal ba dang gri
NK084(yu)004:2819: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpar gsal ba dang bsgral
NK084(yu)004:2820: bya'i sems can de dag thams cad ru trar gsal
NK084(yu)004:2821: bar byas la bdag tu rtog pa rtsad nas bcad
NK084(yu)004:2822: nas sems 'og min du bsgral ba dang phung po
NK084(yu)004:2823: 'dod yon gyi lha mor byas la dkyil 'khor gyi
NK084(yu)004:2825: de bas na bdag dang gzhan gnyis su med par bsgral bar bya'o //
NK084(yu)004:2827: gsal ldan ma'am byin brlabs la //
NK084(yu)004:2828: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i //
NK084(yu)004:2829: 'khril ba'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor bas //
NK084(yu)004:2830: bdag nyid mnyes pas mnyes par bya //
NK084(yu)004:2831: zhes pa ste sbyor ba'i mchod pa la lnga las
NK084(yu)004:2832: 'dir mngon du phyung ba'i sbyor ba'i mchod pa ste
NK084(yu)004:2833: / de yang yum de rang gis ting nge 'dzin
NK084(yu)004:2834: sgom shes na gsal ldan ma zhes bya ste rnal
NK084(yu)004:2835: 'byor pas byin gyis brlabs mi dgos pa de'am ting
NK084(yu)004:2836: nge 'dzin bsgom mi shes na rnal 'byor pas byin
NK084(yu)004:2838: thabs yab rdo rje sems dpar bsgom /
NK084(yu)004:2839: mkha' rdo rje rtse lnga par bsgom /
NK084(yu)004:2840: rtsa bar sked pa h+aum rtse mor phata bsam pa dang shes rab yum dbyings phyug mar bskyed /
NK084(yu)004:2842: dkyil du h+aum dgod par bya /
NK084(yu)004:2843: yab yum gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba byed pa
NK084(yu)004:2844: ni yum gyis sa ma ya ho sa ma ya
NK084(yu)004:2845: s+t+wam / sa ma ya h+aum zhes brdas bskul /
NK084(yu)004:2846: yab kyis ra ga ya ho zhes lan byin no //
NK084(yu)004:2847: yab yum thabs dang shes raba gnyis su med par
NK084(yu)004:2848: 'khril ba'i mchod pa mdzad nas rig pa nang du
NK084(yu)004:2849: bzung bas dga' ba dang mchog dga' dang lhan cig
NK084(yu)004:2850: skyes pa'i dga' ba dang dga' bral gyi dga' ba
NK084(yu)004:2851: chen pos rang lus bde bas rgyas par bya /
NK084(yu)004:2852: de nas byang sems phyir byung ba dang lhag pa
NK084(yu)004:2853: byang chub sems phar la 'phros pas dkyil 'khor gyi
NK084(yu)004:2854: lha la mchod pa phul ba ste /
NK084(yu)004:2855: de lta bu'i mchod pa de gang las byung na
NK084(yu)004:2856: yab yum dgongs pa thams cad tshang ba'i dbang po
NK084(yu)004:2857: mnyam par sbyor ba las byung bas na sbyor ba'i
NK084(yu)004:2859: de nas byang chub kyi sems tshur bdag nyid yum
NK084(yu)004:2860: la thim pas rang gi rtog tshogs nyid dkyil 'khor
NK084(yu)004:2861: du gsal ba yang bde ba chen pos mnyes pas
NK084(yu)004:2862: de dag rnams la yang mnyes par bya ba'i mchod
NK084(yu)004:2864: lnga pa bdud rtsi'i mchod pa ni /
NK084(yu)004:2865: mnyam pa'i sgrub rdzas chen po dag /
NK084(yu)004:2866: bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la 'bul //
NK084(yu)004:2868: rdzas kyi mchod pa ni gsum ste ngo bo dang /
NK084(yu)004:2869: grub pa bzhis brgyan pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:2871: ngo bo dri chen dri chu mam sa rak+ta lhag pa'i byang sems dang lnga'o //
NK084(yu)004:2872: grub pa bzhis brgyan pa ni chos nyid rang bzhin gyis grub pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:2873: chos can ngo bos grub pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:2874: mthu can las kyi grub pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:2875: byin brlabs nus pas grub pa'i rdzas so //
NK084(yu)004:2876: de lta bu'i grub rdzas chen po ni rang bzhin gyis mnyam /
NK084(yu)004:2877: las kyis mnyam pa'i phyir na mnyam pa'i sgrub rdzas te /
NK084(yu)004:2878: rdzas de nyid sangs rgyas rigs lnga dang dbyer med
NK084(yu)004:2879: par lus la khams bdud rtsir gnas pas na chen
NK084(yu)004:2880: po' //dbul ba'i thabs ni de lta bu'i bla na
NK084(yu)004:2881: med pa'i dam rdzas dag pa'i mchod pa de bdag
NK084(yu)004:2882: dam tshig sems dpa' dang lha ye shes sems dpa'
NK084(yu)004:2883: mnyam zhing dbyer med pa'i tshogs la 'bul bar bya'o
NK084(yu)004:2885: bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo /
NK084(yu)004:2886: longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad kun //
NK084(yu)004:2888: zhes pa ste bza' ba zas kyi rnam pa dang
NK084(yu)004:2889: bca' ba rus pa'i rnam pa dang btung ba chang
NK084(yu)004:2890: gi rnam pa dang bgo ba gos kyi rnam pa
NK084(yu)004:2891: rnams ni longs spyod rdzas kyi mchod pa chen por
NK084(yu)004:2892: 'bul lo // mig gzugs kyi longs spyod dang /
NK084(yu)004:2893: rna ba sgra'i sna dri'i lce ro 'dus reg bya'i
NK084(yu)004:2894: longas spyod dang lnga ni rang la gang yod ldan
NK084(yu)004:2896: ma ldan na ting nge 'dzin gyis sprul la dbul
NK084(yu)004:2897: te longs spyod lnga po thams cad kun dbul lo
NK084(yu)004:2898: // dbul thabs ni ye shes lha'i dkyil 'khor dbul
NK084(yu)004:2899: bya la dbul byed ni bdag gi thugs ka nas
NK084(yu)004:2900: mchod pa'i lha mo'i dkyil 'khor ram 'dod yon gyi
NK084(yu)004:2901: lha mo mang po spros nas thima pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:2902: de la ni ye shes la ye shes rol zhes
NK084(yu)004:2903: bya chos nyid la chos nyid thim zhes bya lha
NK084(yu)004:2904: la lha rol zhes bya'o a i u li sngags
NK084(yu)004:2905: kyi dbul lo // bdun pa bstod pa la drug ste sku la bstod pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:2912: phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi //
NK084(yu)004:2913: ye shes dkyil 'khor thig le che //
NK084(yu)004:2914: bsod nams dkyil 'khor sku yi tshogs //
NK084(yu)004:2915: snang stong thig le kun tu rdzogs //
NK084(yu)004:2918: sku lnga mngon pa nyid kyi phyir yi ge gyis 'go drangs pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:2919: phyogs bcu dus bzhi rgyu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
NK084(yu)004:2920: rgyas pa'i gnas dang dus kun tu thugs dam gyi
NK084(yu)004:2921: dbang gis 'gro ba'i don rdzogs par mdzad pa ni
NK084(yu)004:2922: rgyal ba yab yum lnga yang sku lngar 'dus rang
NK084(yu)004:2923: byung ye shes nyid rang byung la ma 'gags par
NK084(yu)004:2924: gsal ba ni mngon par byang chub pa'i sku'o //
NK084(yu)004:2925: ye shes lnga mi rtog pa'i ye shes su gsal
NK084(yu)004:2926: ba ni dkyil 'khor de nyid khyab brdal chen por
NK084(yu)004:2927: gnas pa ni thig le che'o //
NK084(yu)004:2928: de yang chos nyid kyi sku ni spros pa'i mtshan
NK084(yu)004:2929: ma thams cad bral ba'i chos nyid yin te de
