NK084(yu)004:2930: ltar snang ba'o // gang yang ma spangs par zag
NK084(yu)004:2931: pa med pa'i bsod nams rang snang ba ni dkyil
NK084(yu)004:2932: 'khor lta bu ste 'bras bu ye shes kyi tshogs
NK084(yu)004:2933: las nges par 'byung ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku
NK084(yu)004:2934: mtshan dang dpe byad du bstan pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:2935: rgyu bsod nams kyi tshogs bar chad med pa las
NK084(yu)004:2936: 'bras bu nges par 'byung ba ni longs sku de
NK084(yu)004:2937: dag las 'khor sprul sku yi tshogsa 'gro ba rigs
NK084(yu)004:2938: drug gi don sprul sku mang pos mdzad do //
NK084(yu)004:2939: snang ba rtags stong pa don de gnyis su med
NK084(yu)004:2940: pas thig le kun tu rdzogsa pas gnyis su med
NK084(yu)004:2942: de sku gsung thugs dbyer med pa rang gi ngo
NK084(yu)004:2943: bo mnyam pa nyid 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral
NK084(yu)004:2944: bar rang bzhin gyis grub pa ni rdo rje'i sku'o
NK084(yu)004:2945: // de ltar sku lnga la dgyes pas ho zhes pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:2947: rdo rje bsod nams thig le che //
NK084(yu)004:2948: rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan //
NK084(yu)004:2949: rdo rje sgra chen mtha' yas pa //
NK084(yu)004:2950: rdo rje rgyal po thig le che ho //
NK084(yu)004:2951: zhes pa ste gsung lnga mngon pa nyid yi ge de'i phyir mgo drangs pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:2952: rdo rje bsod nams kyi ngo bo sgra ma spangs
NK084(yu)004:2953: pa'i phyir na brdas ston te longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
NK084(yu)004:2954: sku nyid phyag rgya dang zhabs dang spyan dang ljags
NK084(yu)004:2955: kyi brdas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor la brda go
NK084(yu)004:2956: ba sprod pa dang sgrib pa sel bas na rdo
NK084(yu)004:2957: rje 'bras bu ye shes kyi bsod nams las grub
NK084(yu)004:2958: pas na longs sku dgongs pa brda' gsung ngo //
NK084(yu)004:2959: spros pa med pa'i thig le brjod du med pas
NK084(yu)004:2960: don gyi gsung che ba'am chen pos te chos sku
NK084(yu)004:2961: skye med don gyi gsung ngo //
NK084(yu)004:2962: rdo rje ni stong pa ye shes ni stong pa'i
NK084(yu)004:2963: don shes pa dkyil 'khor ni don rtogs pa ldan
NK084(yu)004:2964: pa ni stong pa'i don ye shes su ldan pa
NK084(yu)004:2965: ye shes dkyil 'khor du ldan pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:2966: de lta bu des ma brjod par thams cad gsal
NK084(yu)004:2967: bar brda sprod pa'i phyir na rig pa'i gsung ngo
NK084(yu)004:2968: // de ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rig pa sgyu ma'i gsung ngo //
NK084(yu)004:2969: rdo rje stong pa sgra chen tshangs pa'i mtha' yas
NK084(yu)004:2970: pa sna tshogs su snang ba ste sprul pa'i sku'i
NK084(yu)004:2971: tshangs pa'i gsung gis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu
NK084(yu)004:2972: thams cad kyis go bar spyod pa dang de dag
NK084(yu)004:2973: gi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad gtan nas
NK084(yu)004:2975: gcig la mang por grags pa'i phyir na sprul sku sna tshogs tshangs pa'i gsung ngo //
NK084(yu)004:2976: rdo rje ni grags stong dbyer med pa de nyid
NK084(yu)004:2977: kyis thams cad la dbang bsgyur bas rgyal po dang
NK084(yu)004:2978: / grags stong ni so so'i spyod pa thams cad
NK084(yu)004:2979: dang bral ba'i phyir thig le che'o tshig med pa
NK084(yu)004:2980: nyid brjod pa dang 'dra bar gsal ba gsung gi
NK084(yu)004:2981: rang bzhin pas na rdo rje'i sku grags stong dbyer
NK084(yu)004:2983: de lta bu'i don la dgyes pas na ho zhes pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:2985: sku gsung thugs kyi rdzogs pa che //
NK084(yu)004:2986: yon tan 'phrin las kun tu rdzogs //
NK084(yu)004:2987: ye nas lhun rdzogs kun tu bzang //
NK084(yu)004:2988: 'dus pa'i tshogs chen thig le che //
NK084(yu)004:2990: thugs lnga mngon pa nyid yi ge de'i phyir mgo drangs pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:2991: sku ni chos sku zag bral te de'i thugs ni
NK084(yu)004:2992: mnyam pa chen po yin la de ni chos kyi
NK084(yu)004:2994: gsung ni mngon par byang chub pa ste mi g.yo
NK084(yu)004:2995: ba'i thugs yin la de ni so sor rtog pa'i
NK084(yu)004:2996: ye shes so // thugs ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
NK084(yu)004:2997: sku ste de nyid kyi thugsa ni me long lta
NK084(yu)004:2998: bu'i ye shes mi g.yo ba'i rang bzhin ma 'gags
NK084(yu)004:2999: ye shes so // pa'i thugs so // de gsum
NK084(yu)004:3000: dbyer med pas na rdzogs pa'o mchog tu gyur pas
NK084(yu)004:3001: na che ba'am chen por gnas pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:3002: yon tan ni rdo rje'i thugs te mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
NK084(yu)004:3003: 'phrin las ni 'gro ba sgrol ba'i thugs te bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so //
NK084(yu)004:3004: de rnams gcig tu gnas pas na kun tu rdzogs zhes so //
NK084(yu)004:3005: ye nas sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las nyer lngar rdzogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:3006: rigs lnga'i thugs ni ye shes lngar gnas te de
NK084(yu)004:3007: yang de re re la yang ye shes lnga lngar
NK084(yu)004:3008: lhun gyis grub par gnas pas na ye nas lhun
NK084(yu)004:3009: rdzogs zhes bya / ma btsal bar sku lnga ye
NK084(yu)004:3010: nas lhun grub tu rdzogs pas na rang bzhin kun
NK084(yu)004:3011: tu bzang po zhes de la bya'o //
NK084(yu)004:3012: sems dpa' dang sems ma thams cad kyang rang rang
NK084(yu)004:3013: gi rigs kyi ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin du 'dus
NK084(yu)004:3014: pa'i phyir na tshogs chen zhes bya ba'i rgyal ba
NK084(yu)004:3015: nyid dang dbyer med pa'i phyir na thig le che
NK084(yu)004:3016: ba'am chen po'o // de lta bu la dgyes pas na ho zhes bya ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:3018: mi dmigs sgyu 'phrul mnyam pa'i dbyings //
NK084(yu)004:3019: mtha' yas kun nas sna tshogs 'phro //
NK084(yu)004:3020: mtha' yas kun nas lhun gyis thim //
NK084(yu)004:3021: sna tshogs sku gsung thugs chen po ho //
NK084(yu)004:3022: zhes pa ste yon tan lnga mtshon pa'i yi ge
NK084(yu)004:3023: gyis thog drangs nas chos kyi dbyings dang rang rig
NK084(yu)004:3024: pa'i ngo bo nyid dmigs pa nyid rang rig pa'i
NK084(yu)004:3025: ye shes kyi gzhal yas khang du shar ba ste
NK084(yu)004:3026: de phyi nang med par gsal ba'i phyir ye shes
NK084(yu)004:3027: rin po che'i gzhal yas khang ngo //
NK084(yu)004:3028: mi dmigs pa'i rig pa nyid sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs
NK084(yu)004:3029: su snang bas snang stong dbyer med mnyam pa'i dbyings
NK084(yu)004:3030: phyi nang dang rgya che chung med pa'i gzhal yas
NK084(yu)004:3031: khang ngo // chos kyi dbyings ni ye nas rang
NK084(yu)004:3032: gi ngo bos snang stong dbyer med par mnyam pas
NK084(yu)004:3033: te des thams cad la khyab pa ni nam mkha'
NK084(yu)004:3034: dang mnyam pa mu mtha' med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas
NK084(yu)004:3035: khang ngo // kyi zhing ngo // de lta bu'i
NK084(yu)004:3036: gzhal yas khang de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs
NK084(yu)004:3037: khang ngo // kyi zhing ngo // gnas so //
NK084(yu)004:3038: mtha' yas kun nas ni sku'i gnas kyi ba spu'i
NK084(yu)004:3040: sna tshogs 'phro ni 'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab
NK084(yu)004:3041: pa 'phros pas khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad
NK084(yu)004:3042: kyi sgrib pa ma lus pa sbyong bar byed pa'o
NK084(yu)004:3043: // phyogs bcu'i zhing khams mtha' yas pa kun snang
NK084(yu)004:3044: ba'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i longs spyod thams cad
NK084(yu)004:3045: ni ye nas mchod pa'i lha mo lngar lhun gyis
NK084(yu)004:3046: grub nas mchod pa 'bul ba dang lha la lha
NK084(yu)004:3047: // thim zhes bya'o // de yang mtha' yas pa'i
NK084(yu)004:3048: 'dod yon kun la myong ba med pa'i tshul gyis
NK084(yu)004:3049: spyod pas na longs spyod pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:3050: sna tshogs zhes pa ni seng ge la sogs pa
NK084(yu)004:3051: 'bras bu'i byang chub sems dpa' re re yang brgyad
NK084(yu)004:3052: brgyad du snang nas rgyal ba'i gdan khri 'degs pa
NK084(yu)004:3053: dang sku snang la rang bzhin med pa'am gsal ba
NK084(yu)004:3054: nyi zla dang gsung nyes pa'i skyon gyis ma gos
NK084(yu)004:3055: pas pad+ma'i gdan dang thugs rig pa'i ye shes chen
NK084(yu)004:3056: po rang snang ba'i rtags su dgos 'dod kun 'byung
NK084(yu)004:3057: ba rin po che'i gdan te de la dgyes pas
NK084(yu)004:3058: ho zhes so // lnga pa ni /
NK084(yu)004:3059: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyed du //
NK084(yu)004:3060: rgyal ba'i don rnams rdul phran snyed //
NK084(yu)004:3061: sprul pa rdul phran bsam yas kyis //
NK084(yu)004:3062: skad cig yud la lhun gyis grub ho //
NK084(yu)004:3063: zhes pa ste 'phrin las lnga 'tshogs pa'i phyir gyis sna drangs nas so //
NK084(yu)004:3064: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni mang nyung gi
NK084(yu)004:3065: tshad rdul phra rab snyed dang mnyam pas na de
NK084(yu)004:3066: nyid du gnas pa'i sems can yang rdul phra rab
NK084(yu)004:3067: dang mnyam pa de rnams ni don bya ba'i yul
NK084(yu)004:3068: lo // de yang gdul bya'i gnas phyogs bcu'i 'jig
NK084(yu)004:3069: rten tshad rdul phra rab dang ngo bo dag pa
NK084(yu)004:3070: dang ma dag pa'i gdul bya'o //
NK084(yu)004:3071: de dag ni nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pas na zhi ba'i 'phrin las so //
NK084(yu)004:3072: de dag tu rgyal ba'i sprul pas 'gro ba'i don byed pa yang rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:3073: de bas na rgyal ba'i don rnams ni 'dul byed do //
NK084(yu)004:3074: rdul phran snyed ni 'dul thabs so de rnams 'a
NK084(yu)004:3075: gro don dpag tu med pa mdzad pas na rgyas
NK084(yu)004:3077: 'dul byed kyi tshad ni bde bar gshegs pa'i sprul
NK084(yu)004:3078: pa thub pa drug gis grangs rdul phran tsam la
NK084(yu)004:3079: gdul thabs zhi khro sna tshogs su snang bas bsam
NK084(yu)004:3080: yas pa'o // de rnams kyis 'gro ba rnams dbang du byed pas na dbang gi 'phrin las so //
NK084(yu)004:3081: don grub tshul ni skad cig gam yud tsam mam
NK084(yu)004:3082: thang cig la don byed pa de ni drag pas
NK084(yu)004:3083: na drag po'o // btul ba'i tshad ni ma btsal bar lhun gyis grub pa'i 'phrin las so //
NK084(yu)004:3084: de yang don mdzad pas de ma thag pa'i 'phrin
NK084(yu)004:3085: las kyis ji ltar btul ba bzhin du lhun gyis
NK084(yu)004:3086: grub par byed pas na drag po dang lhun gyis
NK084(yu)004:3087: grub pa'i 'phrin las te dgyes pas ho zhes so
NK084(yu)004:3089: thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs //
NK084(yu)004:3090: sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che //
NK084(yu)004:3091: sku gsung thugs kyis kun tu khyab //
NK084(yu)004:3092: sku gsung thugs kyi thig le che ho //
NK084(yu)004:3093: zhes sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las lnga tshogs
NK084(yu)004:3094: pa'i yi ge gyis mgo drangs nas 'khor 'das kyi
NK084(yu)004:3095: dngos po gnyis kyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad ma
NK084(yu)004:3096: lus shing lus pa med par sku gsung thugsa su
NK084(yu)004:3097: gnas la sku gsung thugs kyi rol pas yon tan
NK084(yu)004:3098: 'phrin las su rang shar te sku gsung thugs yon
NK084(yu)004:3100: de ltar sku gsung thugs kyang rig pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid du rang shar ba yin te /
NK084(yu)004:3101: de dag gi ngo bo ni bdag nyid che ba'am bdag nyid chen po dpal kun tu bzang po'o //
NK084(yu)004:3102: sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin bdag nyid chen po
NK084(yu)004:3103: de nyid kyi thams cad la khyab pa ltar gnas
NK084(yu)004:3104: pa nyid na des ci mdzad ce na 'khor 'das
NK084(yu)004:3105: kun tu khyab par mdzad pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:3106: sku gsung thugsa kyis kyang dngos po thams cad la
NK084(yu)004:3107: ma khyab pa gang yang med do thams cad la
NK084(yu)004:3108: khyab cing bdag nyid chen por sbyor ba de nyid
NK084(yu)004:3109: kyi phyir spros pa thams cad bral bas na thig
NK084(yu)004:3111: de lta bu'i don la dgyes pas na ho zhes gsungs so //
NK084(yu)004:3112: brgyad pa bzlas pa'i mchod pa ni /
NK084(yu)004:3113: de yi bzlas pa 'phrul chen ni //
NK084(yu)004:3114: rnam gsum tshul gyis ma 'khrul bar //
NK084(yu)004:3116: 'dres gsal brtan pa mchog gis bya //
NK084(yu)004:3118: de la bzlas pa la gsum ste /
NK084(yu)004:3122: dang po ni mdun gyi bar snang la b+h+aum bi
NK084(yu)004:3123: shwa bi shud+d+he badz+ra dz+ny+aa na tsakra sur+ya rat+na pad+ma
NK084(yu)004:3124: man+da la zhes brjod pas gzhal yas khang bsam mo
NK084(yu)004:3125: // de nas lha dbye ba ni h+aum zhes lan
NK084(yu)004:3126: gsum brjod pas h+aum dang pos snang srid gsal bar
NK084(yu)004:3127: byas h+aum gnyis pas thams cad bdag la bsdus h+aum
NK084(yu)004:3128: gsum pas bdag dam tshig pa dang lha ye shes
NK084(yu)004:3129: pa gnyis su dbye ste bdag dam tshig pa'i lha'i
NK084(yu)004:3130: dkyil 'khor gyi mdun na lha ye shes pa'i dkyil
NK084(yu)004:3131: 'khor gsal te mar me gcig las gnyis su dbye
NK084(yu)004:3139: ngo bo ni gnyis te spyi bsnyen dang sgos bsnyen no //
NK084(yu)004:3140: spyi bsnyen ni rigs thams cad rdo rje sems par
NK084(yu)004:3141: 'dus pas h+aum badz+ra d+h+rika mum d+ha du shwa ri
NK084(yu)004:3142: zhes pa'o // spyir dril bzhi bo d+hi tsit+ta ma
NK084(yu)004:3143: h+aa su ka dz+ny+aa na d+ha d+hu a zhes bzlas
NK084(yu)004:3144: zhes pa'o // so // sgos bsnyen ni lha rang rang gi sngags thad kar bzlas so //
NK084(yu)004:3145: bzlas thabs la gsum ste phyi lus la dmigs pa'i bzlas pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:3146: nang rtsa la dmigs pa'i bzlas pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:3147: gsang ba mkha' dbyings la dmigs pa'i bzlas pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:3148: phyi ltar bzlas pa ni bdag gi thugs ka na nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan /
NK084(yu)004:3149: de'i steng na rdo rje sems dpa' tshon gang ba g.yas gser gyi rdo rje nas tsam pa /
NK084(yu)004:3150: g.yon g.yu yi dril bu khu 'phangs tsam 'dzin pa
NK084(yu)004:3151: sku stod la dar dkar gser gyi ngang ris can
NK084(yu)004:3152: gyi sku'i stod g.yogs gsol ba /
NK084(yu)004:3153: sku smad la ba ti smug po'i gsung gi smad dkris gsol ba /
NK084(yu)004:3154: dar chen pa dar ris kyis thugs kyi zil dir gsol ba /
NK084(yu)004:3155: dur kha ngang mig ris kyi yon tan gyi chos gos gsol ba /
NK084(yu)004:3156: chu dar sngon pos mdzad pa las kyi phu dung byas pa /
NK084(yu)004:3157: rin po che'i rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs pas spras
NK084(yu)004:3158: pa 'od dang 'od zer dpag tu med pa 'phro
NK084(yu)004:3159: ba bsam la de'i thugs kar nyi ma de'i steng
NK084(yu)004:3160: na rdo rje nas tsam pa de'i lte ba la
NK084(yu)004:3161: h+aum mthing ka nyung 'bru tsam pa de'i mtha' ma
NK084(yu)004:3162: na phar la sngags kyis bskor bar bsam /
NK084(yu)004:3163: mdun du yang de ltar bsam la bzlas pa'i 'od bdag dang mdun dkyil gnyis la spro bsdu bya'o //
NK084(yu)004:3164: nang ltar bzlas pa ni bdag gi spyi bo bde
NK084(yu)004:3165: ba chen po'i 'khor lo na rtsa 'dab ma sum
NK084(yu)004:3166: cu rtsa gnyis / mgrin pa longs spyod na bcu drug /snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo na brgyad /
NK084(yu)004:3167: lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo na drug cu rtsa
NK084(yu)004:3168: bzhi gsang gnas rlung gi 'khor lo gzhu lta bu
NK084(yu)004:3169: dang lnga la spyi bor rnam snang /
NK084(yu)004:3173: gsang bar don grub rnams bsgom /
NK084(yu)004:3174: bdag gi thugs kar ye shes pa re re /
NK084(yu)004:3175: de'i thugs kar rdo rje dang 'khor lo la sogs
NK084(yu)004:3176: pa'i phyag mtshan de'i lte ba la h+aum dang la
NK084(yu)004:3177: sogs pa rang rang gi sngags kyis bskor ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:3178: de la dmigs nas bzlas pas 'od zer bdag las
NK084(yu)004:3179: chad spyi bor phog byang sems zhu mgrin par babs
NK084(yu)004:3180: de nas snying ga de nas lte ba de nas
NK084(yu)004:3181: gsang gnas su byung phyir 'phros bdag gi spyi bor
NK084(yu)004:3182: phog de bzhin du mgal me bzhin du bya'o //
NK084(yu)004:3183: gsang ba ltar bzlas pa ni bdag gis bzlas pa
NK084(yu)004:3184: byas pas thugs ka'i sngags srog rtsa nang nas yar
NK084(yu)004:3185: la song spyi bor thim sgal tshigs kyi rta brgyud
NK084(yu)004:3186: rdo rje'i lam du byung yum gyi mkha' la 'phros
NK084(yu)004:3187: mdun gyi lha'i thugs kar thim par mos pa bzlas
NK084(yu)004:3188: pa'o // spro bsdu ni bsnyen pa'i dus su 'od dkar po phar la /
NK084(yu)004:3189: nye bsnyen gyi dus su 'od zer ser po phar la 'phros pas 'gro ba'i sgrib pa sbyong /
NK084(yu)004:3190: bsgrub pa'i dus su 'od dmar po phar la 'phros
NK084(yu)004:3191: pas sems can gyi sgrib pa sbyong tshur bsdus nas
NK084(yu)004:3193: sgrub pa chen po'i dus su 'od ljang gu phar
NK084(yu)004:3194: la mi spro bar tshur la sku gsung thugs kyi
NK084(yu)004:3195: dngos grub thams cad sdud do //
NK084(yu)004:3197: grangs kyi bsnyen pa 'bum tsho drug /dus kyi bsnyen
NK084(yu)004:3198: pa dbang po rab zla ba drug 'bring zla ba
NK084(yu)004:3199: bcu bzhi tha ma zla ba bcu drug go //
NK084(yu)004:3200: mtshan ma ni rab yi dam lha'i zhal mthong 'bring
NK084(yu)004:3201: bsgrub rdzas la rtags thon tha ma nyams dang rmi
NK084(yu)004:3202: lam gsal lo // skyon ni ting nge 'dzin mi
NK084(yu)004:3203: gsal ba dang bzlas pa sgra ma dag pa dang
NK084(yu)004:3204: le lo dang g.yeng ba spang ngo des grub pa'o
NK084(yu)004:3205: lam gsal lo // // de ltar gong du bskyed
NK084(yu)004:3206: pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha de yi bzlas pa bya
NK084(yu)004:3207: ba yang phar 'phro ba dang tshur sdud pa'i ting
NK084(yu)004:3208: nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul chen po ste de la
NK084(yu)004:3209: ni bdag las ye shes kyi lha mdun du dbye
NK084(yu)004:3210: zhing bdag dam tshig gi lhar gsal ba dang mdun
NK084(yu)004:3211: na ye shes kyi lha gsal ba dang bar du
NK084(yu)004:3212: sngags kyi 'phro 'du gsal ba ste rnam pa gsum
NK084(yu)004:3213: gyi tshul gyis yid ma 'khrul bar gsal ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:3214: sngags bzlas pas 'phro 'du bya tshul kyang phar 'phros
NK084(yu)004:3215: pas ye shes lha'i thugs dam bskul ba dang slar
NK084(yu)004:3216: 'dus pas bdag la dngos grub gsol bar dmigs pa
NK084(yu)004:3217: dang ting nge 'dzin gyis 'phro 'du'i bar rnam par
NK084(yu)004:3218: rtog pas mi bcad cing sngags kyi bar mi tshig
NK084(yu)004:3219: gis mi gcad par bzlas par bya'o //
NK084(yu)004:3220: de yang rang lha'i rnal 'byor la 'dris pa dang
NK084(yu)004:3221: 'phro 'du'i ting nge 'dzin gsal ba dang rnam par
NK084(yu)004:3222: rtog pa'i rlung gis mi bskyod par brtan par bya'o
NK084(yu)004:3223: // de ni mchoga gis bzlas par bya ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:3224: gsum pa mjug gi las la gsum ste /
NK084(yu)004:3229: bsnyen pa rdzogs nas dkyil 'khor kun //
NK084(yu)004:3230: h+aum zhes brjod cing thugs kar bsdu //
NK084(yu)004:3231: skye med mnyam rdzogs dbyings su thim //
NK084(yu)004:3232: zhes pa ste bsnyen pa rdzogs nas tshogs mchod dang lhag chog bya /
NK084(yu)004:3234: de nas dkyil 'khor kun bsdu ste dam tshig gi
NK084(yu)004:3235: dkyil 'khor la bsdu ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gshegs
NK084(yu)004:3236: su gsol / de nas h+aum zhes brjod cing bdag
NK084(yu)004:3237: nyid gtso bo'i thugs ka nas h+aum 'phros pas lha
NK084(yu)004:3238: dang gzhal yas khang dang bcas pa thams cad 'od
NK084(yu)004:3239: du zhu nas gtso bo'i thugs kar bsdu zhing thim
NK084(yu)004:3240: pa dang bdag nyid 'od du zhu nas chos kyi
NK084(yu)004:3241: dbyings skye med mnyam rdzogs chen po'i dbyings su thim
NK084(yu)004:3242: su gsol / par gyur to // de ni stong pa'i go cha ste cis kyang mi shigs pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:3243: de ni rtag pa yi mtha' dang bral ba'i phyir na rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgoms pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:3245: stong pa'i go chas lus bsrung ste //
NK084(yu)004:3246: spyod lam kun tu btsal med par //
NK084(yu)004:3248: mnyam pa de yi dbyings su gnas //
NK084(yu)004:3250: de ltar bsgom pa ni stong pa'i go chas lus bsrung ba ste /
NK084(yu)004:3252: de nas kam las rdo rje'i go khrab dang ham
NK084(yu)004:3253: la rgyun thag dang am las rdo rje dang h+aum
NK084(yu)004:3254: las rin po che'i thag pa ro gung mdzub la
NK084(yu)004:3255: bsam la bcing ngo rat+na ma le a be shin
NK084(yu)004:3256: tsa zhes pas rin po che'i phreng bas bcing ngo
NK084(yu)004:3257: // sa ta lam zhes pas dar dpyangs dkar po
NK084(yu)004:3258: g.yas su 'phur ba dang a bi shin tsa mam
NK084(yu)004:3259: zhes pas dar dpyangs dmar po g.yon du 'phur ba'o
NK084(yu)004:3260: // // spyod lam bya ba yang dus kun tu
NK084(yu)004:3261: rang las ma gtogs pa'i lha sku btsal du meda
NK084(yu)004:3262: para rang la ye nas yod pa de nyid spyod
NK084(yu)004:3264: 'gro ba dang 'dug pa dang nyal ba dang sdod
NK084(yu)004:3265: pa'i gnas skabs thams cad du yang stong pa nyid
NK084(yu)004:3266: kyi gnas lugs de ma nyamsa pa'am de yi ngang
NK084(yu)004:3267: las ma g.yos pas de'i dbyings su gnas pa dang
NK084(yu)004:3268: cung zad blo chung ba 'dra na de'i ngang las
NK084(yu)004:3269: rang lha'i skur bskyed nas lus bsrung ba dang go
NK084(yu)004:3270: bgo ba byas la spyod lam thams cad lha'i sku
NK084(yu)004:3276: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog /de yis byang chu ba snying po len //
NK084(yu)004:3278: gzhi dngos po'i gnas lugs rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor
NK084(yu)004:3279: bdag la gnas shing ldan pa'i don de shes par
NK084(yu)004:3280: byed pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis shes par bya zhing rang
NK084(yu)004:3281: bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor la ni ting nge 'dzin gyi
NK084(yu)004:3282: dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ste rtogs par byed pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:3283: dkyil 'khor zhes pa rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor las
NK084(yu)004:3284: byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor te thugs
NK084(yu)004:3285: kyi dkyil 'khora zhes pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil
NK084(yu)004:3286: 'khor de nyid kyi gtso bo mchoga ni rdo rje
NK084(yu)004:3287: sems dpa' yin pas spyod lam thams cad du rdo
NK084(yu)004:3289: de rnams ni sku bsgom par 'dod pa kho na'o //
NK084(yu)004:3290: yang na nang gi rdzogs rim du bshad na dkyil
NK084(yu)004:3291: 'khor ldan pa ni rang la spyi bo bde ba
NK084(yu)004:3292: chen po'i 'khor lo na rtsa 'dab ma sum cu
NK084(yu)004:3293: rtsa gnyis dang / mgrin pa longs spyod kyi 'khor lo na rtsa 'dab ma bcu drug dang /
NK084(yu)004:3294: snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo la rtsa 'dab ma brgyad dang /
NK084(yu)004:3295: lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo na rtsa 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi gnas pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:3296: srog shing rtsa g.yas ro ma dang /
NK084(yu)004:3297: g.yon rkyang ma dang dbus kun d+har ma rnams rang la gnas pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:3298: dkyil 'khor gyis ni de ltar gnas pa de shes par gyis so //
NK084(yu)004:3299: dkyil 'khor ni gnas pa de la'o //
NK084(yu)004:3300: bsgom pa ni dkyil 'khor de rnams ba sgom pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:3301: dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba ni spyi bo
NK084(yu)004:3302: na yi ge ham mgo thur du lta ba de
NK084(yu)004:3303: las byang sems zhu bas mgrin par byung de nas
NK084(yu)004:3304: byang sems snying gar byung ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:3305: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog ni snying ga
NK084(yu)004:3306: na rtsa 'dab ma brgyad la rigs lnga dang yum
NK084(yu)004:3307: lnga dang sems dpa' brgyad dang sems ma brgyad rnams
NK084(yu)004:3309: de bas na gdams ngag tu byas pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:3310: de ltar sgom pa'i lam de yis bla na med
NK084(yu)004:3311: pa byang chub kyi snying po 'bras bu chos kyi
NK084(yu)004:3312: sku myur du 'thob cing rang rgyud la len par
NK084(yu)004:3313: byed do // rtsa ba'i sa bcad gsum pa tha mar tshogs bsgrub pa la bdun te /
NK084(yu)004:3314: mtshan nyid gsum gyis gzhi bzung ba dang /
NK084(yu)004:3315: yo spyad dang du blang zhing spyad pa'i yon tan dang /
NK084(yu)004:3316: tshogs bsgrub pas tshe dbang thob pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:3317: des phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin thob dus dang /
NK084(yu)004:3318: des lhun grub thob pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
NK084(yu)004:3319: des 'bras bu chos sku thob pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:3320: yon tan de gzhan nas ma byu nga bar bstan pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:3323: 'bras bu smin byed rgyu dang rkyen //
NK084(yu)004:3324: nus mthu can du gang gyur pa //
NK084(yu)004:3325: rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du grags //
NK084(yu)004:3327: de la gzhi shes pa'i mtshan nyid lta ba ni lam gyi rgyu lta bu /
NK084(yu)004:3328: rkyen 'jug pa'i matshana nyid sgom pa ni lam gyi rkyen lta bu /
NK084(yu)004:3329: mngon du gyur pa 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid ni 'bras bu'o //
NK084(yu)004:3330: 'byor ba'i gzung ni 'brel ba ste gzhi dang lam
NK084(yu)004:3331: ni shes bya dang shes byed kyi 'brel lam dang
NK084(yu)004:3332: 'bras bu ni thob bya dang thob byed kyis 'brel
NK084(yu)004:3333: pa'o // de la gzhi shes pa'i mtshan nyid lta ba ni lta ba bden pa dbyer med /
NK084(yu)004:3334: rig pa spyod yul dang bral ba /
NK084(yu)004:3335: skor bdun ngo bo nyid kyi rgyur gnas pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:3336: rkyen 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid sgom pa ni rang rang
NK084(yu)004:3337: gi lus rtog tshogs bud+d+ha bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis las
NK084(yu)004:3338: ye shes kyi lha bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis sgom pa'o
NK084(yu)004:3339: // de lta bu'i lta bsgom gnyis po de ni
NK084(yu)004:3340: mngon du gyur pa 'bras bu smin par byed pa'i
NK084(yu)004:3341: rgyu dang rkyen yin la mngon du gyur pa 'bras
NK084(yu)004:3342: bu'i mtshan nyid ni lam gyi ting nge 'dzin nus
NK084(yu)004:3343: pa mathu can du gang gyur pa de yis nye
NK084(yu)004:3344: sbyor gyi 'bras bu rig 'dzin bzhi dang mthar thug
NK084(yu)004:3345: gi 'bras bu sku lnga lhun gyis 'grub pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:3346: de bas na gzhi dang lam du 'byor lam dang
NK084(yu)004:3347: 'bras bur 'byor 'bras bu rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin
NK084(yu)004:3348: mi brjed pa'i gzungs dang rdo rje lta bu'i sku
NK084(yu)004:3349: g.yung drung lta bu'i tshe thob pa de kho na
NK084(yu)004:3350: smin byed do // 'bras bu de'ang gzhan nas 'ong ba ma yin no //
NK084(yu)004:3351: rig 'adzana ni dang po de las byung ba dang
NK084(yu)004:3352: bar du de'i bya ba byed pa dang tha mar
NK084(yu)004:3354: rgyal ba'i zhing du grags pa ni rnam par dag pa'i yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi sa'o //
NK084(yu)004:3356: 'dir rig 'dzin bzhi las rnam par smin pa'i rig 'dzin kho na 'grub pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:3357: 'bras bu ni gnyis te thun mong gi rig 'dzin dang khyad par gyi 'bras bu sangs rgyas so //
NK084(yu)004:3358: rig 'dzin ni bzhi ste rnam par smin pa'i rig 'dzin dang /
NK084(yu)004:3359: tshe la dbang ba'i rig 'dzin dang /
NK084(yu)004:3362: rnam par smin pa ni rang lus kyi rnam pa
NK084(yu)004:3363: lha'i skur smin pa ste yid kyis lha'i gzugs 'dzin
NK084(yu)004:3364: pa'o // tshe la dbang ba ni rang don du
NK084(yu)004:3365: lo stong drug brgya bzhugs nas gzhan don mdzad dgos
NK084(yu)004:3366: pa byung na brgya brgya na mar la mnur nas
NK084(yu)004:3367: byis pa lo brgyad pa lta bur gnas nus pa'o
NK084(yu)004:3368: pa'o // // phyag rgya chen po ni lus lha
NK084(yu)004:3369: sku dang khyad par med pa ste lus rdo rje
NK084(yu)004:3370: sems dpa'i sku gzugs su gnas pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:3371: lhun grub ni rgyal ba nyid dang mnyam pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:3372: de nas sku lnga lhun grub la sbyor bar byed
NK084(yu)004:3373: de rnam smin gyi rig 'dzin ni lam gyi 'bras
NK084(yu)004:3375: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa bar mngon rdzogs pa'i //
NK084(yu)004:3379: glu tshig sgra yi phyag rgya yis //
NK084(yu)004:3380: chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
NK084(yu)004:3381: rgyan dang bgo ba'i phyag rgya yis //
NK084(yu)004:3383: bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgya yis //
NK084(yu)004:3384: yid bzhin sku dang bdud rtsi 'grub //
NK084(yu)004:3385: a li ka li'i phyag rgya yis //
NK084(yu)004:3387: zhes gsungs te sgyu yum ste chos kyi dbyings 'phrul
NK084(yu)004:3388: yab ste ma 'gags par snang ba d+r+wa ba 'brel
NK084(yu)004:3389: ba ste thabs shes rab dbyer med par ram zung
NK084(yu)004:3390: du 'brel pa'o // mngon rdzogs pa'i ni ting nge 'dzin gsal ba'i rig pa mngon du rdzogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:3391: de ltar lha'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar rdzogs pa dang
NK084(yu)004:3392: shin tu brtan pa thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang
NK084(yu)004:3393: ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po pho
NK084(yu)004:3394: mo rnams kyis yan lag lnga la tshom bu lnga'i
NK084(yu)004:3395: dkyil 'khor du gsal bar bsgoms la rkang pas bro
NK084(yu)004:3396: brdung ba dang lag pas gar bya ba dang yid
NK084(yu)004:3397: kyis 'adu 'phro'i phyag rgya ste lha rnams la byang
NK084(yu)004:3398: sems phar 'phros pas lha'i sku gsung thugs mnyes pa
NK084(yu)004:3399: dang / sems can gyi don byas nas tshur 'dus pas bdag gis dngos grub thob pa ste /
NK084(yu)004:3400: de yis tshe 'dir sa la byi ba bzhin du
NK084(yu)004:3401: 'dzul lam nam mkhar bya bzhin du 'phur nas 'gro
NK084(yu)004:3402: bar 'gyur ba dang chu la mi bying ba'i dngos
NK084(yu)004:3403: grub thob pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi dngos
NK084(yu)004:3404: grub bo // rnal 'byor pa pho mo rnams lta
NK084(yu)004:3405: ba dang ting nge 'dzin gsal bas rdo rje'i glu
NK084(yu)004:3406: blang ba dang don ldan rdo rje yi tshig dang
NK084(yu)004:3407: sgra yis bde bar gshegs pa mnyes par byed pa
NK084(yu)004:3408: las mi 'da' ba'i phyir na phyag rgya ste de
NK084(yu)004:3409: yis chos nyid kyi gsung dang bstan pa thams cad
NK084(yu)004:3410: dus gcig tu mkhyen pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur
NK084(yu)004:3411: ba ni snang ba mtha' yas gsung gi dngos grub
NK084(yu)004:3412: grub bo // bo // rnal 'byor pho mo rnams
NK084(yu)004:3413: lhar gsal ba las lus la rin po che'i rgyan
NK084(yu)004:3414: sna tshogs gdags pa dang dar dang za 'og la
NK084(yu)004:3415: sogs pa'i gos sna tshogs bgo ba'i phyag rgya yis
NK084(yu)004:3416: sku gang gis kyang zil gyis mi non pas lus
NK084(yu)004:3417: la 'od 'bar ba'i lha dang mi'i rgyal po rnams
NK084(yu)004:3418: kyis kyang thub pa med pa 'grub par 'gyur ba
NK084(yu)004:3419: ni mi bskyod rdo rje'i dngos grub bo //
NK084(yu)004:3420: rnal 'byor pa rnams longs spyod thams cad bdud rtsi'am
NK084(yu)004:3421: 'dod yon gyi lha mor byin gyis brlabs nas bza'
NK084(yu)004:3422: ba dang btung ba'i tshogs la longs spyad nas phul
NK084(yu)004:3423: zhing dngos grub blang ba'i phyag rgya yisa yid bzhin
NK084(yu)004:3424: gyi nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ba'i sku
NK084(yu)004:3425: dang longs spyod thams cad bdud rtsir 'grub par 'gyur
NK084(yu)004:3426: ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dngos grub bo
NK084(yu)004:3427: // a li sbyor ba dang ka li sgrol ba'i
NK084(yu)004:3428: mchod pa tshul bzhin du phul la thabs shes rab
NK084(yu)004:3429: gnyis snyoms 'jug gi phyag rgya yisa thabs shes rab
NK084(yu)004:3430: gnyis su med par gnas pa de yang thun mong
NK084(yu)004:3431: gi dngos grub thams cada dang thun mong ma yin
NK084(yu)004:3432: pa'i dngos grub thams cad tshul bzhin du 'grub para
NK084(yu)004:3433: 'gyur ba de ni don yod grub pa'i dngos grub
NK084(yu)004:3434: ste de yan chad kyis sbyor lam bstan no //
NK084(yu)004:3436: cho ga sngags dang yo spyad rnams //
NK084(yu)004:3438: zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam //
NK084(yu)004:3439: bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis //
NK084(yu)004:3440: dbang bsgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub //
NK084(yu)004:3442: dang po cho ga lnga rdzogs par sgom ste /
NK084(yu)004:3447: ye shes pa sgrub pa dang lnga rdzogs par bya
NK084(yu)004:3448: ste de nas sngagsa kyi yan lag lnga ni yab
NK084(yu)004:3449: yum rtsa ba'i lha dang bzhi po so sor sgom
NK084(yu)004:3451: ye shes sems dpa' shes rab kyi lha dang /
NK084(yu)004:3452: sku gsung thugs rdo rje gsum gyi lha dang /
NK084(yu)004:3453: dbu rgyan bdag po'i lha lnga'o //
NK084(yu)004:3454: yo spyad rnams ni bro gar 'du 'phro dang /
NK084(yu)004:3458: a li ka li'i yo spyad dang lnga'o //
NK084(yu)004:3459: de la dang po cho ga lngas sku gsal bar
NK084(yu)004:3460: byed de nas sngags kyi yan lag lngas nyi khri
NK084(yu)004:3461: chig stong la rig pa rtsal sbyang de nas yo
NK084(yu)004:3463: de ltar rig pa rtsal 'byongs nas tshogs dpon bya
NK084(yu)004:3464: ste rnal 'byor pa rnams lhan du 'tshogs pa'i dkyil
NK084(yu)004:3465: 'khor gyis phun sum tshogs pa lngas sgrub pa'i gzhi
NK084(yu)004:3466: bzung / bsnyen sgrub rnam pa bzhis lam gyi gzhung bsrang /
NK084(yu)004:3467: tshogs lhag gnyis kyis mchod pa'i 'brel bca' /
NK084(yu)004:3468: tha ma 'bras bu la sbyor ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:3469: de yang zhaga ni sum cu phrag drug ni zla
NK084(yu)004:3470: ba drug yin te dbang po rab kyis zla ba
NK084(yu)004:3471: drug gama dbang po 'bring gis zla ba bcu gnyis
NK084(yu)004:3472: sam bcu bzhi na 'grub dbang po tha mas kyang
NK084(yu)004:3473: zla ba bcu drug gis 'grub bo //
NK084(yu)004:3474: gang 'grub na chos thams cad la ji ltar 'dod
NK084(yu)004:3475: pa bzhin du dbang bsgyur ba'i rigs kyi dam pa
NK084(yu)004:3476: tshe la dbang ba'i rig 'dzin 'grub par 'gyur te
NK084(yu)004:3479: de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis //
NK084(yu)004:3480: sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa ni //
NK084(yu)004:3481: ye shes thig le de nyid las //
NK084(yu)004:3482: ye shes thig le nyid snang ba //
NK084(yu)004:3483: bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog /ces pa ste
NK084(yu)004:3484: tshe la dbang ba'i rig 'dzin thob pa de kho
NK084(yu)004:3485: na'i tshe na phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin yang
NK084(yu)004:3486: de'i steng du zla ba bcu drug tshun chada kyis
NK084(yu)004:3487: sgrub na grub pa thob par nges te de nas
NK084(yu)004:3488: lhun gyis grub pa'i rig 'dzin la sbyor ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:3489: de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sku lnga
NK084(yu)004:3490: lhun gyis rdzogs pa na rig 'dzin nyid las sgras
NK084(yu)004:3492: sgrib pa dag pa'i ye shes ma btsal bar lhun
NK084(yu)004:3493: grub sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las nyi shu
NK084(yu)004:3495: de ni mthar thug pa'i lhun gyis rdzogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:3496: de ji ltar thob na ye shes ni lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i rig 'dzin no //
NK084(yu)004:3497: thiga le ni sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las dbyer med pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:3498: de nyid ni rig 'dzin no de lasa khyad par du byas pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:3499: ye shes thig le de nyid ni gzhi dngos po'i gnas lugs so //
NK084(yu)004:3500: gnas lugs de ni rdo rje sems dapa'o //
NK084(yu)004:3501: thig le nyid snang ba ni rig pas don de nyid rtogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:3502: de rnams gzhan nas byung ba ma yin te gzhi
NK084(yu)004:3503: rang byung gi ye shes spros pa thams cad dang
NK084(yu)004:3504: bral ba de nyid las ye shes kyi rol pa
NK084(yu)004:3506: ye shes kyi che ba'i yon tan bsam gyis mi
NK084(yu)004:3507: khyab cing mtha' yas pa mchoga stobs dang mi 'jigs
NK084(yu)004:3508: pa dang ma 'dres pa gzung dang ting nge 'dzin
NK084(yu)004:3509: dang mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad lhun gyis grub
NK084(yu)004:3510: pa'i yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi sar mngon
NK084(yu)004:3511: du byas pa'o // lnga pa ni /
NK084(yu)004:3512: phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i //
NK084(yu)004:3513: zhing khams gzhal yas rnam dag dang //
NK084(yu)004:3514: rgya dang bral ba'i gzhal yas khang //
NK084(yu)004:3515: 'khor lo'i rgyan dang rol mo'i tshogs //
NK084(yu)004:3516: dkyil 'khor ma lus thams cad kun //
NK084(yu)004:3517: mthong nas nye bar mnyes pa dang //
NK084(yu)004:3518: rgya chen gsung las don byung ba //
NK084(yu)004:3519: mthun pa'i ye shes rang snang ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:3520: zhes pa ste phyogs bcu dang dus bzhi yis bsdus
NK084(yu)004:3521: pa'i mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas pa yi bdag
NK084(yu)004:3522: nyid sku lnga lhun gyis grub pa de'i bzhugs gnas
NK084(yu)004:3523: khyad par can ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing khamas dang
NK084(yu)004:3524: gzhal yas khang rnam par dag pa ste de yang
NK084(yu)004:3525: zhing khams ni phyi chos kyi dbyings spros pa dang
NK084(yu)004:3526: bral ba nang 'og min gyi gnas lta bur snang
NK084(yu)004:3527: ba gsang ba yum gyi mkha' bde stong gi nyams
NK084(yu)004:3528: can dang gzhal yas khang rnam par dag pa rgya
NK084(yu)004:3529: yongs su ma chad pa ni che chung gi tshad
NK084(yu)004:3530: dang rgya dang bral ba'i rang bzhin no //
NK084(yu)004:3531: gzhal yas khang de na dbus su 'khor lo'i gdan
NK084(yu)004:3532: dang gzhan yang rin po che'i rgyan mang po bsam
NK084(yu)004:3533: gyis mi khyab pa dang 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi
NK084(yu)004:3534: lha mo grangs med pa'i rol mo'i tshogas kyis brgyan
NK084(yu)004:3535: pa'o // gnas de ni rang bzhin lhun gyis grub
NK084(yu)004:3536: pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyud yongs su dag pa'i bde bar
NK084(yu)004:3537: gshegs pa bzhugs pas dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams
NK084(yu)004:3538: cada kun de na gnas pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:3539: 'og min gyi gnas kyi dus gsum gyis bde bar
NK084(yu)004:3540: gshegs pa de'i zhal mthong nas yid dga' ba dang
NK084(yu)004:3541: brod pa khyad par can skye ba dang mchod pa'i
NK084(yu)004:3542: sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa spros nas nye bar
NK084(yu)004:3544: sangs rgyas kyi gsung gcig la yan lag bsam gyis
NK084(yu)004:3545: mi khyab pa mnga' bas rgya chen po gsung las
NK084(yu)004:3546: chos kyi don byung bas sam bcom ldan 'das dpal
NK084(yu)004:3547: kun tu bzang po'i byin gyis brlabs pa las don
NK084(yu)004:3548: gyi gsung byung ba yis sgrib pa shin tu cha
NK084(yu)004:3549: phra ba de bcom nas gsung rang bzhin gyi ye
NK084(yu)004:3550: shes ji lta ba dang mthun pa'i bzod pa thob
NK084(yu)004:3551: ste ye shes ranga snang bar 'gyur ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:3553: gcig dang du ma bral ba yi //
NK084(yu)004:3554: mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid //
NK084(yu)004:3555: sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi gzigs te //
NK084(yu)004:3556: rang byung ye shes gnas med snang //
NK084(yu)004:3557: zhes gsungs te gong du bstan pa nyid rang rig par gcig pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:3558: rang nyid gciga dang du ma'i mtha' thams cad dang
NK084(yu)004:3559: bral zhing grol ba'i phyir rang rig pa nyid thams
NK084(yu)004:3560: cad du ma 'gags par shar bas gcig dang du
NK084(yu)004:3561: ma'i mtha' ma spangs bar brala ba'o //
NK084(yu)004:3562: de ltar mtha' ma grub pa yi phyir na dbus
NK084(yu)004:3563: kyang ma grub pa'i phyir mtha' dang dbus med de
NK084(yu)004:3565: de ni bde bar gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi ye
NK084(yu)004:3566: shes kyi spyan gyis kyang mi gzigs te gzigs rgyu
NK084(yu)004:3567: med pa'o // 'o na med do snyam pa la
NK084(yu)004:3568: rang byung ye shes nyid rten gnas med par snang
NK084(yu)004:3569: med pa'o // ba'o // zhes phyir na dag pa la brten /
NK084(yu)004:3570: bdun pa yon tan de gzhan nas ma byung bar bstan pa ni /
NK084(yu)004:3571: phyogs bcu dus bzhir mngon rdzogs pa'i //
NK084(yu)004:3572: bde gshegs yon tan rmad po che //
NK084(yu)004:3573: gzhan yod pa ma yin te //
NK084(yu)004:3574: lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos //
NK084(yu)004:3575: zhes pa ste de ltar bstan pa'i 'bras bu de
NK084(yu)004:3576: ni phyogs bcu dang dus bzhira te dus bzhis bsdus
NK084(yu)004:3577: pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogsa par sangs rgyas
NK084(yu)004:3578: pa'o // sku lnga lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas so //
NK084(yu)004:3579: de ni lam bde bar gshegs pa yon tan gsang
NK084(yu)004:3580: ba rmad po che'am rmad du byung ba bde bar
NK084(yu)004:3581: gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa'i ngo bo
NK084(yu)004:3582: sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las kyi bdag po'o
NK084(yu)004:3583: // de ltar bstan pa'i 'bras bu de dag kyang
NK084(yu)004:3584: gzhan na yod pa snyed pa lta bu ma yin
NK084(yu)004:3585: te rang rig pa nyid de ltar rang shar ba
NK084(yu)004:3586: las ma gtogs pa gzhan na med zhes so //
NK084(yu)004:3587: de lta bu'i 'bras bu de thob bam mi thob
NK084(yu)004:3588: bam bden nam mi bden nam snyam na dper na
NK084(yu)004:3589: 'jig rten gyi lha srin la sogs pa bsgrub pas
NK084(yu)004:3590: grub rtags phyung na 'di la ci smos /
NK084(yu)004:3591: 'jig rten lha la yang yon tan yod na 'di la lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:3592: gsum pa mjug gi don la bstan bcos brtsam pa'i dge ba bsngo ba dang /
NK084(yu)004:3593: bstan bcos mdzad pa po'i bstan pa dang /
NK084(yu)004:3596: rgyud kyi don las sgrub ba'i thabs //
NK084(yu)004:3597: rin chen d+r+wa ba 'di bsdus pas /
NK084(yu)004:3598: bcom ldan kun bzang sku gsung thugs //
NK084(yu)004:3599: sems can kun gyis thob par shog /ces pa ste
NK084(yu)004:3600: gsang ba snying po'i rgyud kyi don lasa zhi ba
NK084(yu)004:3601: bsgrub pa'i thabas 'di bsdus pas so //
NK084(yu)004:3602: de'i mtshan ni ci zhe na rin chen dbang gi
NK084(yu)004:3603: rgyal po ltar dgos 'dod 'byung d+r+wa ba ltar thabs
NK084(yu)004:3604: shes su 'brel ba 'di rgyud las logs su bkol
NK084(yu)004:3605: nas bsdus pas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang
NK084(yu)004:3606: po'i sku gsung thugsa kyi bcud dngos grub kyi bcud
NK084(yu)004:3607: dam pa rnams bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i sems can
NK084(yu)004:3608: kun gyis thob par shog /gnyis pa ni /
NK084(yu)004:3609: zhi ba rin chen d+r+wa ba zhes bya ba slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa rdzogs so //
NK084(yu)004:3611: rgya gar gyi pan+di ta sangs rgyas gsang ba dang
NK084(yu)004:3612: bod kyi lo ts+aa ba bra ka mu dri ta
NK084(yu)004:3613: / wa sa ma n+tu sh+ri war mas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
NK084(yu)004:3615: legs byas shar ri'i phrag pa nas 'thon pa'i //
NK084(yu)004:3616: bsil ldan 'bum phrag brgya yi zer gyis kyang //
NK084(yu)004:3617: cha tsam bskrun du med pa'i dge tshogs rnams //
NK084(yu)004:3618: gcig tu bzlum ste bstan pa rgyas phyir bsngo //
NK084(yu)004:3619: zhi ba rdo rje dbyings kyi lha tshogs rnams //
NK084(yu)004:3620: dkyil 'khor gcig sgrub rin chen d+r+wa ba yi //
NK084(yu)004:3621: bstan bcos chen po nyi zla gnas kyi bar //
NK084(yu)004:3622: dar zhing rgyas la mi nub yun gnas shog /
NK084(yu)004:3623: 'di nyid 'chad dang 'dzin sems sgom pa la //
NK084(yu)004:3624: bla ma sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i lha tshogs kyis //
NK084(yu)004:3625: rtag tu dgongs shing bkra shis byin brlab kyi //
NK084(yu)004:3626: 'od zer snying dbus pad+mora sim gyur cig /ces slob
NK084(yu)004:3627: dpon chen po sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa'i zhi
NK084(yu)004:3628: ba rin chen d+r+wa ba'i bstan bcos la dbus gru
NK084(yu)004:3629: mkhas pa smon lam seng+ge'i mchan tig rtsa mchan sdebs
NK084(yu)004:3630: shing bsdus don dkyus su bkod de 'jam dbyangs chos
NK084(yu)004:3631: kyi blo gros pas gsal bar byas pa'i yi ge'i
NK084(yu)004:3632: mthun 'gyur mgo tsha mkhan sde snod 'dzin pa gzhan
NK084(yu)004:3633: phan bzang pos bgyis pa 'dis kyang gsang ba snying
NK084(yu)004:3634: po'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs bcur 'phel ba'i
